Murde nim Yawe kx na-ayzlubzle nike nzalemlr bange, Mz nzngini-krm Gct rnge kc tqabrtrpo drtwrnge bade.
Bzkq rlr-ngrbzme nzabrtzlvz-krdr nzetqkr drtqnge. X bzkq nzglqpx-lzbqng mz nzaovxio-krdr ninge.
Murde ycpe pipz nzodati-krdr ninge, X nzetq-zvzkr drtqnge tryrkrtxpxpeu.
Naplztxpxx nzvz-rbr-krngeng, Murde nzbatrplr nzkxnekr drtqnge.
Enqmi rngeng nzxplrng x nzlu-zpwxng. X nzkqlung kx nztrkati nivz lrdr ninge.
Da kxmrlz kcng tqalebo badr, nzayzlumlr mz da kxtrka. Nzpxtxpx-ngrdr ninge murde vz-nqblqx nzmncngr kxtubq.
Yawe, bzkq amnctxnq ninge esz'-krnge, X bzkq mnc-zvzme rlru.
Kxetu, vz-anim mz nzokatr-krm ninge, Murde nim Mevalu rnge.

Yawe, pnzpe drtwrnge kx namnc-lrpitxpwo, a' bzkq alex alwx mz nzlctr-krbz drtwrnge bam mz nzkxpu-krngeng. Murde kxdrka'-ngrng lcng tzmnc-aepztrpqng bange, ma tzxtrnga-ngrdr nzlqngi-krm.
X kxmule-esz' trycmnewxu, A' nzkxpu-krngeng etunepx zvz, delc tqtalvzongr nabznge.
X mz nzaotikr drtwrnge nzkxpu-krngeng, nztalvzokr nabznge mrilvzole ninge. X mzli kc tqrblxm bange nzmnc-lrpi-krnge, sc tqrpipebo bam kx,
“Yawe, nzlu-krnge mrbcnepwz. ?Memule tqpxlavxpx-ngrbzme nzkxpu-krnge? ?Myx mzli kx naesakingr trnzmnc-zpwx-krpwc'u lc?”
Murde nim kx amrbctrp nzlu-krnge. X mzli kx lutix ngi da txne mz nzobq-krm. Nzlukr leplz mrbcnepwz apule nzyrplaokr nrc kxesz'.
Nzwz-katongr ngi brmrdakr apule nounc kc trpnzngr nrade. X mz nzbzkr leplz trpnzngr dztudrng kx natwzlr.
?Kxetu nike naobqtipxx mz nzmnc-krnge lc tqngi brmrda? Mwx namrlz nzbrti-zvzkr drtwrnge nim.
Murde na-arlapxq ninge mz alwx rngeng amrlx, X kxnzlukurnrng ma tzyrpalelvzlr ninge.
Mzli ka, dcpxpe mz drtwrnge kx vz-rbrx nzlctr-krbz drtwrnge bam mz nzkxpu-krngeng. Murde tubq nzayrplapx-krm ninge mz alwx rngeng.
A' bzkq ayrplatipx-zvzq ninge, Murde ycpe pipz nzbztr-krbo mz mqm.
Mz nzayrplapx-krm leplz, odatibzme dztudrng kcng tqmrlzbz badr. Apusr-ngrbzmeleng da kx yrti ninr, Murde nakrlzlr kx nzvz-rbrng mz nzobq-krm. Nzlukr leplz mrbcnepwz apule nzyrplaokr nrc kxesz'.
Yawe, xlrm nzkrka'-krnge x nzyrni-krnge. Murde nzmrbckr nzmncngr mz nrlc apunepwzle nzwoukr betepu.
Ayrkrtxpx nzetqkr drtqnge x aotxpxbz drtqnge, Murde mwx na-abrtztx-kaix mzli kxpipz x ninge kc tqbz ate.

Yawe, sc tqaenzli-lrpipebo bam nzokatr-krm ninge. X mzli kc tqkqle-ngrne nim, xlrme nzkrka'-krnge.
Veclzme ninge mz gq ngr nzbzngr x mz nabz mu kxrluo. Atuome ninge mz rplz kxetu, x trpengr doa x da kx namwxlrtix.
Alvztrpe' bange kc nabz kxmrna mz nzrglqlzngr nim. X mzli kc naxlrngr leplz nzngr-krngele, sa na-angiolr nim x na-abrtrpzlr drtwrdr bam.
Namrlzbz mz leplz kcng tzabrtrpzlr drtwrdr bam, Krkcng trnzprtrpwzung mz leplz kcng tzglqpx-lzbq-ngrdr x tzpokiang.
Yawe, nim Gct rgr x trpnzngr kx apule nim. Aleme bagr da kxkqlu mz nzatutr-krm drtwr kx yrlqq mz nzamrlz-krm nigr. Drtwrnge yrpz'trpz nzrlwxngr da lcng amrlx, Murde nzkqlu-zlwzng.
Trsutiu drtwrm nzrka-ngrbz bam dalr nrlanc ayrnrngr x dalr nzrkatxngr alwx. X tr-rlx-kzpe'u blz x animol kx na-angcom mz olta nyzm. A' da kx suti txpwz drtwrm nzxlr-krbo natqm, Murde narlrpx-ngrbo nrkrdrtqnge bam.
Delc tqrpi-ngrbo bam kx, “Ninge kape. Na-atutrx natq kcng tqyclzm mz Nzryrngrkxtr.
Gct rnge, abrtzlvzx nzale-krnge me pnz drtwrm, Murde nabznge lolvz-amqngipele nzalvztr-krmqng.”
Yawe, trnayrlq-kapqpou nzaodu-krm x nzangidati-krm mz leplz nemqng. A' sa napipx-zvzbo nrpa ngr nzarlapx-krm nigr Mz nzyrlwrpx-lxblr-krgr. X krlzq kx vz zvz nzpipx-krngele.

Yawe, krlzx kx yckqti zvz drtwrm ninge. X nzaodu-krm x nzangidati-krm nzngini-zvzmlr lrpalvc kx mncpx-ngrmc.
A' mzli ka, rblx nzrlwx-krnge nzkxpungr amrlx kx nzprtztimqng bange. X alwx rngeng nzmrilvzolr ninge x nzayc-kapqmlr bange da kxtubq. Murde nzkqlu-zlwz-krdr nzmyaszpxlr nqnginarnge. X nabznge tqtalvzo-zlwz-ngrde.
Yawe, vz-anim mz nzarlapx-krm ninge. Kxetu, rnekim mz nzokatr-krm ninge.
Okatrp ninge nzaovxio-krnge kxnzrpilr naodatilr ninge, Murde drtqdr namya x naobqszong mzli kc nadwasz-ngrdr ninge.
X leplz lcng tzxtrnga-ngrdr ninge nelzdr navzdzm Mzli kc nametx-ngrmlr bange.
A' amrlz krkcng tzbrti drtwrdr nim Mz rka-krbzme badr nzabrtz-zlwzngr, Murde na-awi-zvz-ngrbzlr bam nzarlapx-krm nidr Mz nzrpi-krbzlr kx, “Gct, nim kx myatxlz-esz'ngr.”
Kxetu, trxplrwxu x trpnzngr scnge zmatq. Bzkq mrbrtr mz drtwrm ninge. Murde nim txpwz Mevalu rnge. Bzkq asaq nzokatr-krm ninge.

Namrlzbz mz doa kcng tzmrlztilr leplz kxnzmaneng, Murde Yawe sa naokatrle nidr mzli kc nakxpu-ngrdr.
Sa na-aclvebzle nzlu-krdr. X trtxpnzngr nzrlr-krbzle nidr mz mq enqmi rdrng. Delc tzrpi-ngrbz kx Yawe amrlzpele lr mrnyzdr Israel.
Sa naokatrng Yawe mz nzamrlz-mou-krde nrkrdrtqdr Mzli kc nayagox-ngrdr.
Yawe, krka'-ngrne kx nayc mz drtwrm ninge X na-amrlz mou ninge. Zyagox kc tqycpxm mz nabznge Vzpxm mz alwx rngeng kcng tzatrkatilr nim.
Enqmi rngeng nzpibqtilr ninge, Nzrpilr kx, “?Myx mzli kx nabz-ngrde, murde namrbrtxtr mz drtwr nide?”
Kzdung leplz lcng tzoklatimlr ninge, nzpokiatilr kx nzyc mz drtwrdr ninge. A' nzrpilr nakrlzlr kxmu nzkxpu-krnge, murde nayapwxtinedr mz mztea amrlx.
Nztrkati nivz lrdr ninge nzpikiti-lrpi-zvzlr ninge. X nzaoti txpwz drtwrdr da kxtrka kx nadwatimle ninge.
Nzrpi-awalr kx, “Mrlztxpe! Mzli ka prtilz-zlwzpe zyagox kxtrka, X mzli trnaboiu x sc tqbzpe.”
Mzli ka, kztenge kc tqabrtr-zlwzbo drtwrnge bade, X tqmukr ncdr, nipe-kzde enqmi rnge.
Yawe, krka'-ngrne kx nayc mz drtwrm ninge. Amrlz-mopwz nrkrdrtqnge murde na-ayzlu-mopwc' da kcng tqtrka tzalemlr bange.
X mzli kc trna-aovxio-ngrdru ninge, Sa nakrlz-angidrpex kx abrtzlvzq ninge.
Sa naokatrq ninge nzale-krnge da kxtubq, X namnc-alotrpebo bam.
Naglqpxku Yawe, Gct r lr Israel. Mzli ka x tqyc tqyc, naglqpxku Yawe.

Gct, nzmingrti-zlwzkr drtwrnge nim Apule animol kc drtwrde tqbrlxkz mqde lue.
Nim Gct kc tqlu x nzsutikr drtwrnge nim apule nzbrlxkztikr drtwrnge lue kxbao. ?Myx mzli kx naxngi-ngrbo nzmnc-krme bange?
Mz zbq kang kqlu yrni-zvzx x mnqtxpwo drlemzke' kx piz. A' enqmi rngeng nzyrpalelvzlr ninge, nzrpimlr kx, “?Memule Gct rm trokatrpe-ngrdeu nim? ?Bzpe?”
Gct, mzli ka drtwrnge yrnibutx zlwz. A' dcpx mou mz drtwrnge mzli kc ena tqmailztr-ngrne leplz Mangr-nzangiongr nim. Mzli lcde abrtz-zlwzkr x ngr-katokr mz nzglqlz-krgr nim.
Kxmule-esz' nabznge talvzo x nelznge vzdzm, A' sa na-abrtxtrpwo drtwrnge bam. Murde naglqlz-mou-ngrne nim kalr, Mzli kc na-arlapxq ninge.
Gct rnge, mzli boipe trnzkrlzpe-krpou Israel. ?Memule tqpulio-zvz-ngrme bange nzkxpungr mz nzapu-krde lue kxvo? Nzvzdz-krm nelznge vz-ebirnrpe-ngrm bange apule nrc kcng tzyrplalvzolr ninge. X nztalvzokr nabznge xplr-zlwzpe apule nzyrpukr lue kxtalio mz nabzde. X ebio ngr srkau amrlx kcng tqatwzlr-ngrme nzalxlvrtine-zvzlr ninge. A' nadcpx mz drtwrnge da kcng tqmyalz tqaleq Israel, Mrkc tqyrlengr LueJodzn x tqycngr Newz Hemon x Newz Misa.

Murde vz zvz nzpulio-krme nivz lrm mz zbq kang kqlu. X ngrbo bam mz nrlckxbq vzmi nzkrka'-krnge murde nim Gct kx rkam nzlungr bange.
Gct, nim butqbr nyznge. ?Memule tqmrbrtitrpengr drtwrm ninge? ?X memule tqkxpu-zvz-ngrne Mz nzaetqti-krm enqmi rngeng drtqnge?

Kxmule-esz' nabznge talvzo x nelznge vzdzm, A' sa na-abrtxtrpwo drtwrnge bam. Murde naglqlz-mou-ngrne nim kalr, Mzli kc na-arlapxq ninge.
Gct, pipxbz mz krkcng trnzangiolru nim kx trvz-rbrwxu. Arlapx ninge mz mq krkcng tztrkating x tzpokiang.
Nim me rlakitrx. ?Memule tqrlasz-ngrn ninge? ?X memule tqkxpu-zvz-ngrne Mz nzaetqti-krm enqmi rngeng drtqnge?
Atwzlr-ngrm bange zyzlr ngrm x nzalvztrngr angidrng, Mz nzmailz-mou-krdr ninge Saeon, mz newz kxtr nyzm. Murde nakrlzlzbo Mangr-nzangiongr kc tqmnc-ngrn,
X na-angiox nim mz olta nyzm, Mz nzngini-krm nou nzabrtz-krnge. X na-angrlvzx nim mz nzayrni-krbo gita bam.
Kxmule-esz' nabznge talvzo x nelznge vzdzm, A' sa na-abrtxtrpwo drtwrnge bam. Murde naglqlz-mou-ngrne nim kalr, Mzli kc na-arlapxq ninge.

Gct, xlrpekr nrpa ngr da kxetuting kcng tqalebzme mz melrmqgrng mzli kc bqnc, Mz nzpi-krmlrle bagr mzli kc.
Nzayrplapx-krm lr mrkzbleng apule lxbi kc tzbolvzti mz nrlanc nyzm. X petio-alzuq leplz nemqng mz drtc' nyzdr mz nzamnc-zpwx-krm nidr.
Melrmqgr lcng trnzaovxiolru enqmi rdrng mz toki r vea scdr x mz zmatq ngrdr esz'-krdr. A' leplz nemqng nzaovxiong mz zmatq ngrm, mz nzxplr-krm, x mz nzmnc-krbzme badr mz nzaodu-krm nidr.
Gct, nim King rnge. Nim kx rngi-batrp nzaovxio-krgr, nigr neidu lr Jekop.
Milxtxopekr enqmi rgrng mz nzxplr-krm. X rnzlvzokr kxnzatrkatilr nigr mz zmatq ngr drtqm.
Murde trbrtiu drtwrnge popz' x toki r vea scnge Nzarlapx-krdr ninge mz nzotangr.
A' ni-txpwzme kx arlapxle nigr mz enqmi rgrng, Mz nzamyati-krbzme drtqdr.
Sa naglqlz-zvzkr nim. X nzawi-krbzkr bam tqvzpe tqvzpe.
?A' memule drtqm tqsatrpe-ngrmle bagr, trokatrpe-ngrnqu ncblo ngr vea negrng? Mzli ka rlrtx-ngrpwzme mz enqmi rgrng nzamyati-krmlr drtqgr.
X ngi-batrpeme nzdwasz-krgr nidr, X nztwz-krdr dztugrng amrlx.
X rlr-ngrbzme badr nznibq-krdr nigr mz nzapu-krgr sip, X nzvzmilr nigr mz drtc' nyzdrng mz nzwz-nrbalqtr-krbzkr badr.
Apule kx amwabzme nigr badr mz narncbr kx topwzne, Mz nzapusr-krm nigr brmrda.
Lr mrkzbleng kcng tzmnc-aepztrpqng bagr nznelvzlr nigr mz nzamyati-krmlr drtqgr, X nzxtrnga-ngrdr nigr.
X neidu mz nrlc tulvzo nzobqszo-ngrdr nigr Mz nzyrpalelvz-krdr nigr.
Aputr-zvzbo da kxtrka mz nzobqkr leplz lcng, X drtqnge mya zvz.
Murde xlrx natq kxtrka kcng tzpimlr bange, X mcx nzmnc-krm enqmi rngeng.
Kxmule-esz' nzprtzmqng bagr da lcng A' trmrbrtru mz drtwrgr nim x Nzesz'tikr Drtwrgu.
Kxmule-esz' traxtxpekru nim, X o-zli-zvzkr nzti rm,
A' katrpzme nigr mz mq enqmi rgrng mz nzrnzbrti-krdr nigr, mz nzapu-krdr kuli kzpetong. X nzaovxiolr nigr x kzdung nigr nzyrtzmqpeng mz gq.
Gct rgr, nzmu navecpx-lzbqmgr bam, Mz nzangio-krgr gct kzble,
Tryc-kapqpwzu bam, Murde obqplxq nabzgr.
A' mz nzngini-krgr doa nemqng, vz zvz nznibqti-krdr nigr, Mz nzapusr-krdr nigr sip kcng tzmnc-nabung mz nzrnibqngr nidr.
Kxetu rgr, bzkq esablqme. ?Memule tro-lxlvr-ngrpwe'u bagr? Vz-anim, x bzkq pxtxpx-ngrn nigr.
Lxlvrm bagr, Mz nzdcpxkr mz drtwrm nzetqkr drtqgr x nzkxpu-krgr.
Drtwrgr esz'tipe kx sa nabzpekr, Mz nztangqgxlz-krmgr mz drtc'.
Gct, vz-anim x okatrp nigr. Arlapx nigr murde aodu-zvzq nigr.

King rnge, krlc nabz nenge kx nangr-ngrbo bam. Nabznge esz'ngr natq kxmrlzting. X nzngqpx-krm natq mz naonge Apule nzyrlepx-krm lue mz butqbr.
Nzobq-krm lqngipx-esz'ngr. X natq ngr nzamrlzngr ngqpx-zvzm mz naom. Delc tqamrlz-zvz-kzngr Gct nim.
Nim ncblo kxmyalz-esz'ngr x xplr zlwz mz nzotangr. Alvco toki r vea scm mz bxli rde kc mz nrkalom.
Murde kalr mz nzvo-krm mz vea na-aovxioq enqmi rmqng mz nzxplr-krm. X nalolvz-amqngiq da kxtubq x leplz kxnzavzo-lzbqng mz zmatq ngrm.
X nipna scmqng natu x nalvctrng mz lomr enqmi rmqng, X lr mrkzbleng amrlx namnclzbzng bam.
Nzyrlqkr Gct lc nzngini-krm King tqyc tqyc, Mz nzaclve-krm leplz nemqng mz nzmncngr kx tubq-esz'ngr.
Mrlzbz bam da kxtubq, a' px-ngrn da kxtrka. Dekc Yawe, Gct rm, tqmcpxpe-ngrde nim mz nzmyaszlz-krm kztemqng. X tqglqlz-ngrde nim, Murde na-aelule nim tolo ngr nzabrtzngr.
Lrpzmqng nzaeluti zvz mz tolo kx mnrte mrlzvxi. X ncblo sc tzayrnibzng gita bam Murde na-aelalzmle drtwrm, Mz nabz ma nyzm kx mzte luli-esz'ngr.
X olvi kc nangi kwin ngrm tutrpz mz nrlarm kxrtc, nzangrlopliti da kx nzwzngr mz gol kxpnapr. Olvi lc nide kzdq inyx king kcng tzmncng ma nyzm.
Nim la nanginim Kwin. Lalztqm bange x aclvetio-lzbq. Mzli kznike ncblo ngrm suti-zlwzngr drtwrde nim mz nzlqngivxikr mzpq, Mnclzbz bade mz nzngini-krde King x Kxetu rm. X bzkq matq-zlwzpe mz drtwrm trtem x kxnginimqng.

Kxmule-esz' lr Taea nzrkabzng da kxlqlwx bam, A' bzkq nzbatrpzlr nzrnzlvzo-krm me pnz drtwr ncblo ngrm, kc tqngi king.
Mzpq lxngipx-esz'ngr mz nzprtr-krm ma nyz king. X lrpzmqng nzkxsilvztitr gol.
Nim kc tqkq lrpz kxluli nzvzmibzlr nim mz king. X kztemqng kx nzmnc-kamelrng nzvz-nqblqlr nim, mz nztutr-krbzmu mz mzte.
Mz nzprtr-krmu lc ma nyzde, Drtwrmu elalzm x abrtz-zlwzamu.
King rnge, doa ncblo kcng mztr namc mz nqvi lrm sa nangini-kzdr king, da kc tzwai melrmqdrng mzli kc. X nangi-batrpzme nzaclve-atwrnr-krdr drtc' nyzm.
Nabz nenge sa narkatrpz nabztq mz leplz nzamatq-zvz-krdr drtqm, X nzglqlz-krdr nim tqvzpe tqvzpe.

Gct kc tqmyatxlz, nide me rlakitrku x axplrle nigu, X mz nzkqle-krgu nide mz mzli kx nzkxpungr, okatrle nigu.
Kxmule-esz' nengq aycngrlrle nrlc, x newz nzbrkaong prla, X kxmule-esz' dxvo votrp x nrc oda, X newz nzycngrlr-ngrdr kz nzyrpukr nrc kxetuting, A' trmwxlrkuu murde abrtrpzku drtwrgu mz Gct.

Gct kc tqmyatxlz mnc mz mztea kxtr nyzde, Jerusalem, Mrkc tqpulio-ngrmle nzabrtzngr bagu, Mz nzngini-krgu lr mrnyzde. Nzvzo-krmle bagu apule lue kx yrle-kato.
X rblx nzodatingr Jerusalem murde Gct mncm bagu, X naokatrle nigu mz zbq kxmrna.
A' mz nzxlrkr lr nrlc natqde nzmwxlr-zlwzng. X ngyati drtwrdr nide murde aovxio-zvzle ami ngr kandre amlrx.
Yawe nide ngrlrvea ngrgu, X nide lrpalvc nyzgu.
Obqmamu! Mcamu da kc tqale Yawe. Murde aletile da kx nzodating mz nrlc ka.
Aesakile vea amrlx mz nrlc tulvzo. Plameitile popz' x nipna x dalr vea amrlx x rtclz-ngrdeng mz nyr.
X rpile kx, “Bzkq ota-zvzamu. A' metxpemamu bange murde ninge txpwz Gct. X ninge txpwz kx myatxlzbz mz neidu amrlx mz nrlc tulvzo.”
Yawe kc tqrninr mncpem bagu, X nide lrpalvc nyzgu.

Nigu leplz amrlx na-ayrlewzku da Mz nzngr-abrtz-kato-krbzku mz Yawe, Gct rgu.
Murde na-amrlueku nide kc tqmyatxlz-esz'ngr, Mz nzngini-krde King kxmatq kc tqaclvele nrlc.
Batrpzle nzaovxio-krgu lr mrkzbleng, Mz nzmnclz-krmlr bagu.
Nigu leplz ngr nqvi lr Jekop kcng tqmrlzting Yawe, Bilvzpeku drtc' kc tqmcpxbzle nangi nyzgu.
Mzli kc Yawe tqwxbuo-ngrmle mz tron nyzde Mangr-nzangiongr, Sc tqrvxupeku trpu x tqmalq-katopeku mz nzabrtzlvz-krgu nide.
Nangr-katobzku mz Yawe Gct rgu. Murde nide King rgu, nangr-katobzku bade.
Naglqlzku nide mz nabz kxyrlvi, Murde nide King r nrlc tulvzo.
X wxbu mz tron kxtr nyzde, Mz nzaclve-krde neidu amrlx.
Kxnzmailzlr lr mrkzbleng nzaxvctr-lzbqmqng bagu, nigu leplz neng Gct r Ebraam. Murde Gct kc tqmyatxlz-esz'ngr myaszpxle king amrlx mz nrlc.

Yawe myatxlz-esz'ngr. X takitrde nzglqlz-krgu nide Mz mzteadau nyzde kc tqycom Saeon, newz kxtr nyzde.
Nide king kx rngisc zmatq. X Newz Saeon myatxlz x mzte opx. X Mzteadau nyzde rkatrpz nzabrtzkr leplz mz nrlc tqlvzo.
Gct aelwapxpe-ngrde kx trpnzngr da kx nakx mz drtqgu, Mz nzmncpx-krmgu badr mz lrpalvc nyzdeng mz mzteadau lc.
Kzdung king nzvzmqng nztung me esz'. Nzrpilr naotang badr lr mzteadau lc.
A' kx nzmclr nzmatq-zlwzkr mzteadau Jerusalem, Nzkctipx-ngrdr x sc tzdwapeng mz zmwxlr,
Kc tqprtilzle nidr Apule zvetq ngr drtq olvz kx narmika. X nzrnrcti-lzbqng Apule lcsu kxrtcnengr srkau ngr nounenq.
<range>
X mzli lcpwz, tqmnc-ngrgu mzteadau nyz Gct rgu, Sc tqmcpe-kzku kx Yawe nide Gct kc tqrninr. X atu-amqngi-zvzle mzteadau lc, Da kc tzwai nzyapwxtipxkr melrmqgung le mzli kc.
Gct, aoti zvz drtwrgr nzaodu-krm Mz nzvztr-krgr Mangr-nzangiongr nim.
Leplz amrlx mz nrlc tulvzo sa naglqlzlr nim mz nzxlr-krdr nzmyalz-krm. Murde nzaclve-angidr-krm tubq.
X nigr lr Israel amrlx nzabrtz-ngrgr kz Nztubqkr da kx pipxq.
Nigu leplz neng Gct, naolvxtiku Jerusalem, X nabrti mzku mrkcng tztu-ngrdr kxnzaukz nedeng.
Naobqlvzti-zpwxku drkq ngrdeng x nzmqngikr lrpalvc ngrdeng, Murde nayapwxtipx-zvzbz mz doa ne doa negung.
Nzmyalzkr Gct rgu sc tqaelwapx-lzbqngr mz mzteadau lc. X sc tqmailzle nigu tqyc tqyc.

Lalztqmamu x xlrmamu natqnge, nimu neidung mz nrlc tulvzo, Kxmule-esz' nimu kxnzetung, leplz txneng, bcnyrng, x kxtrnzrngiscung.
<range>
Murde natqnge otxpx, X alvztr-ngrne nzyrplapxngr,
Mz nzpipx-krnge natq lrtzlvz ngrgung. Murde nayokaetipxx drtwr ngrdr mz nabz nenge.
Kxmule-esz' kxpux mz nztu-ngalelvzkr enqmi rngeng ninge, A' trmwxlrwxu.
Murde kxdrka'ngr lcng nzabrtrpzlr drtwrdr mz trau, X nzglqpx-lzbqng mz nzngini-krdr bcnyrng.
A' trpnzngr kxrkrlz nzxpepx-krde nzlu-krde esz'-krde. Murde ncblo trtakitrdeu nzkapx-krde narncbr ngr nzlu-alongr kx yrlq Gct, Kxmule-esz' ka-atwrnr-ngrde trau x dztudeng amrlx. Murde rblx nzxpe-krde da kx na-arlapxle nide mz gq.

<range>
Leplz amrlx sa nabzng, kxmule-esz' kxnzyrplapxng o kxnzngqngung. X dztudrng amrlx sa nabzszbzlr mz kzdung kz leplz.
X kxmule-esz' mzli ka nzrnginyzng drtc', A' gq lrdr dela nangipe ma nyzdr mz nzmnc-alope-krdr elr.
Da amrlx kcng tqmatq mz drtwrdr sa nayrkrpx-kzng. Leplz sa nabzng da kc tzwai animol amrlx.
Lrpzki r kxnzngqngung kcng tzabrtrlr drtwrdr mz nidr esz'-krdr x mz dztudrng, Yrkrtxpxpwz mz nzbzngr.
Apule kx nzbzngr nide kxetu rdr kc tqmailzle nidr mz gq lrdr, Mz nzapu-krdr sip. X kxnztubqng sa navzneng wq mrkc tzyrtzmqngr namz ngrdr. X mz nzmibi-krdr, nzyc-rlrubzng mz ma nyzdr.
A' Gct sa naxpetrle ninge mz zmatq ngr nzbzngr, Mz nzarlapx-krde ninge mz gq.
Bzkq nabzmu talvzo mz nzmc-krmu bcnyrng, X nzkqlunepxkr dztudrng.
Murde rblx nzrtwzmingr dztung mz nzbzngr. Dztung la tqyc, a' nrkrdrtq la namibi.
Kxmule-esz' bcnyrng nzabrtz-zvzng mzli kc tzlube-ngrdr, X nzamatq leplz nidr murde sc tzakqlunepx-zvzlr dztudrng,
A' sa navzo-kzng mz gq, da kc tzwai melrmqdrng, Mz nzmnc-alo-krdr mz nzlo.
Da amrlx kcng tqmatq mz drtwrdr mane x nardr tryrplatrpwzu. Leplz sa nabzng da kc tzwai animol amrlx.
Yawe, nide Gct kc tqxplr esz'ngr. X zluli rde pnamilxtile mzteadau Jerusalem kc tqlqngi. A' nrlc ycngrlrlzm mz nzvz-krmle, Murde nyr wounepx kai mz nzangc-krde da amrlx, X nounenq o-ngalelvzle nide. X kqlele lr Heven mz nzayrlwr-lxblr-krdr leplz amrlx mz nrlc.

<range>
Navzmqng mz nzmc-krdr nztubqkr natqde, Mz nzpipx-krde nzvz-rbrkr leplz nedeng.
X rpibzle mz lr Heven kx, “Vzmimamu krkcng tzlxngitilr ninge, X drtwrgr badr tqesz'ti mz nzangc-krmlr bange blz krdr, murde nayrlwr-ngalelvzlr ninge.”
X lr Heven nzrpilr kx, “Gct, nzaclve-krm rsakrlrngr. Murde tubqq mz nzryrlq-krm drtwr.”
Rpi Gct kx, “Leplz nengeng, xlrmamu natqnge. Murde ninge Gct rmu x na-aelwa-ngrbo mrkc tqvz-rbrtiamu.
Animol kc tqngi blz tqkamamu bange, trngiu da kx myapxbz, Mz nzangco-zvz-krmamuleng mz olta.
X trngi-kzu da kx myapxbz nzangc-krmamu bange Gout x kzu kxncblongr dalr nardzng nyzmu.
Murde dalr peto amrlx nyzngeng, X wai-kzle kzu amrlx kcng tzmncng mz siu r newz.
Utc ngr peto amrlx nengeng, Nidr badr animol ngr nardzng.
Nzmu nabrtalex x drtwrnge brlxkz tr-rlxpwc'u bamu da. Murde nrlc nyznge x dalrdeng amrlx.
X trmuwxu ncvr kzu. X tr-rmnqwxu mepyr ngr gout.
A' blz angidr nangi nzawi-krmamu bange, X nzangidati-krmu da kx esalz-ngrmamu bange.
X mrlz nzkrka'-krmamu bange mzli kc tqkxpu-ngrnamu, Murde naglqlzamu ninge kalr mz nzarlapx-krnge nimu.”
A' rpibz Gct mz leplz kxdrka'-ngrng kx, “Trtakitrdeu nzyapwxti-zvz-krmu Loukxtr scnge, Mz nzycmnetr-krmu Nzryrngrkxtrng.
Murde pxtxpx-ngrnamu nzatubqti-krnge nimu, X rtctx-ngrnamu natqnge.
Alwx ngrmung nidr seleng: Mrlzbz bamu nzngi-kzte-krmu ncblo kx pna da, X nzprtr-ngrbz mz leplz kcng tzrmwimi-abeaneng leplz kx trngiu krnalzdr.
Ycmnetrpwzmu mz da kxtrka, X naomu tresakiu nzrpi-twzti-krdr da kx nzesabrtingr.
Pikiti-zvzamu kztemung, X pibqti-kzamu mzlemung.
Mz nzale-krmu da lcng sc tqmnc-lrpinebo. X rpiamu mz drtwrmu, mrlzm bange nzale-krmuleng. A' trtingr! Murde da kcng tqvz-rbrtiamu delcng tqaplxtipx-atebo bamu.
“Mzli ka natekqtramu nqmq krmu, Murde ma tqodatitxne nimu X sc trpengr kx na-arlapxle nimu. X bzkq mrbrtr mz drtwrmu nzamatq-krmu ninge.
Blz angidr nangi nzawi-krmamu bange. Murde narmctiamu nzarlapx-krnge nimu, mz nzvz-nqblq-krmu ninge.”


Gct, nayc mz drtwrm ninge, X atubqtim nzvz-rbr-krngeng, murde aodu-zvzq ninge.
Wztibz nabznge mz alwx rngeng amrlx Kcng tzatrkatilr ninge.
Murde opxpe mz mzke' nzvz-rbr-krngeng. X plzpxbo nzesablqti-zvz-krnge nim,
X myapxbz nim kc tqxpqbrlr-ngrne Mz nzrnzlvzo-krnge Loukxtr scm. Delc, tubqq mz nzrpi-krme bange kx vz-rbrx, X mz nzyrlq-krm nzayrplapxngr ninge.
Mrlzm bange nzale-krnge alwx Murde mzli kc tqmncbe-ngrne mz nelz lxenge, alwx rnge ycpebz.
A' suti drtwrm kx nabznge navz-nqblqle nzmncngr angidr. Delc, na-alvztr-ngrn ninge murde nayrplapxx.
Wzti-angidrbz nabznge, Murde nzprki-krnge namyaszpxle nqbya r nrc.
Ipq ninge murde na-abrtzx, X drtwrnge kc tqavzbzme naelalz-mop.
Bzkq obqtrpeq nzmyakr drtqnge mz alwx rngeng, A' ipqpxbz alwx rngeng amrlx.
Gct, tekqtrpz nabznge murde natubqx, X amrnale mqngrnge murde navz-nqblqx nim.
Bzkq maszlrpx-ngrn ninge mz nzmnctr-krbo bam. X bzkq katxpxq nzokatrkr Mqngrm ninge.
Okatrp ninge murde na-abrtz-mou-ngrne nzarlapx-krm ninge, X drtqnge navq mz nzvz-nqblqngr natqm.
Zbz sa na-alvztrpo nqmq krmqng mz kxdrka'-ngrng, Murde nayzlu-mopwzlr bam.
Gct, bzkq ayzlu-mope' bange nzrnibq-krnge ncblo, Murde na-angrlvzx nim mz nzarlapx-krm lc ninge.
Kxetu, okatrp ninge Murde naglqlz-ngrne nim nivz lrm.
Trabrtz-ngrwq nzangco-ngrm blz mz olta nyzm. A' blz kx mrlzbz bam nabz leplz kx avzo-lzbq x plzpxle alwx ngrdeng. Delc trna-angco-ngrpwc'u blz mz olta nyzm, A' avzo-lzbq-zvztxpwo bam.
<range>
Krka'-ngrbo bam kx naokatrpe' nigr leplz nemqng Mz nzamqngi-mou-krgr drkq ngr Jerusalem.
Murde nzangco-krmgr blz mz olta nyzm navzpxm mz nzka-lzbq-krbzkr bam. X krlc blz kxtubq mz nzobq-krm.


Kxmule-esz' nim ncblo kxetu kxmatq, a' bzkq glqpx-lzbqq mz da kxtrka kcng tqaleq, Murde Gct vz zvz nzangidati-krde natqde.
A' ryrlq-zvzq drtwr kx na-atrkati-ngrn leplz. X mzli kc tqycmne-ngrn, natqm apule toki kx malc, mz nzpibqti-krm nidr.
Nzmrlz-zlwz-krbz da kxtrka bam myaszpxle da kxmrlz. X mz drtwrm, nzpokia-krm myaszpxle nzrpi-krm da angidr.
Nim Mepokia, X abrtz-zvz-ngrn nzaetq-krbzme drtq leplz mz natqmqng.
Delc sa nakilzpx-ngrm Gct nim ma nyzm mz nzodati-alope-krde nim. X sa na-ayrkrpxbzle nzlu-krm mz nrlc ka.
X kxnztubqng sa na-amrlue-ngrdr Gct nzayrplapx-krde nim. X sa nayrpalelvzlr nim mz nzrpi-krdr kx,
“Mcamu ena ncblo kc trmnc-xgleleu Gct. A' axplr-lzbq mz nzatrkati-krde leplz x nztwz-krde trau kxkqlu mz zmatq ngrde.”
A' ninge sa na-apux nc olivi kc dzbrde tqtu-amqngi mz nzmncpx-krmc Mangr-nzangiongr, Murde vz zvz nzbrtikr drtwrnge nzaodu-alokr Gct.
Delc Yawe, sa na-awi-zvz-ngrbo bam da kcng tqaletiqng. X sa napipxbo mz leplz nemqng nzmrlz-zlwz-krm.

Leplz kx nzngqngung mz drtwrdr nzrpilr kx, “Trpnzngr Gct.” Leplz lcng nzvz-rbrng x nzale-txpwzng da kxtrka zlwz. Trpnzngr leplz lcng kxtubq.
Gct mncom Heven, x sc tqmcomle leplz amrlx, Mz nzmc-krde neke yrplapx mz nzrtangrti-krde nide.
A' nzesablqtilr Gct amrlx ngrdr x drtwrdr esz'ti mz nzale-krdr da kxtrka. Trpnzngr nidr kxesz' kxtubq.
Delc tqrpingr Gct kx, “Leplz lcng tztrkang tznibqtitxdr leplz nengeng Nzapulr kx nzrnibqng da kx nangqdr. X mrbrtr mz drtwrdr nzkrka'-krmlr bange. ?Myx kxmule, trnzkrlzlru da kxtubq?”
A' mzli ka nzmwxlr-zlwz-krdr myaszpxpele mzli kc. Murde Gct sa napxtxpx-ngrde enqmi rgung. X drtqdr sa namya mz nzaovxio-alo-krgu nidr. X namz ngrdr sa narlxbuliane-ngrbz Gct mz nrlc.
Sutitx zlwz drtwrnge kx Gct rgu kc Saeon na-arlapxle leplz nedeng. Murde mzli kc nayzlu-mou-ngrmle, namnc-zpwxku badr. X nigu lr Jekop drtwrgu sa naelalzm. X nigu lr Israel sa na-abrtz-ngrgu da lc.


Gct, arlapx ninge mz zmatq ngr drtqm, X aelwzpx-ngrbz nztubq-krnge mz nztu-krbzme mz nibrnge.
Xlrm natqnge Mz nzkrka'-krbo bam.
Kxnzaetqng drtq nzglqpx-lzbqng nzrpilr natzlr ninge, X krkcng tzxpqbrlr-ngrdr nim, nzrpilr nanibqlr ninge.
A' nim Gct kx okatr-zvzle ninge, Mz nzngini-krm Kxetu rnge kc tqmnc-xgle-zvzx.
Yawe Gct, ayzlu-mopwz badr da kxtrka kcng tzwaisr-ngrdr ninge. X nibq nidr murde nim kx brti drtwr.
Zbz sa na-abrtzlvzx nzrka-krbo bam blz mz olta nyzm. X na-awi-ngrbo bam nzmrlz-zlwz-krm.
Murde arlapxq ninge mz nzkxpu-krngeng amrlx, X okatrq ninge mz nzaovxio-krnge enqmi rngeng.

Gct, xlrm nzkrka'-krbo bam. X bzkq drtqm satrp nzycmne-krbo bam.
Lalztqm bange x ayzlum natqnge, Murde nabznge tropxpeu mz nztalvzo-krde.
Enqmi rngeng nzrkatrpqng bange nzkxpungr, Mz nzxngitr-krnge nzycmne-kato-krdr, Mz nzrnzlvzo-krdr ninge, X nzobq-krmlr bange mz zngya.
Nelznge vzdz-zlwzm, Murde ycpe pipz nzbz-krnge.
Rnrcti-lzbqpenge mz zmwxlr, X nrkrdrtqnge esz'pe-ngrde.
X rpix mz drtwrnge kx, “Nzmu nabxnge naycbzle, da kc tqwai bona, Nalvcx x nartangrx me namnc-zpwx-ngrne.
Nalvctr-rlrux lzke, X namnc-lrpix esz'-krnge mrlcde.
Na-anitxpwo nzrtangrti-krnge me narlakitrx Mz tewa x nounenq.”
Kxetu, akipx kxdrka'-ngrng mz nzarlxlvrti-krbzme natqdr. Murde nzota-zvzng x nznani-lzbq-zvzng mz mztea.
Mz nrlckxngrlx x nrlckxbq Mztea esz'tx-ngrpwz nzxpqbrlrngr lou x nzkxpungr.
Nzodangr prtz-zvzm mrlcng kqlu mz mztea. X me nzamwangr da tresakipxpuu nzpokiangr x nzangqngutingr leplz.
Kztenge, mzli kc ryapwx-angidrki mz nzodu-krgi, X vztr-lxblrki mz Mangr-nzangiongr Gct. A' mzli ka trngiu enqmi rnge kc tqxtrnga-ngrde ninge, A' krlc nim, kc tqmuki me esz' x line-zvzki. X trngiu kxpxtxpx-ngrde ninge kc tqyrpalelvzle ninge, A' krlc nim, mrlxkztenge. Mz nzatrkatikr enqmi rnge ninge Nabznge trtalvzou x krlzx nzmnc-kapqngr, A' nzamwa-krm lc ninge, kx mzlenge, Delc tqvztx-zlwzngr drtwrnge.

<range>
Gct, ayrkrpx-anibz enqmi lcng nabzdr x nzao-krdr drtwrdr tqdrka'ngr, Murde napwrkilvc-ngrdr nzbz-krdr.
Yawe, mzli kc nayrni-ngrbo bam, Krlzx kx sa na-arlapxq ninge.
Murde sa naxlrme natqnge mz nourla, bea, x mz nrlckxbq, Mz nzkalz-zvz-krbo bam nzlckr drtwrnge x nztalvzokr nabznge.
Kxmule-esz' enqmi rngeng nzkqlung, a' mzli kcpe naota-ngrgr badr, Sa na-amnc-zpwxq ninge mz mzlirdr.
Murde nim Gct kc nzaclve-krde tqyc tqyc. X sa na-ayzlume natqnge lcng mz nzaovxio-krm nidr mz nzotangr. Murde nzpxtxpx-ngrdr nztekqtr-krdr nqmq krdr, X trnzamrlue-kzlru nim.
Mrlxkztenge lc, mzli kc nigr badr dzbede kxesz', a' mzli ka yrlqpx-lzbq mz nzesz'tikr drtwrgr badr. A' se tqrtwztipele nigr zngya tqotapekr badr.
Nzprlxpx-krde nivz narpi-ngrbz nide ncblo ngrde, A' mz nabzde la poi kx mu ncblo. Mz nzycmne-krde nide pakrle, A' natqdeng malc apule toki r vea.
Yawe, napipxbzkr nzkxpu-krgrng bam, murde nalolvz-amqngiq nigr. X tr-rlrpx-ngrwq leplz kxnztubqng nzaxtx-krbzlr nzlxngiti-krdr nim.
Murde sa nartco-ngrn mz gq lrdr Krkcng tzrnibqng x tzpokiang, Mzli lc tznginibe-ngrdr obla. A' sa na-abrtr-zvzbo drtwrnge bam.

Yawe, nayc mz drtwrm ninge. Murde enqmi rngeng nzkqlu-zlwzng. X vz zvz nzmaneuti-krdr ninge x nzatrkati-krdr ninge, Murde nzrpilr na-aovxiolr ninge mz nzrnzlvzo-krdr ninge.
<range>
A' mzli kznike mwxlr-ngrne, Abrtrpo drtwrnge bam.
Trmwxlrtiwxu zmatq ngrdr murde abrtrpo drtwrnge mz natqm, Nim Gct kc tqglqlz-zvzx.
Yawe, enqmi rngeng vz zvz nzrtangr-krdr drtwr kx na-atrkati-ngrdr ninge, Mz nzrkatr-zvz-krmlr nzkxpungr bange.
X nzyrlwr-lxblrng me nzmnc-kapq-ngrdr, Mz nzaukzti-krdr ninge, murde nanibqlr ninge.
Bzkq rlr-ngrbzme nzdwa-krdr, A' ayrplapxng mz zngya ngr drtwrm.
Krlz-angidrq nzrkrkxkr drtqnge. Murde aplxtipxpeq nztaliokr drlemzke' amrlx, mz nzyrtio-krmlr mz buk scm.
X krlz-zpwxx kx mz nzkqle-krnge nim, sa navzme x enqmi rngeng nadwaszlr ninge. Murde tu-zvzme mz nibrnge.
Trmwxlrtiwxu zmatq ngrdr murde abrtrpo drtwrnge mz natqm, Yawe, nim Gct kc tqglqlz-zvzx, x brti drtwrnge natqm amrlx.
<range>
X sa na-alebo bam da kcng tqpibo, Mz nzrka-krbo blz ngr nzawingr.
Awi mz nzarlapx-krme ninge mz mq enqmi rngeng. Murde trpnzngr nznibq-krdr ninge, X trmetxpou badr. Gct nawztr-zvzbo bam, nzmnc-krnge mz nrlc.

Gct, nayc mz drtwrm ninge mz nzaelwa-krme bange nzmrlz-esz'ngr-krm, Murde mnc-xglex nim mz nzmnc-zpwx-krnge mz mzlir nzkxpungr kxtrka. X na-apux nei bona kc tqmnclzbz mz nabx lxede, Mz nztu-krme mz nibrnge, navz navz mzli kx ayrkrpx-ngrn nzodangr.
Gct, myalz-esz'ngrn, x sa nakqlex nim, Murde angidati-zvzq me pnz drtwrm mz nzmnc-krnge.
Sa na-ayzlume natqnge Heven mz nzarlapx-krm ninge. X na-amyatibzme drtq krkcng tzrnzlvzolr ninge. Murde aodu-zvzq ninge, X angidati-zvzq natqm.
Nztu-ngalelvzlr ninge ncblo ngr nzodangr. Spiz x nipna scdr nzapulr nqngi kx malc, X natqdr nzaetq-krdr drtq apule nzrluplxtikr toki r vea.
Lr Heven namclr nzmyalz-esz'ngr-krm. X lr nrlc namclr nzaovxio-krm.
Kxmule-esz' nabznge talvzo zlwz murde enqmi rngeng nzrtxtiolr ninge br, A' awi Gct, kx naprtz-moung mz trtxki kx nzamwiti-ngrdr ninge.
Sa na-angrlvzx nim mz nabznge atwrnrngr mz nzayrni-krbo gita bam. Murde abrtr-zvzbo drtwrnge bam. Nilz r nepi adwalzmle ninge mz zbq kang kqlu. A' mz nzdwalz-krmc mz nourla kx topwz, Na-apule nabz nenge adwalzmle nepi, Mzli lc naglqlzpex nim.
<range>
Kxetu, sa na-awibo bam mz mzlir lr mrkzbleng, X na-angrlvzx nim mz mzlir neidung.
Murde nzaodu-zvz-krm myalz krlzlzle bongavz, X nzangidati-zvz-krm natqm.
Lr Heven namclr nzmyalz-esz'ngr-krm, X lr nrlc namclr nzaovxio-krm.

?Kxnzetung, myx kxmule, nzaclve-krmu tubq, X rsakrlrngr angidr?
Trtingr! Murde yrlqamu drtwr kx atrkatile leplz nemung, Mz nzaetq-krbzmu drtqdr mz nrlc ka.
Nimu kxdrka'-ngrng. X ale-zvzamu da kxtrka, Yzuo pnz mzli kc tzmcngr mzpu.
Apuamu ningidoe kcng tzrmakxng Mz nzatrkati-krmu leplz.
X apu-kzamu kxnradrtqdr ngq murde pxtxpx-zvz-ngrnamu nzxlr-krmu nzyrni-krdr, X nzayzlu-krbzmu natqdr.
Yawe, ayrplapx leplz lcng tzapulr ningidoe, mz nzyrvilz-krme nipna scdr. X mz nzapu-krdr poi kz peto, taglctr-kzpz nqngidr.
Mrlzvxitx nzbatr-krbzme nzmyakr nipna scdr, X nzmrbr-krdr na-apule lue kc tqmrbrlqo mz drtc'.
X mrlzvxi kz nzapu-krdr zwqwq r wagq kc tqlrprnebz mq mz nzngrla-krde x mz nibrde sc tqmrbrpe mou mz nztiokr nepi le. X na-apu-kzlr itoto kx bz murde nzmika mzli kc tqpoobe-ngrde.
Gct, mzli kc tzlube-ngrdr, apusrngr nidr nabr kc tzikzti, Mz nzodati-krm nidr mz zngya ngr drtwrm.
Zbz nigr kxnztubq nemqng sa na-abrtz-zlwz-ngrgr nznibqti-krm kxdrka'ngr lcng. X sa naelalvzkr nzyrlekr mepyr ngrdr.
X sa napibzkr bam kx, “Gct, da zpwxtx! Sa nakabzme da kxmrlzting mz leplz kxnztubqng, Murde nzaclve-krm lr nrlc tubq-esz'ngr.”

Gct rnge, arlapxbz ninge mz enqmi rngeng, X tum mz nibrnge mzli kc naoti-ngrmlr ninge.
Arlapx ninge mz kxdrka'ngr lcng, Tzkrlzlr nzrnibqngr leplz.
Yawe, obqm! Ncblo lcng tzyrlwr-lxblrng nanibqlr ninge. A' trpnzngr da kxtrka kx alebo badr.
Kxmule-esz', a' se tzoliqtilr nztz-krdr ninge. Tulzm x vzm mz nzokatr-krm ninge.
Yawe, nim Gct kc tqrninr, Gct r lr Israel. Dwalzm mz nzayrplapx-krm lr mrkzbleng. X bzkq ycngr drtwrm krkcng tzryrlqng drtwr kxtrka.
Nzyzluti-zvzmlr mztea mzli kc milzpq, Nzapulr kuli kzpeto kcng tzkclwzng mz nzvzne-krdr mztea.
Drtwrdr nzamqmqlr x natqdr nzapulr toki r vea kxmalc. Mz drtwrdr nzrpilr trpnzngr kx rkrlztrpz x trpnzngr nzayrplapxngr nidr.
A' nim Yawe, yrpalelvzq kxnzmnc-mrbr lcng, X xtrnga-ngrn nidr.
Gct rnge, abrtr-zvzbo drtwrnge mz nzxplr-krm, Murde nim lrpalvc nyznge.
X krlzx kx sa na-aovxiox enqmi rngeng, Murde naokatrq ninge mz nzaodu-zvz-krm.
Yawe, nim temz ngr lomrgr kc tqyrputrngr nipna. Nibqti nidr, murde leplz nengeng nadcpx mz drtwrdr Kx nim Gct kc tqayrplapxle kxnzaleng alwx. Aodaliti nidr mz zmatq ngrm, murde nataong mz drtc'.
Batrpz mz nzglqpx-lzbq-krdr nzatao-mou-krde nidr. Murde mz nzycmne-krdr natqdrng ngi dalr alwx, mz nzrpibqtingr x nzpokiangr.
Odati nidr mz nzmilxtxo-krm nidr mz zngya ngr drtwrm. Murde leplz nakrlzlr kx nim Gct kc tqaclvele lr Israel x lr nrlc tulvzo.
Nzyzluti-zvzmlr mztea mzli kc milzpq, Nzapulr kuli kzpeto kcng tzkclwzng mz nzvzne-krdr mztea.
Nzrtangrng nadr dakxnzng me yctxpqng, X drtwrdr nzamqmqlr mz trnzkrlc-kru nelzdr.
A' sa nangr-kato-zvzx mz nourla kang kqlu, Mz nzpipx-krnge zmatq ngrm x nzaodu-zvz-krm. Murde apu-zvzme bange lrpalvc nyznge Kxrlakitrx mz mzli r nzkxpungr.
Sa na-angrlvz-zvzx nim, Gct kc tqaodu-zvzle ninge. Murde nim lrpalvc nyznge kx xplr-esz'ngr.


Gct, mz nzngyatikr drtwrm nigr, drtqm satrpem bagr. X batrpeme mz enqmi rgrng nzprtr-krmlr mz nzawxo-krdr bz ngr nrlc nyzgr. Nzatrkati-krdr nigr apule nengq mz nzaglqwiti-krde drtc'. X da amrlx trnzaxvctrpeung. Dea-ngrgr vznepe mz nzvzne-krgr apukr ncblo kxnzrmnqng, Mz nzaetqtitx-zlwz-krbzme drtqgr, nigr leplz nemqng. A' suti drtwrgr nayzlu-mopwe' bagr Mz nzamrlz-mou-krm drtc' nyzgr, murde namnc-zpwx-moukr.
<range>
<range>
Nim Ngrlrvea ngrgr. Glalzm nc nqngq bagr, nigr kcng tzamrluelr nim, Murde navzmgr bam mz nztu-mou-krgr me esz'.
Mz zmatq ngrm, arlapx nigr kcng tqaodu-zvzq, X ayzlu-ngrm natqgr.
Gct, natqmqng nzvzpxmqng mz Mangr-nzangiongr, mz nzrpi-krdr kx, “Mzli kc na-aovxio-ngrne, sa na-akipxbo mz leplz nengeng Drtc' kcng mz nrlar LueJodzn rlilr.
Murde neidu lr Gilead nengeng. X nqvi lr Manase nenge-kzng. X neidu lr Efrem tum mz nibrnge. X nqvi lr Judz kx na-aclve-zvzng mz zmatq rnge.
A' enqmi rmung trna-aovxiolru nimu. Murde lr Moab sa nawztrpqng bange X lr Edom sa nametxmqng bange. X sa namalqlvzx nzmilxtxo-krnge lr Filistia.”
?Myx kxmule, sa na-atutrq natqm lc mz nzokatr-krm ninge Nzprtr-krnge mz lrpalvc ngr mzteadau nyzdr lr Edom?
Murde mzli kc pxtxpxpe-ngrn nigr, X trokatrwq ami negr mz nzotangr.
Gct, okatrp nigr mz nzota-krgr badr enqmi rgrng mzli ka. Murde mane nzmnc-xgle-krgr ncblo nzarlapx-krdr nigr.
X krlzkr kx mz nzmnc-krme bagr, Sa narnzlvzokr enqmi rgrng mz nzokatr-krm.

Gct, xlrm nzyrni-krnge, X lalztqm mz nzkrka'-krnge.
Kqlex nim murde mncx esz'-krnge, x nabznge talvzo zlwz. Vzmibz ninge mz butqbr kxmqngi.
Murde nim lrpalvc nyznge, Me rlakitrx mz mq enqmi rngeng.
Rlr-ngrm bange nzmncpx-alo-krmc mz ma nyzm. Murde na-apux nei kio kx mnc-kapqlzbz mz nabx lxede.
Gct, abrtzlvzq nzesalz-krnge nzangrlvz-zvz-krnge nim. Murde krlc takitrde leplz kcng tzamrluelr nim.
Kam bange nzlungr kxboi, ninge king nem, Murde nzmnc-krnge navz zvz.
Okatrp ninge mz nzaclve-angidr-krnge leplz nengeng mz nzmnclz-krbo mz zmatq ngrm. Ayrbqpx ninge mz nzaodu-zvz-krm ninge x nzangidati-krm natqm.
Delc na-angrlvz-zvzx nim, Mz nzale-krnge da kc tqesalz-ngrbo bam.

Gct txpwz kx mnc-xgle-zvzx mz nabznge, Murde nzmnc-zpwx-krnge vzpxm bade.
Nide butqbr nyznge x mevalu rnge. Nide lrpalvc nyznge kx tu-amqngio-ngrne.
Delc nimu kxdrka'-ngrng bzkq tz-zvzpeamu ninge mzli ka trxplrpewxu. X bzkq apusr-ngrnamu ninge nzawxo-krmu ma kx blzlongr.
Ryrlqamu drtwr ngr nzapotxo-krmamu ninge me matq kc tqmnco-ngrmc. X abrtzlvzamu nzpokiatitr-krmu ninge. Murde nivz lr naomu prlxmamu bange, A' mz nabzmu la, ngyati drtwrmu ninge.
Gct txpwz kx mnc-xgle-zvzx mz nabznge, Murde nzmnc-zpwx-krnge vzpxm bade.
Nide butqbr nyznge kx abrkitrx drtwrnge. Nide lrpalvc nyznge kx tu-amqngio-zvz-ngrne.
Nzarlapx-krnge x nzmrlue-krnge yctr txpwz bade, Mz nzngini-krde butqbr nyznge kxmqngi kx rlakitrx.
Leplz nengeng, mz nzangidati-krbzle da kx yc mz drtwrmu, na-abrtxtrpwzmu drtwrmu bade. Murde nide txpwz me rlakitrku.
A' bzkq brti drtwrmu leplz, murde nigu amrlx apu-txpwzku zsikapu, Kxmule-esz' nigu kxnzetung o leplz txneng. Murde nzmu na-arsakrlrku nzmrlekr Gct x nigu, Nide kx mrle txpwz, a' nginigu da-nrbalq.
X mz nzrtwz-krmu da kx suti drtwrmu, bzkq brti drtwrmu nzamwxlr-krmu leplz x nzpna-krmu dztudrng. X kxmule-esz' nimu bcnyrng, bzkq abrtrpzmu drtwrmu mz trau scmu.
A' na-amqtrku drtwrgu mz nzxlr-krgu natq lcng. Murde Gct txpwz kc tqmatq.
X da kx myapxbz, nzaodu-krde nigu tresakiu. Rpimle kx, “Mzli lcde, nzayzlu-krbo da mz doa navz-nqblqle da kx aleleng mz nrlc ka.”

Gct rnge, rtangrtix nim. Murde nim kc tqbatrple nzesatxpx-zpwxkr drtwrnge. Apux ncblo kx drtwrde brlxkz x mzte tclvr mrkc lzke, Mz nzsutitx-zlwzkr drtwrnge nzmnctr-krbo bam.
Suti drtwrnge nzxngi-krbo nzulrm Mangr-nzangiongr Mz nzmc-krnge zmatq x zluli rm.
Nzkrlz-krnge nivz lrm myaszpx-zlwzle nzlu-krnge mz nrlc. X glqlz-zvzx nim mz nzaodu-zvz-krm ninge.
X sa na-awi-zvzbo bam Mz nzglalz-krbo mqnge mz nzkrka'-krbo bam.
Drtwrnge sa naesatxpx zpwx nzmnctr-krbo bam. X sa na-angrlvzx nim mz nabz kxyrlvi.
Mz nrlckxbq kang kqlu aoti zvz drtwrnge nim, Vz vz nrlc ngrlxtxpx.
X angrlvzx nim mz nzabrtzngr Murde okatr-zvzq ninge x tu-zvzme mz nibrnge.
Mnc-amqngitrpo bam, X lolvz-amqngiq ninge mz mqm kx xplr.
A' ayrkrtxong mz drtc' Krkcng tzrpilr nanibqlr ninge.
Nibqting nidr mz vea, Murde kuli kzpeto nangqtilr namz ngrdr.
X ninge, king nem, sa na-abrtzlvzx nim, Murde ngi-batrpe' nzaovxio-krnge. X krkcng tzabrtrpzlr drtwrdr bam, sa nabilvzlr nim. Murde sa nangi-batrpzme mz kxnzpokiang nzmnc-lrpi-krdr.

Gct, kxputxpex. Xlrm nzkrka'-krnge. Mwxlrti-zlwzx enqmi rngeng. Arlapx ninge.
Tum mz nibrnge murde kxdrka'-ngrng nzyrlqng drtwr Mz nzesabrti-krdr ninge.
Nzxngitrkr leplz nzycmne-krdr apule nzrlakikr toki r vea kx malc. X nzpnz-krdr leplz mz natq kxtrka apule nipna.
Nzmnc-kapqng mz nzpnz-krdr kxnztubqng mz natq ngr nzpokiangr. X trnzmwxlrung nzaniti-krdr nzatrkati-krdr nidr.
Nzapqtrlr drtwrdr mz drtwr kxtrka kx nzyrlqlr. X nzamyatxlzpwzlr nzrkrlzkr leplz, Mz nzrpi-lxblr-krdr kx, “Na-amwiku trtxki mz nzesabrti-krgu leplz. X nzbrngztio-krgu lc da kxvz-rbr trpnzngr kx narmc x kx narkrlzti.”
<range>
A' Gct sa na-ayrplapx-anile nidr, na-apule kx pnzle nidr mz nipna scde. X napwrkilvc-ngrdr nztupekr nipna ngrdr.
Sa na-atrkatile nidr murde nzrpiting natq kxtrka. X sa nayrpalelvzng krkcng tzrmcng nidr.
X leplz amrlx sa namwxlrtilr Gct. X sa na-aoti drtwrdr da kxmatq kc tqaleleng x nayapwxtipxlr.
Leplz kxnztubqng sa na-abrtzlvzlr Yawe x sa na-abrtrpzlr drtwrdr bade. Leplz kx nabzdr lq sa na-awibzng bade.

Gct, nzglqlz-krgr nim Jerusalem tubq-esz'ngr, X rpikr na-atutr-zpwxkr nzesalz-krbzkrng bam.
Murde xlrme nzkrka'-krgr, Mz nzmnc-xgle-krgr nim.
X kxmule-esz' nzvz-rbr-krgrng nzmrilvzlr nigr, A' ipqpx zvz alwx rgrng amrlx.
Namrlz-ngrmle bagr, nigr kcng tqmcpxqng X tqvzmitrqng Mangr-nzangiongr nim. Murde sa namnc-zpwxkr Mz nzrtwzngr da kxmrlzting mz ma nyzm.
Mevalu rgr, mzli kc tqyrni-ngrbzkr bam, ayzlume natqgr Mz nzbatr-krme nzaovxio-krgr. Lr mrkzbleng nzmncng drtc' x trmctu mz nrlc tulvzo. X sc tzabrtr-kzpzlr drtwrdr bam.
Murde mz nzxplr-krm atulzq newz kxetuting, Mz nzaelwapx-krm nzmyalzkr zmatq ngrm.
Aoq nrwx mz nzyclwzkr srkau x aesakiq nzyrpukr natq nrc. X amnc-nabuq leplz kcng tzxpqbrlr-ngrdr nim.
Nzamrluengr nim mz nzetukr zmatq ngrm. X mz nrlc tulvzo nzmalqlvzlr da kcng tqaleqng.
Gct, aclve-angidrq nrlc mz nzadc-krm tewa, Murde dakxnzng nalvc angidr mz drtc'.
Tewa lc tqayayrtile drtc' nyzgr, Murde da kx petikr mz nrlanc nyzgr nalvcpulzmqng.
Ycngr dakxnzng kxkqlu mrkcng amrlx tqvzkiq. X bxli scgrng yrbuti zvz mz da kxmrlzting.
X abrtz-zlwz-ngrgr Nzmc-krgr nzplckr nra nounc nyzgrng.
Angrlvzkr nzyrlvzbqtikr animol negrng, X malqkr murde nrlanc nyzgrng brtipeng x ycpe pipz nzrkqlzngr.
Lr nrlc amrlx Namalqlvzlr Gct,
Mz nzangrlvz-krdr nzmyalzkr drtqde, X mz nzglqlz-krdr nide mz nabz kxyrlvi.
X narpibzku bade kx, “Da amrlx kcng tqaleqng nzkctitxpxng. X enqmi rmqng nzmetxpebzng bam mz nzetu-zlwzkr zmatq ngrm.
X lr nrlc amrlx nzangiolr nim, Mz nzglqlz-krdr nim x nzarmyalz-krdr drtqm.”
Nadcpx mz drtwrgu da kx nzkctipxng, Kcng tqalemqng Gct bagu, nigu leplz nedeng.
Akipxle Prla Bla x aesakile nzyrlekr LueJodzn Mz nzyrlq-krbzle me mingrng kx navzki melrmqgung. X mzli ka na-awi-ngr-kzpzku bade da lcng.
Murde aclve-alole mz zmatq ngrde. X yrlq zvz mzte lr mrkzbleng murde ma tzglqpx-lzbqng mz nzxpqbrlr-krdr nide.
A' nimu lr mrkzbleng naglqlz-kzamu Gct rgr, Mz nzangrlvz-kato-krmu nide.
Murde nide kc tqaclve-zvzbzle nzlu-krgr, X tr-rlrpx-ngrdeu nzaovxiokr enqmi nigr.
Gct, kxmule-esz' atubqtipeq nigr, kx nabzgr nalqngi, Mz nzapu-krgr silvz kc tqyrleni, x zblqki rde navztx.
X kxmule-esz' rlrpx-ngrn nzesabrtingr nigr, X batrpzme nzrglq-krgr da kx mrlepu.
X kxmule-esz' rlr-ngrbzme mz enqmi rgrng nzrnzbrti-krdr nigr, X vztrkr mz nabz nzkxpungr Kx apule nyr x nrc kxoda, A' mzli ka sc tqyzlumipe-mope' nigr me na-arlapx-ngrgr.
X ayzlu-kzpe' natqnge mz mzlir nzkxpu-krngeng, X delc naka-ngrbo bam da kcng tqpibo. Rtwzmc animol kxncblongr kx oliqtix mz olta nyzm, Mz nzangc-krbzlr bam mz Mangr-nzangiongr. Murde zsikapu ngrdr navzdzbz, Nangi dalr nzawi-krbo bam.
<range>
<range>
Nimu amrlx kcng tzangiolr Gct, lalztqmamu bange, Mz nzpi-krbo bamu da kcng tqalemleng bange.
Mz nzbrtikr drtwrnge nide, krka'bo bade, Mz nzoliqti-krnge nzawi-krbo bade mz nzayzlu-krmle natqnge.
X ayzlu-zpwxmle natqnge murde plztipxbo alwx rngeng. A' rblx nzxlr-krde nzkrka'kr doa kx nabzde blqki.
<range>
Awitx-zlwzbo mz Gct murde trpx-ngrdeu nzkrka'-krnge, X trpx-kz-ngrdeu nzaodu-krde ninge.

Gct, nayc mz drtwrm nigr, Mz nzamrlz-krm x nzokatr-krm nigr.
Murde lr nrlc nakrlz-zpwxlr nqmq krm Mz nzarlapx-krm nigr.
Mrlz neidung amrlx nzglqpx-krdr nim, X na-awi-ngrbzlr bam!
Mrlz lr mrkzbleng amrlx nzangrlvz-krdr nim, Murde nzaclve-krm nidr tubq mz nzmailz-krm.
Mrlz neidung amrlx nzglqpx-krdr nim, X na-awi-ngrbzlr bam!
Gct rgu amrlzle nigu, Mz nzrkqlzngr dakxnzng.
X sa na-amrlz-zvzle nigu, Murde leplz amrlx na-amrluelr nide.

Mz nzvz-krm Gct, enqmi rdeng nzodalitipeng. X kxnzpxtxpx-ngrdr nide nzdwaszlr nide.
Milxtxole nidr mz nzapu-krdr zsikapu kc tqwqplx nenq. X nibqtile kxdrka'-ngrng mz nzapu-krdr kadol kc tqyrle mz nzngc-krde.
A' nigu kxnztubqng abrtzlvzku nzmnc-aepztr-krbzku bade, Mz nzbilvz-krgu x nzmalqlvz-krgu nide mz nzelangr.
Naglqlzku Gct mz nzangrlvz-krgu drtqde. Na-amyalzku nide kc tqvoom mz dcbz. Drtqde Yawe x na-abrtz-ngrgu nzmnctr-krbzku mz mzte.
Gct mnc Mangr-nzangiongr. Apubzle trte mz doa kxnzbzszng x aclve-kzle olvz kx nzbzszng ncblo ngrdr.
Kxnzmncng esz'-krdr amnctr-lxblr-kzleng mz neidung, X kx drtqdr tropxu vzmi-kzleng Murde namnc-zpwxng. A' krkcng tzesablqtilr nide, avzpx-nrbalqleng.
Mz nzrlaszkr leplz ne Gct Ijipt, vzmitrleng lzke. X mz nzmailz-krde nidr, mncpxm mz nyr x dcbz.
Nide Gct r lr Israel kc tqaelwapxle zmatq ngrde mz Newz Saenae. Murde mz nzvz-krmle, nengq x tewa kxnzetung nzvz-kzpqng.
Gct avzo-ngrmle tewa, Murde na-alu-moule drtc' nyzde kc tqmingrpe.
Neidu lrde kxtrnzrngiscung amncleng mz drtc' lc, Mz nzrka-krbzle badr da kx nzmnctxpx-ngrdr.
Kxetu rgu Gct kapxle natq Kx olvz kxnzkqlung napipxlr nrpa lcde seng,
“King x ami nedrng nzdwang. X nigr olvz akitikr dztu enqmi kcng tztwz ncblo ngr vea negrng.
Akitikr da kxlqngi kxlqlwx kx nzwzngr mz silvz x gol. ?Myx kxmule, kzdung nimu ncblo trnzprtr-ngrdru mz vea?
Murde Gct kc tqrninr milxtxole king kcng, X namz ngrdr nztwzbene-krdr apule lrdz kx lvxlz nrc mepz.”
Mzli kc King Devet tqyrlq-ngrde Mzteadau nyzde mz Newz Saeon, Newz Basan apule ncblo kx angya drtwrde nzyckr Mzteadau mrlc. A' Devet ayzlubzle natqde mz nzrpi-krbzle kx, “Newz Basan, kxmule-esz' matq-esz'ngrn x myatxlzq, X nra nyzmqng ngi rtrngr,
A' bzkq obqszoq newz kc tqmcpx Yawe kx namnc-ngrde, Murde sa namnc alo elr.”
Gct vom mz siu ngr sariot scdeng, Mz nzprpx-krmle mz Newz Saenae x nzprtr-krde Mangr-nzangiongr.
Kxetu vzdz-ngrde wq, X aovxiole enqmi kxkqlu. X nzkabzlr da bade, mz nzmetx-krbzlr bade, Kxmule-esz' kxnzxpqbrlr-ngrdr nide mzli kc.
Naglqlzku Kxetu kc tqatu-amqngile nigu mz zbq kang kqlu. Murde nide Mevalu rgu.
Gct rgu nide Gct kc tqarlapxle leplz. Yawe nide Kxetu kc tqkapxmle nigu mz mq enqmi rgung.
X sc tqtaputibzle nardr, Murde nzvz-rbr-zvzng.
Rpimle bagu kx, “Kxmule-esz' enqmi rmung nzdwalzng mz newz O drlve keng mz nzakitikr nrlc nidr, a' sa nayzlutibong.
Murde navznenamu mz nzrnzlvzo-krmu mepyr ngrdrng, X kuli nemqng drtwrdr naesatxpx zpwx mz nzrmnq-krdrle.”
Leplz amrlx nzmclr nzvztr-krmqng leplz neng Gct Mrkc Tqtr, Mz nzangrlvz-krdr Gct x King rdr.
Dzbe kxnzngrng nzrtwayzbzng, vz-nqblqbz olvi kx nzelang x nzayrlewzng nrasrpwale. X kxnzayrning gita nzrmnr-ngrmqng.
Kxmu nzngr-krdr nide sele, “Naglqlzku Yawe, nigu leplz nedeng, mz nzyrlwr-lxblr-krgu. Naglqlzku Yawe, nigu kcng tqngi nqvi lr Jekop.”
Neidu lcng tzvz-kzpqng, Benjamin, Judz, Sebyulon, x Naftzli. Neidu ne Benjamin krkc tqtopwz rtwayzbz badr, X mz nibrdr kxnzetung r Judz x leplz nedrng. X rmnr-ngrbz neidu kx nzmncomqng mz nort, kxnzetu r Sebyulon x Naftzli.
Gct, aelwapx-moungr zmatq ngrm, Kc tqaelwapx-ngrn tqokatr-ngrn nigr mzli kc.

Nimu lr nrlc amrlx, Nangrlvzamu Kxetu Gct.
Murde sc tqvzne mz bongavz, kc tqwz-ngrde mzli kc bqnc. X nzxplrkr natqde apule natq bzlrmei.

Gct, vz-anim mz nzarlapx-krm ninge. Kxetu, rnekim mz nzokatr-krm ninge.

Yawe Gct, trxplr-zvzwxu, x trpnzngr scnge zmatq. Vz-anim, kx Gct. Murde nim txpwz Mevalu rnge. Bzkq asaq nzokatr-krm ninge.

Gct, nzetukr nztubq-krm krlzlzle bongavz. X trpnz-moungr kx apule nim kc tqaleti da kxetuting.

Gct, vzm mz nzatubqti-krm drtwr kxnzobqszolr nim, Mz nzdcpxkr mz drtwrm kx nzxtrnga-zvz-ngrdr nim.
Bzkq mrbrtr mz drtwrm enqmi rmqng kx nznemi-zvzlr zngya mz nzatrkati-krdr nim. A' vzm mz nzawx-nabu-krm nidr mz natqdr.

Gct, awitx-ngrbzkr bam mz nzmnc-aepztr-krme bagr. Aleq da kxmrlzting. Gct, awitx-zlwzbzkr bam.
Gct rpile kx, “Yrlqpex mzli kx napipx-ngrne doa kx tubq x kx vz-rbr. X nzayzlu-krbo da badr narsakrlrngr.
Kxmule-esz' nrlc badr leplz ngrdeng nzrnrcng, A' sa nalolvz-amqngix nou nrlc.
Pibo mz kxnzglqpx-lzbqng kx bzkq nzglqpx-lzbqng Mz nzbilvz-krdr zmatq ngrdr. X pi-kzpo mz kxdrka'-ngrng kx bzkqpe nzarmyalz-lzbqng, Mz nzailvzo-krdr kztedrng.”
<range>
Murde trpnzngr me vzkipxm nzarmyalzngr Mrka mz nrlc.
A' Gct txpwz kx na-ayzlu-ngrbzle da mz leplz amrlx, Mz nzayrplapx-krde kxdrka'-ngrng x mz nzarmyalz-krde kxnztubqng.
Yawe ngyati zlwz drtwrde kxdrka'-ngrng. X mz nzayrplapx-krde nidr Na-apule kx rkabz badr kap ngr waen kx xplr. X mz nzmnq-krdrle trpnzngr kxpipz kx nayctxo, a' nayrkrtxlzm.
A' trtxpnzngr nzesakikr nzyapwxtine-krnge Gct r Jekop, X sa na-angrlvz-zvzx nide.
Murde rpile kx, “Sa naodatix zmatq ngr kxdrka'-ngrng, A' zmatq ngr kxnztubqng sa na-aetunepxbo.”

Lr Israel nzangiolr Gct. X drtqde nzkrlz-zlwzlr.
Ma nyzde tuom Jerusalem, Mz newz Saeon.
Mrlc dekc tqtwz-ngrde temz ngr lomr, toki r vea, x nipna scdr enqmi rdeng, Mz nzodati-krde dalr nzotangr amrlx.
Gct, nim Ngrlrvea kxmyatxlz zlwz. X myaszlzq newz kcng bqnc tzmyatxlzng.
Gct ngr Jekop, mzli kc tqpnanati-ngrn enqmi rmqng, Odatipeq zmatq ngr ncblo ngr vea nedrng x rblxbz badr nzotangr. Ncblo amrlx kcng tzvoneng mz hcsi x hcsi nedrng nztatio-lxblrng x nzbzng. Nibqtiq nidr amrlx x twzq dztudrng.
<range>
Delc leplz amrlx tzmyatitr-zlwz-ngrdr nim, Murde nzngyakr drtwrm trpnzngr kx nayatrpz.
Gct, mzli kc tqpio-ngrme Heven nzvz-rbrkr lr nrlc, Mz nzarlapx-krm kxnzobqszong, Lr nrlc lcng amrlx nzmwxlr-zlwzng X nzmnc-lrpitxng.
<range>
Leplz amrlx sa naglqlz-ngrdr nim Mz nzaovxio-krm enqmi rmqng kcng tzngyati drtwrdr nim. Murde ncblo ngr vea kcng trnibqtiwqng tzmetxbzng bam, Nzpipxbzlr kx nanginipedr ncblo nemqng.
Delc na-angidati-ngrgu da kx esalz-ngrbzku mz Yawe, Gct rgu. X lr mrkzbleng kcng tzesotrpzng nartwzmqng dztudrng kxmrlzvxing mz Gct kc tzmyatitr zlwz, murde aovxiole nidr.
Murde nide kc tqavzole kxnzetung. X king amrlx mz nrlc tzmwxlrti-zlwz-ngrdr nide.

Yrnibo mz Gct. Yrni-katobo bade murde naxlrmle natqnge.
Mzli ka tqkxpu-ngrne, glalzbo mqnge mz Kxetu. Kxmule-esz' krka'tix nzwr nrlckxbq, a' trxngipwc'u nzamqtr-ngrm drtwrnge.
Gct, kx aoti drtwrnge nim, nabznge ngrgo. X sc tqyrni-katopex mz nzetqkr drtqnge.
Nzkxpu-krngeng aobqtx-zvzle ninge mz nrlckxbq, X rblx-kzp bange nzycmnengr mz nztalvzokr nabznge.
Aoti drtwrnge zbq kcng pnz X yiz kcng bqnc.
X drtwrnge ao-zlwzx mz nrlckxbq. A' drtwrnge kc tqveabe kx,
?Myx kxmule, Kxetu sa napxtxpx-alope-ngrde nigr? ?X trpengr nzmrlzti-mou-krde nigr?
?Nzaodu-krde nigr sa nayrkrpx-alope? ?X nzesz'tikr drtwrgr badr naesakipe?
?Myx kxmule, Gct trnaycpeu mz drtwrde nigr? ?X nzngya-zlwzkr drtwrde mrilvzole nivz lrde?
Xngitxtr-zlwzx Gct kc tqmyalz-esz'ngr traelwapxpe-ngrpleu zmatq ngrde bagr.
Yawe, sa tqdcpx mz drtwrnge nqmq krmqng, X da kxnzkctipx kcng tqaletiqng mzli kc bqnc.
X sa na-aoti zlwz drtwrnge da kxmrlz kxetuting Kcng tqwz-ngrn mz zmatq ngrm.
Gct, nqmq krmqng amrlx tr-esz'ngr, X trpnz-moungr gct kx myaszpxle nim.
Nim txpwz Gct kc tqaleti da kxnzkctipxng, Mz nzbatr-krbzme mz lr mrkzbleng nzmc-krdr nzxplr-krm.
Arlapxpeq nqvi lr Jekop x Josip, murde nidr leplz nemqng, Mz nzaovxio-krm enqmi rdrng mz zmatq ngrm.
Gct, mzli kc tqvz-ngrme, prla rnrcti-lzbq, X wai-kzle meboo-ngrng.
X drtc' ycngrlrlzm mz trlipu. X zbo nzadclr tewa kxetu. X bzlrpc rpnakile nrlc apule nipna Mz nzpnamilxti-krde nrlc. X bzlrmei yrpu-zlile bongavz Mz nzpro-krm nounenq.
<range>
Kxmule-esz' trpnzngr kxrmc nabzlvz r nanycm x lrpzki rm, A' sc tqkawicpeq meboongr ngr Prla Bla.
X mailzq leplz nemqng mz nzapu-krdr sip, Mz mq Mosis x Eron.
Leplz nengeng, lalztqmamu mz nzalvztr-krnge, Mz nzxlr-angidr-krmamu natqngeng.
Sa naryapwxbo bamu mz nzycmne-ebzpxngr. X sa nayokaetipxbo dalr mzli kc bqnc kx trgalr kxrkrlz.
Da lcng tqxlrpeku x tqkrlzpeku Murde nzpipem melrmqgung bagu.
Bzkq yrlq-kapqbzkung mz doa negung, A' nayapwxtibzku badr.
Yawe yrlqbzle loukxtr scde mz lr Israel, Mz nzka-krbzle natqde mz nqvi lr Jekop. X rngidrlvz-ngrbzle mz melrmqgu lcng Kx na-alvztr-ngrdr doa nedrng mz lou lcng.
Murde nayrlqlr lou lcng, X na-alvztr-kzpzlr mz doa nedrng.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, nrpr ngr doa amrlx na-abrtrpzlr drtwrdr mz Gct, X na-aoti drtwrdr da kxnzkctipxng kcng tqalele mz nzvz-nqblq-krdr natqdeng.
X bzkq na-apulr melrmqdrng kcng nardr tqmqngi x tzxpqbrlr-ngrdr Gct. Trtegu lcng nabzdr bao x nzvecpx-lzbqmqng bade.
Mzli kc bqnc kzdung lr Israel, ncblo ngr vea nedrng nzoliq-angidrpeng mz popz' x nipna scdrng, A' mz zbq kc navecpengr, sc tzdwapeng.
Murde trnzatutrlru Nzesz'tikr Drtwrdr badr Gct, X nzpxtxpx-ngrdr lou scdeng.
Kxmule-esz' nzmcpelr zmatq ngr Gct, A' trmatqu mz drtwrdr da kxnzkctipxng kcng tqaleleng mrkc Ijipt.
<range>
Akipxle Prla Bla x mz nrlarde rlilr atule apule nztukr drkq, Mz nzmailzo-krde leplz nedeng elr.
X mz nzvz-krdr ngrlx, mailzle nidr mz dcbz, X nyr rtwayzbz badr mz nrlckxbq.
Mzli kc tzmnc-ngrdr lzke, amrplxtrpzle rplz Kx yrlepx-ngrm lue x ningali. Murde narmnqng x drtwrdr naesatxpx zpwx Mz lue lc tqkabzle badr, tqxplrm nzyrle-krde.
<range>
Kxmule-esz', a' vz zvz nzatrkati-krdr Gct kc tqmyalz-esz'ngr, Mz nzale-krdr alwx x nzxpqbrlr-ngrdr nide.
Mz nzmqngikr nabzdr nzabzlr nzatalzngr Gct, Mz nzka-krbzle dakxnzng kx naesapxngr drtwrdr.
Nzpibqtilr Gct, nzrpilr kx, “Kxmule-esz' luplxtrle rplz x lue yrlepx-katom elr, A' rblxbz bade nzrka-krmle nagu dakxnzng, Mz nzaclve-krde nigu leplz nedeng.”
<range>
Yawe kx xlrle kc nzycmne-krdr, drtwrde trmrlzlzpuu. X zngya ngr drtwrde kc tzapqtr-zlwzbzlr.
Murde trnzlxngitilru nide, X drtwrdr trnzabrtrpwzlru bade mz nzaclve-krde nidr.
Kxmule-esz', a' lvxpxbzle bongavz, Mz nzatwzlro-krmle badr dakxnzng ngr Heven.
<range>
X mzli lcde, leplz txneng nzmung dakxnzng nan enjrl, Mz nzangidati-krbz Gct zbrtale ngr nelzdr.
X mz zmatq ngrde kz Sc tqawqpele nenq tonga x trlaki.
X nenq lcng li nzrtwzmqng blzmr kio, X nzyrlwrne-krdr apule drta' ngr prla.
Kio lcng nztatiomqng mz drtc' O-ngalele ma nyzdrng.
Gct kabzle badr nikeng nzsuti zlwz drtwrdr. Nzngqdr x nelzdr krlc.
Kxmule-esz', a' drtwrdr tresapxu. X mzli lc tzmube-ngrdr,
Gct sc tqnibqtipebzle obla nedr kcng tzxplrng, Mz nzngyatikr drtwrde nidr.
Kxmule-esz' Gct ayrplapx-katole nidr mz alwx ngrdrng, a' sc tzale-zvzng alwx. X kxmule-esz' nzmcpelr nzale-krde da kxnzkctipxng, a' trnzlxngitilru nide.
Zbz sc tqnibq-anipele nidr Mz nzapusr-krdeleng lue kc tqmilqpx mz leu r nya x tqmrbro mz drtc'.
Kx nibqle kcng, opxm kx drtwr kxnzlubeng sc tqyzlu-mopwz bade, Mz nzplzpx-krbzlr alwx ngrdr x nzkrka'-krbzlr bade.
X opxm kz kx dctipx mou drtwrdr kx Gct kc tqrninr nide butqbr nyzdr, Kc tqarlapx-zvzle nidr.
Kxmule-esz', a' nzpokiatilr nide Mz nzrpi-krbzlr bade kx nzmrlztilr nide.
Kxmule-esz' nabzdr bao, X trnzatutrlru Nzesz'tikr Drtwrdr badr,
A' trodatileu nidr, murde yckqti mou drtwrde nidr x ipqpxbzle alwx ngrdrng. X nzwrde kqlu kx ngyatingr drtwrde nidr, a' lolvztxde zngya ngr drtwrde.
Murde krlzle kx nidr leplz x nzkrlzlr nzbzngr, Mz nzapu-krdr nenq kc tqwq x sc tqamaneope.
Nzwrde kqlu lzke nzxpqbrlr-ngrdr nide, Mz nzavzti-krbzlr drtwrde.
Zvz nzale-ebir-krdr da kx nzangyati-ngrbzlr drtwrde, Mz drtwrdr kx lctr-zvzbz mz Gct kc Tqtr-esz'ngr.
Mrbrtr mz drtwrdr zmatq ngrde Mz nzarlapx-krde nidr mz mq enqmi rdrng.
Mzli kc tqale-ngrde da kxnzkctipxng Mz nzvzmipx-krde nidr Ijipt.
X mzli kc tzmnc-ngrdr Ijipt, ngi-batrpzle lue kxetung nzlrtipx-krdr mepyr, Murde lr Ijipt ma tzrmnqng lue.
Atwzlr-ngrmle frck kxkqlu kx na-atrkatilr mrnyzdr, X mc kxkqlu kx namakxtilr nidr.
Nibqtibzle kzu, sip, x gout nedrng Mz kzdq zyagox kxtrka. X mz nibrde atwzlr-ngrmle trlipu kxetu, Mz nzamzti-krbzle nounc x dalr nrlanc nyzdrng mz nzatatio-krmleleng muli-aes. Zbz sc tqatwzlrpe-ngrmle kionabr Mz nzngqti-krdr dakxnzng amrlx kx nzlutinepwzng mz nrlanc.
<range>
<range>
X mz nzngyati-zlwzkr drtwrde lr Ijipt kcng tzakxputilr leplz nedeng, Atwzlr-ngrmle enjrl kxnzkqlung mz nzpulio-krmlr nyr mz nzayrplapx-krdeleng.
Trlolvzleu zngya ngr drtwrde, A' xplr-esz'ngr apule nubla ngr lue mz nznibqti-krde nidr.
Nibqtibzle doa ncblo kx ayrnrngr nedrng, Nidr kcng tzvzpxmqng mz nqvi lr Ham, doa ne Noa.
Mz nibrde sc tqrtwayzpebz mz leplz nedeng mz nzrlasz-krdr Ijipt. X mailztrle nidr lzke mz nzapu-krdr sip nedeng.
Aclve-angidrle nidr, x trnzmwxlru. A' aboobzle enqmi rdrng amrlx prla.
X mz nibrde sc tqvzmitr-atele nidr mz drtc' kxtr nyzde, Kenan, Mrkc tqtungr Newz Saeon, kx nztwz mz zmatq ngr nzaovxio-krde.
Maneutipxle leplz kxnzmnc-mrbrng mrlcde, mz nzvztrkr leplz nedeng mz drtc' lc. X sc tqakipxpebzle drtc' lc mz neidu lr Israel kcng nzpnu-esz'-nrade-li, x nzmncpx-alzupq'ng mz ma nyzdr.
Kxmule-esz' nzmncpeng mz drtc' kxtr, a' sc tzycmne-plztitrlr x nzxpqbrlr-ngrdr Gct kc tqrninr mz nzpxtxpx-krdr natqdeng.
Leplz lcng nzapulr melrmqdr kcng bqnc mz nzesablqti-krdr nide x nzvecpx-lzbq-krmlr bade. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, trpengr kx brti drtwrde nidr.
Nzangyatibzlr drtwrde mz nzangio-krdr kx trngiu Yawe Gct angidr, X mz nzyrngzo-krbzlr mz mqngr da kxnzlz.
Kx mcle da lcng tzaletilr, ngyati zlwz drtwrde leplz nedeng, X sc tqpxtxpxpe-ngrde nidr.
Rlasz-pnzle Tentkxtr nyzde kc mztea Saelc, mz drtc' nyz Efrem. Mrkc tzmnc-kai-ngrdr badr leplz nedeng.
X rlr-ngrbzle mz enqmi nztwz-krdr Bokis kc tqyclz-ngrm Nzesz'tikr Drtwrdr Badr, Kc tqngi rkx ngr zmatq x nzmyapx-esz'ngr-krde.
X mz nzngyati-zlwzkr drtwrde leplz nedeng, Rlr-ngrbzle mz enqmi rdrng nznibqti-krdr nidr.
X obla nedrng amrlx nzbzting mz vea, X olvi nedrng trpengr obla kx naryrlzting.
Pris nedrng nzbzti-kzng mz vea, X olvz ngrdr nzmwxlr-zlwzng x trpnzngr mzli kx nayrnimi-ngrdr namz ngrdr.
Mz nibrde, mz drtwrdr opxm kx Kxetu apule ncblo kx melz-atem Mz nzmwingr mz nzrmnq-krde waen.
X mzli lcpwz aovxiole enqmi rdeng, Mz nzamyati-alo-krbzle drtqdr.
Gct trsutiu drtwrde doa neng Josip, X sc tqrlaszpele drtc' nyz Efrem, kzdq mrlxde.
A' mcpx-alzule neidu lr Judz, Mz nzmnc-krde Newz Saeon, kc tqmrlz-zlwzbz bade.
Mrlc dekc tqwztio-ngrde Mrkc Tqtr murde nayc alo elr, Da kc tqwai nzyc-alokr Heven x nrlc.
X mcpx-kzle Devet kx nawztrpz bade. X kapxmle nide mz nzaclve-krde sip neng trtede, Murde nanginide king r lr Israel, Mz nzaclve-krde leplz neng Gct.
<range>
X nzaclvekr Devet nidr tubq, Mz nzmailz-zpwx-krde nidr.
Gct, leplz kxnzmnc-mrbrng nzvztrpqng x nztztilr nigr, Murde natwzlr drtc' lc tqkame bagr. Nzatrkatipelr Mangr-nzangiongr nim, X nzodati-atwrnrpe-ngrdr Jerusalem.
Namz ngr leplz nemqng nzayrlwrtxnedr Ngi dakxnzng nanq utc x animol kzpetong.
Enqmi lcng tzlakitilr leplz amrlx Jerusalem, X mepyr ngrdr yrlenepe apule lue. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, trpnzngr nigr kx rlapx, Kx nayrtzmqlr namz ngr kztedrng.
Lr mrkzbleng kcng tzmnc-aepztrpqng bagr nznelvzlr nigr mz nzamyati-ngrm drtqgr, X nzxtrnga-ngrdr nigr.
?Yawe, ngyati-alope drtwrm nigr? ?Myx kxmule, zngya ngr drtwrm lc tqapule nyr, kx na-angc-alopele nigr?
Bzkq, a' kx nangyati drtwrm kxtrnzrlxngitiung ngr mrkzbleng, Kcng trnzamatqlru x trnzangiolru nim.
Murde sc tznibqtipelr nigr leplz ngr nqvi lr Jekop, X tzatrkatipelr drtc' kc tqkame bagr.
Gct, bzkq ayrkrpx-ngrn nigr alwx ngr melrmqgrng, A' nayc mz drtwrm nigr murde nqmq nr nabzgr bao-zlwzpe.
Mevalu rgr, okatrp x arlapx nigr, x ipqpxbz alwx ngrgrng, Murde leplz ma tzobqszolr nim,
Mz nzrpi-krmlr bagr kx, “?Myxpe Gct rmu?” A' rlr-ngrm nzmc-krgr nzayrplapx-krm leplz lcng, Mz nzayzlu-krbzme badr nznibqti-krbzlr leplz nemqng.
Kxetu, ayzlu-ebir-ngr-mopwz badr Nikeng nzalelr mz nzobqszo-krdr nim. X arlapx kz nigr leplz nemqng kcng tzlolvztilr, murde ma tqbzkr, Mz nzayzlu-krme nzyrni-krbzkr bam.
<range>
Murde apukr sip nemqng, X sa na-awi-zvzpebzkr bam mz nzglqlz-alo-krgr nim.

Gct, myaszlzq enjrl kxnzetung. X aclve-zvzq nigr doa neng Josip, Mz nzapu-krgr sip nemqng. Lalztqm bagr, nigr doa neng Israel.
X aelwa-ngrm zmatq ngrm bagr, Nigr nqvi lr Efrem, Benjamin, x Manase. Vzm mz nzxplr-krm mzli ka X arlapxbz nigr mz mq enqmi rgrng.
Gct, mz nzaodu-zvz-krm nigr, arlapx nigr, X ka-mop bagr nzxplr-krgr kc pnz.
Yawe Gct kc tqrninr, bzkq drtwrm ngya-zvzm bagr, A' ayzlum nzkrka'-krgr.
Tekqtrpebzme dakxnzng nagr mz nzavz-krbzme drtwrgr. X mz lue amnqtr-zvzpeq nigr mz drlemzkr.
Rlrtx-ngrpwzme mz lr mrkzbleng kcng tzmnc-ngalelr nigr nzyrpalelvz-krdr nigr X nzotalvz-krdr drtc' nyzgr kx neke nartwz.
Gct kc tqrninr, mz nzaodu-zvz-krm nigr, arlapx nigr, X ka-mop bagr nzxplr-krgr kc pnz.
Apusr-ngrn nigr nqvi lr grep ngr nrlanc nyzm. Murde mz nzvzmipx-krme nigr Ijipt, Apule kx bolvztipeq leplz kxnzmnc-mrbrng mrkc Kenan, Murde nqvi lr grep nyzm natu-amqngi mz drtc' lc.
<range>
X bz ngr nrlanc kc tqoliqtime bagr yzutr mz drtc' ngr Lebanon, Vz krlzbzle Lue Yufretis. X vzki-kzple mz newz kxnzetung, Vz x krlzbzle Prla Meditrenia.
<range>
A' mzli ka opxm kx awxlikiq nabxbz ngr nrlanc nyzgr, Mz nzrlr-krbzme mz enqmi rgrng nzrtwz-abeane-krdr dalr nrlanc.
Lr mrkzbleng nzapulr poi kzpeto kcng tzayabetilr nrlanc, Mz nzapusr-krdr nigr dakxnzng nadr.
Gct kc tqrninr, obqom bagr Heven. X okatr-mop nigr mz nzapu-krgr nqvi lr grep nyzm,
Kc tqpetiq Murde naxplrkr mz nzmnc-krgr mz drtc'.
Ngaprbz ncpa'bu ngrgr kx nao-zlilzkr, Mz nztu-zvz-krme mz nibrgr, nigr leplz nemqng. Murde enqmi rgrng nzapusr-ngrdr nigr nounc kc tzlakitxo x nzangc mz nyr. Delc naodati-ngrbzme nidr mz zngya ngr drtwrm.
<range>
Zbz trnaesablqtikru nim, A' naglqlz-zvzpekr nim mz nzalu-krm nigr.
Yawe Gct kc tqrninr, mz nzaodu-zvz-krm nigr, arlapx nigr, X ka-mop bagr nzxplr-krgr kc pnz.

Namalqlvzku Gct murde nide lrpalvc nyzgu. Nangr-katobzku mz Gct ngr Jekop.
Na-ayrnitiku gita x ukzlele x na-ayrlewzku nrasrpwale Mz nzngr-krbzku bade nabz kxyrlvi.
Trpu navxutr mz nzrkqlengr leplz mz zbq kxnzetuting, Mz zbq ngr nzpokr temz x zbq ngr nzyc-atwrnr-krde.
Murde krlc natq kx kam Gct bagu, nigu lr Israel, Mz nzka-krbzle loukxtr scde mz nqvi lr Jekop.
Pipxbzle mz melrmqgung, nidr neidu lr Josip, Mzli kc tqatrkati-ngrde lr Ijipt. X ninge Asaf, mzli kc nzryr-krnge tqkrlzpe-ngrbzle me tavau, Xlrx kc natq kx trglxwxu, a' mz nibrde sc tqglx-atex.
Rpimle kx, “Sc tqrkatxobo da kxmrlepu kcng tqglqamu. X aopxbo drtqmu mz nzwz-kato-krmu Ijipt.
Mzli lc tqkxpu-ngrnamu, kqleamu ninge, x sc tqarlapxpex nimu. X sc tqokatrpele nimu tqvzmc mz bzlrmei. X ni-kznge kc tqabzle nimu mrkc lzke Mz aulz ngr Meriba.”
“Naxlrmamu da kx narngidrlvz-ngrbo bamu, kx leplz nengeng. X nalalztqmamu mz natqnge.
Bzkq angioamu kx trngiu Yawe Gct angidr, Mz nzyrngzo-krbzmu badr.
Murde ninge Yawe, Gct rmu, Kc tqvzmile nimu mz nzrlasz-krmu Ijipt. X sa na-amrlzx nimu mzli kx abrtrmamu drtwrmu bange.
Kxmule-esz', a' tryrlq-angidrwamuu natqnge, kx leplz nengeng, Mz nzpxtxpx-krmu ninge.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, rlrpx-ngrbo bamu nzvz-nqblq-krmu narmu, X nzale-krmu nike suti drtwrmu.
A' sutitx zlwz drtwrnge kx nalalztqmamu bange, kx leplz nengeng, Mz nzlolvz-amqngi-krmu nqmq krnge.
Murde na-aovxiobo enqmi rmung Mz nzota-krgr badr.
X Krkcng tzpxtxpx-ngrdr ninge, sa narnrcng mz nzyrngzo-krmlr bange, X na-ayrplapx-alox nidr.
A' na-amrlzx nimu leplz nengeng, Murde na-abrtz-zlwzamu mz nzmnc-zpwx-krmu.”
Gct wxbuom me matq nyzde, Murde napipxle kx kxnzetung nzvz-rbrng.
Rpibzle badr kx, “Nzaclve-krmu leplz narsakrlrngr. A' bzkq okatramu kxdrka'-ngrng nzmyaszpx-krdr kxnztubqng.
Murde mz nzwz-krmu natubzmu mz nibr kx trpnzngr scdr da x doa kxnzbzszng, X naokatramu kxnzkxpung x kxtrnzxplrung.
Murde na-arlapxbzmu krkcng trpnzngr scdr zmatq Mz mq kxdrka'-ngrng.
Ngqngu-plxsramu x trpnzngr da kx krlzamu, murde nqmq krmung amrlx trka-zlwzng. X trpnzngr da kx opxm mzli ka mz nrlc.
Nimu kxnzetung murde kapebo bamu zmatq ngr nzrmailz-krmu. X nimu amrlx apuamu mrlxng Gct kc tqmyalz-esz'ngr.
Kxmule-esz', a' mrbrtr mz drtwrmu Kx zmatq kc tqwz-xgleamu nzkrlz nzrkatxpx-ngrbz, Da kc tzwai nzrkatxpxpe-ngrbz zmatq mz kzdung kxnzetung. X nabz-kzamu da kc tzwai leplz amrlx mz nzbz-krdr.”
Gct, vzm mz nzaclve-krm leplz mz nrlc tulvzo, Murde lr drtc' amrlx nzmnclzbzng mz zmatq ngrm.

Gct, bzkq mnc-lrpitxn, Murde enqmi rmqng nzxpqbrlr-ngrdr nim.
<range>
Sa tzryrlqng drtwr kxyc-kapq kx na-atrkati-ngrdr nigr. X nigr leplz nemqng kcng tqmrlzti-zlwzq.
Nzrpilr kx, “Naodatitxbzku mrnyzdr, Murde drtq Israel namrbrtxtr alo mz drtwr.”
Enqmi kcng tzmnc-ngalelr Israel drtwrdr esz'ti Mz nzprtr-krbzlr mz lr Amcn x lr Mcab, neidu lcng li nzvzpxmqng mz nqvi lr Lot. Kxnztupeng badr me esz' nidr seleng: Nqvi lr Isc, nqvi lr Ismael, neidu lr Haga, x neidu lr Amalek, Lr mztea Taea, lr Gebal, x lr Filistia. X lr Asiria kxnzxplrng nzngi tedr kz badr.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Gct, aovxio kz enqmi lcng mzli ka, da kc tqwai pnz nzaovxio-zvz-krm enqmi r melrmqgrng. Ayrplapx nidr, da kc tqwai nzayrplapx-krm ami ne Jabin, King r lr Kenan x Ngrlrvea nede Sisera, Mzli kc tqmilxtxo-ngrn nidr mz Lue Kison kc tqyc-aepztr mztea Endo, X namz ngrdr mibio mrlcde mz mzli nyz Profet Debra. X rlxti-kzpzkr nanibqti-kzq enqmi rgrng, da kc tqwaisr-ngrn mz lr Midizn mz nznibq-krm Oreb x Seeb, ngrlrvea ngrdrng. X maneuti nidr da kc tqwai nzmaneuti-krm king rdr, Sebz x Salmuna, mz nznibq-krm nidr mz mq profet Gidion.
<range>
<range>
Murde leplz lcng pnz nzrpilr kx, “Natwzku Israel, drtc' nyz Gct, nangi nyzgu.”
Gct, mz nzmu-krde lcde, apusrngr nidr bq r drtc', X leu kxglr kx wqplr nenq.
Odati-atwrnrngr nidr, apubz badr nyr kxetu Kc tqyrkrtxongr dalr peto x nardzng mz mzli r nepi.
Maneuting x amwxlrng Mz nzapu-krbzme badr nounenq.
Yawe, amyatitx-zlwzbz drtqdr, Murde nakrlz-ngrdr zmatq ngrm.
Aovxio alo x amwxlr alo nidr Murde nzmya-zlwzkr drtqdr nanibqle nidr.
X mzli lc, sc tzkrlz-atepelr kx nim txpwz Gct kc tqmyatxlz-esz'ngr x drtqm Yawe. X nim King kc tqaclvele nrlc tulvzo.

Yawe kc tqrninr, nim Gct kc tqlu. X mrlz-zlwzm bange Mangr-nzangiongr nim. Murde sutitx zlwz drtwrnge nzmncpx-krmc makoa ngrde, Mrkc tqngr-abrtz-ngrbo bam mz nabznge atwrnrngr.
<range>
Yawe kc tqrninr, nim Gct x King rnge. Kxnzvzdzng Jerusalem mz nzangio-krdr nim nzrlatrng mz olta nyzmqng. Murde olta nyzm apule ma nyz doa nemqng. Da kc tqwai utc tzwz-ngrdr ma nyz neidr, mz nztapirpx-krdr neimrdr.
X doa lcng tzmncpxmqng Mangr-nzangiongr nim nzmnc-zpwxng Mz nzangrlvz-zvz-krdr nim.
Namrlzbz mz leplz kcng tzvzdzng mz Newz Saeon mz nzangio-krdr nim, Murde sa na-axplr-mowq nidr.
Mz nzkawi-krdr nabzlwa kxmingr narmctilr nabzde kx lrting Mz nibr nzdckr tewa.
X mz nzesotr-krdr Jerusalem nzxplr-krdr sa naetunepx, Murde ycpe pipz nzkrlz-krbzlr Newz Saeon mz nzangio-krdr nim. X nim Gct rgr kxmyaszlzle krkcng tzmncng mzlilxlr amrlx Tzangiolr lr mrkzbleng.
Yawe Gct kc tqrninr, nim Gct r melrmqgr Jekop. Xlrm nzkrka'-krnge mz nzvztr-krnge ma nyzm.
Rlxtibo bam Kx amrlz-zvzbz king rgr kc tqmcpxq.
Murde nzmnctr-ngrbz bam mz Mangr-nzangiongr nim mz zbq kxesz', Myaszpxle nzmncngr drlve keng mz nrlc mz zbq kang kqlu. X nzprtr-ate-krbo mz naonrx ngr ma nyzm, Myaszpxle nzmnc-zvz-krnge mz ma kxnzetung nyz kxdrka'-ngrng.
Murde Yawe, nim King rgr kc tqbatrple nzamatqngr nigr. X nim temz ngr lomrgr kc tqyrputrngr nipna. X aclveq nigr mz zmrlz ngrm, Mz nzrlrpx-zvz-krbzme da kxmrlzting mz kxnztubqng.
Yawe kc tqrninr, Krkcng tzabrtrpzlr drtwrdr bam nzmnc-zpwxng.

Yawe, yc ngr drtwrm lr Israel mzli kc pnz, Mz nzamnc-zpwx-mou-krm nidr mz drtc' nyzm.
Sc tqipqpeq nidr, leplz nemqng, mz nzvz-rbr-krdr, X katxpxbzme alwx ngrdrng.
Mzli lcde, lolvzo-mowq zngya ngr drtwrm, X nrwx kc tqprlxpebzme badr.
Mevalu rgr, mzli ka, amnc zpwx mou kz nigr, X nikitx nzngyatikr drtwrm nigr.
?Myx kxmule, nangyati-alope drtwrm nigr, X trpengr nzyzlukr drtwrm?
Trtingr! Axplr-mop nzlu-krgr, Murde na-abrtz-ngrgr nim.
Yawe, aelwa-ngrm bagr nzaodu-krm kc tqyc tqyc, Mz nzarlapx-krm nigr.
Nabrti drtwrgu natq Yawe, Murde esalz-ngrmle nrwx bagu mz nzyrlqpx-lzbq-krgu mz dalr nzngqngungr.
X oliq zvz nzarlapx-krde kxnzamrluelr nide, Murde nzulrde naxngi-alope mz drtc' nyzgu.
Yawe aodu-zvzle nigu, murde nangida-zpwxbzku bade. X nzaclve-krde tubq, murde namnc-zpwxku.
Mz nzavzo-krmle nztubqngr lc bagu, Ayzlubzku mz nzngida-zpwx-krbzku bade.
Apule kx nztubqngr lc rtwayzbz bade mz nzatubqti-krde nabz leplz, Murde naoliqti-ngrdr nzvz-krmle. Mz nzoliqngr lc, Yawe sa narkatim bagu da kxmrlzting, X drtc' nyzgu sa nalvcngr dakxnzng kxkqlu.
<range>
Yawe, xlrm nzkrka'-krnge, Murde trxplrwxu x ninge ncblo txne.
Nim Gct rnge. Arlapx ninge mz nzbzngr murde tenge nim, X ninge kxnzawz nem kc tqmnc-xgle-zvzle nim.
Nayc mz drtwrm ninge, Murde vz zvz nzkrka'-krbo bam.
Kxetu rnge, aelalzm drtwrnge, Murde abrtrpo drtwrnge bam.
Murde mrlz-esz'ngrn nzripq-zvzngr. X aodu-zvzq krkcng tzkrka'bzng bam.
Yawe, lalztqm mz nzyrni-krnge, X ayzlum natqnge.
Mzli ka kqlex nim mz nzkxpu-krnge, Murde angidati-zvzme nzrlx-krbo da bam.
Kxetu, trpnz-moungr gct kx apule nim, Murde trpnzngr nidr kx rkrlz nzalengr da kxnzkctipxng kcng tqale-zvzq.
Kxrpalz, lr drtc' amrlx kcng tqwz-ngrn Sa nayrngzobzng bam mz nzarmyalz-krdr nim.
Murde nim txpwz Gct, Kc tqmatq-esz'ngr mz nzale-krm rkx kxetuting.
Yawe, aelwa-ngrm bange me pnz drtwrm, murde navz-nqblqx natqm. X alvztrp bange nzamrlue-zvz-krnge nim.
Murde nabznge atwrnrngr na-awibz bam mz nzngini-krm Gct x Kxetu rnge, X na-angio-zvzx drtqm.
Murde nzaodu-zvz-krm ninge etu-esz'ngr, Mz nzarlapx-krm ninge mz nzbzngr.
Gct, kxnzglqpx-lzbqng nztutitr nardr ninge. Zbo ngr ncblo kxayo lc nzrpilr nanibqlr ninge, murde nzpxtxpx-ngrdr nim.
A' yc zvz mz drtwrm leplz, x zmrlz ngrm myalz-esz'ngr. X drtwrm trngya-aniu, a' nzaodu-krm x nzangidati-krm tqvzpe tqvzpe.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, yzlum x nayc mz drtwrm ninge. Axplr x arlapx ninge, murde wztrpo bam da kc tqwai lxenge mz nzwztr-krbzle bam.
Yawe, okatrp ninge mz nivz lrm, murde drtq enqmi rngeng namyatx-zlwzng Mzli kc namc-ngrdr nzaxplr-krm ninge x nzapqtr-krme drtwrnge.
Yawe wz-ngrde mzteadau Jerusalem Mz newz kxtr nyzde.
X mzteadau lc nzmrlzba-krdele Myaszpxle mztea kc-kzng ngr Israel.
Delc nimu lr mztea nyzde, Naxlr-ngrnamu natq kxmrlz kcng tzycmnetr-ngrdr Jerusalem.
Gct rpile kx, “Mzli kc na-aplxtipx-ngrbo leplz nengeng, lr mrkzble kcng tzmnc-ngalelr Israel sa naprtr-kzng mz dzbede nenge, Krlcng Ijipt, Bxbilon, Filistia, Taea, x Itiopia.
X sa narpibzlr kx Jerusalem lxe neidu amrlx murde nzrmctitrpzlr nzlungr bade. X ninge, Yawe kc tqmyatxlz-esz'ngr, sa na-atu-amqngix nide.
X sa nayrox drtq leplz amrlx kcng tzbrti drtwrdr ninge, Mz nzprtr-krdr mz neidu lr Israel.
X mzli lcde, leplz nengeng lcng amrlx sa naelang x narpilr mz nzngr-krdr kx, ‘Mztea nyzgu, Jerusalem, ngi narlue ngr me vzkipxm da kxmrlzting amrlx.’”

Yawe, nim Gct kx arlapxle ninge, X yrni-katobo bam ngrlx x nrlckxbq.
Xlrm natqnge X lalztqm mz nzkrka'-krnge.
Murde prtilzpele ninge nzkxpungr kxkqlu, X ycpe pipz nzbz-krnge.
Mzli ka mewepex, X trpengr da kx nawaitrpem bange.
Nzapusr-ngrdr ninge namz kx nzyrtzmqng mz gq. Murde krlcng tzbzpeng nzmrbrtitrpe drtwr nidr x trpengr nzrmcti-krdr nzokatr-krm.
Rtcope-ngrn ninge mz gq kx vzo la, X tutx-ngrpwz nzlo.
Nzngyatikr drtwrm ninge batrpzle nzetq-zlwzkr drtqnge, Mz nzmrilvzo-krde nabznge apule nrc kc tqyrplalvzo-ebir-ngrde ninge.
Ngi-batrpe' nzngangrkr kztengeng ninge mz nzmwxlrti-krdr zyagox lc tqdwatimle ninge. X trpengr me nayrbqkipxx.
Yawe, mzke' vaotxtrpebz mz nzyrningr mz nzvzkr drtwrnge. Kxmule-esz', a' mz zbq kang kqlu glalz-zvzbo mqnge mz nzkrka'-krbo bam.
Bzkq rlr-ngrme nzbz-krnge Murde ma tqrblxpem bange nzyapwxtipx-krbo nim mz leplz. Murde kxnzlu-txpwzng kcng tqalebzme badr da kxnzkctipxng. X namz ngr leplz trnztulzpeung mz nzglqlz-krdr nim.
Trnzycmnetrpe-ngrdru nzaodu-zvz-krm mz nabz gq kc tqngi me nzodatingr nidr. A' nzangidati-krm nzpipxbz mz krkcng tzlubeng mz nrlc ka.
X rblxpebz mz kxnzyrtzmqng nzrmc-krdr nzmyalz-esz'ngr-krm murde nzmncng mz nabz nzlo, X nivz lrm mrbrtr-alope kz mz drtwr, mz gq lr kxnzbzng.
A' krka'-zvzbo bam mz zbq kang kqlu, kx Yawe, Murde nayc mz drtwrm ninge.
A' opxm kx drtqm satrpem bange, X sc tqesablqtipeq ninge.
Murde ayrplatxpx-zlwzq ninge, yzutr pnz mzli kc tqngi-oblabe-ngrne. X mzli ka nzetq-zvzkr drtqnge ycpe pipz nzayrkrpx-krde ninge.
Nzngyati-zlwzkr drtwrm ninge apule nubla kc tqtwzle ninge, Mz nzbatr-krbzle nzmrbrkr nzlu-krnge.
X nzkxpu-krnge lcng nzngrlelvzlr ninge, X trpengr me nayrbqkipxx.
Ngi-batrpe' kztengeng kxnzmrlzng nzngangr-krdr ninge. X mzli ka nabznge talvzo zlwz mz nzmnc-krnge esz'-krnge mz nabz nzlo.

Yawe, sa nangr-zvz-ngrne nzaodu-krm, Kc tqyc tqyc. X sa nayapwxtipx-alox nzangidati-krm natqm, Kc tqyctx alo, da kc tqwai bongavz.
<range>
X sa nayrlq-zvzq natqm kc tqpibzme mz kxnzawz nem, Devet, Kc tqmcpxq, mz Nzesz'tikr Drtwrmu ncdr.
Rpibzme bade kx, “Ncblo kcng tzvzpxmqng mz neidu lrm, sa nanginipwzlr king, Murde nqvi lrm na-aclve alo.”
Yawe, lr Heven nzglqpxlr nzangidati-krm, Mz nzangrlvz-krdr da kxnzkctipx kcng tqaleq. Enjrl amrlx nzamrlue-zlwzlr nim, Murde trpnzngr lr Heven kx apule nim, kc tqmyaszlzle nidr amrlx.
<range>
<range>
Yawe Gct kc tqrninr, nim txpwz kx xplr-esz'ngr, Mz nzangidati-krm me pnz drtwrm.
Kxmule-esz' srkau xplr, a' sc tqlolvzq, X mz nzprtz-krm nrc kxoda, lclvzbzme murde nrwx navo.
X aovxio-zvzq enqmi rmqng mz nzxplr-esz'ngr-krm, Da kc tqwai nztabrti-krm Mepwz ngr prla kc bqnc.
Kxrpalz, bongavz x drtc' nyzmqng, Murde nim kx rwzngr nrlc x dalrdeng amrlx.
X doa x da amrlx mz nrlc tulvzo Nzaxvctr-lxblrng mz nzangrlvz-krdr drtqm,
Mz nzrpi-krdr kx, “Nim kc tqmatq-esz'ngr, X nzxplr-krm etu-esz'ngr.
Nou nzaclve-krm nrlc nidr seleng: Nztubqngr, nzrsakrlrngr, nzaodu-zvzngr, x nzangidatingr.”
Yawe, ngi da kxmrlz nzmalq-abrtzlvz-krgr nim, Murde xngibzkr nzulrm.
X ngi da kxmrlz nzbilvz-krgr drtqm, X nzglqlz-krgr nztubq-esz'ngr-krm mz zbq kang kqlu.
Murde axplrq nigr, X aovxiokr enqmi rgrng mz nzokatr-krm.
Yawe, nim Gct kc tqtr-esz'ngr x angio-txpwzkr nim. Murde mcpxbzme king rgr lc tqaclve-zpwxle nigr.
Mzli kc bqnc, mz nzyrlq-krm Devet nzngini-krde king, vzme mz profet nemqng, X rpibzme mz nzrmwiblengr kx, “Aprcbo zmatq mz kzdq ngrlrvea kx xplr, Mz nzarmyalz-krnge nide mz leplz txneng, murde nanginide king.
Ncblo kxnzawz nenge lc tqmcpxx, Devet, X aelux nide mz tolo kxtr.
Sa namailzx nide mz mqnge. X sa na-axplrx nide mz zmatq rnge.
Kxdrka'-ngrng kcng tzngi enqmi rdeng, trtxpnzngr nzyatr-krbzlr bade Mz nzamyati-krbzlr drtqde.
Murde sa natamyr-ngrbo nidr Mz nznibqti-krbo kxnzpxtxpx-ngrdr nide.
Sa na-aodu-zvzx nide x nanginide kztenge. X sa nabatrpo bade nzaovxio-krde mz drtqnge.
Sa nakabo bade zmatq ngr nzaclve-krde Prla Meditrenia, Navz nakrlzbzle Lue Yufretis.
Sa namcle kx ninge trtede, Kc tqngi Gct rde x butqbr nyzde kc tqrlakitrle.
X sa na-apusr-ngrne nide mrlxnge krdau, Mz nzarmyalz-zlwz-krbo nide mz king amrlx mz nrlc.
Drtwr kxesz'ti kc tqyrlqbo bade, trtxpnzngr nzyzpr-krde, Mz nzangidati-krnge nzaodu-zvz-krnge nide.
X nzyrlq-krbo nzaclvekr nqvi lrde tqyc tqyc, Da kc tqwai nzyc-alokr bongavz.”
X rpi-mopwz Gct kx, “A' nzmu doa nedeng naesablqtilr loukxtr scnge, Mz trnzlolvz-amqngi-krdru nzalvztr-krnge
X nzmu trnavz-nqblqlru me pnz drtwrnge Mz nzpxtxpx-krdr natqnge,
Sa na-ayrplapxxng mz alwx ngrdr, Mz nzaetq-krbo drtqdr mz nikeng nzvz-rbrtilr.
A' trpnzngr nzatao-krnge da kc tqesalz-ngrbo mz Devet, A' sa na-aodu-zvzx nide.
X trpnzngr nztekqtr-krnge natqnge, A' sa na-atutr-zvzx nzesz'tikr drtwr kc tqyrlqbo bade.
Esalzpex mz drtqnge kxtr X amqngipex kx trtxpnzngr nzesabrti-krnge nide.
X nzaclvekr nqvi lrde tqyc tqyc, Da kc tqwai nzti-alokr nepi x nzprtz-krm temz x nztao-krde.”
<range>
Yawe, rpiq da lc, a' mzli ka drtqm satrpem bange x rlaszpeq ninge, Mz nzngyati-moukr drtwrm ninge, king kc tqmcpxq.
Nikipeq Nzesz'tikr Drtwr kx yrlqbzme mz melrmqgr Devet, kx natu-zvzbzme mz nibr nqvi lrde, Mz nzapusr-krbzme kraon ngr narnge brmrda.
Awxlikitxopebzme drkq ngr mzteadau nyznge. X odati-atwrnr-ngrbzme lrpalvc nyzgrng amrlx.
Enqmi rgrng amrlx nzatrkati-zlwzlr nigr. X lr mrkzbleng kcng tzmnc-aepztrpqng bagr nzyrpalelvzlr ninge, king nem.
Murde ngi-batrpzme nzxplrkr ncblo ngr vea nedrng. X mzli ka sc tzbilvzpelr.
Amyatibzme nipna scngeng mz nzrpna-krnge, X rlr-ngrbzme nzaovxio-krdr nigr.
Odatipeq tron nyznge, Mz nzkatxpx-krbzme zmatq ngr nzngini-krnge king.
Amyatibzme drtqnge mz mz leplz. X ngi-batrpe' nzngini-ani-krnge lrtzlvz.
Yawe, bzkq mnc-rlrume bagr. X bzkq apqtipeq nigr mz nzngya-zlwzkr drtwrm.
A' na-aoti drtwrm nzmrbcnekr nzlu-krgr nigr leplz Mz nzmnc-krgr mz nrlc.
Trpnzngr leplz kx na-arlapx-lzbq, Murde nigr amrlx mnclzbzkr mz zmatq ngr nzbzngr.
Kxetu, opxm kx trangidatipewq natqm kc tqpibzme mz Devet, Murde trxngipepwzkru nzaodu-zvz-krm kc bqnc.
Bzkq mrbrtr mz drtwrm nzobqszokr leplz ninge, kxnzawz nem, Murde kxnzmnc-mrbr lcng sc tzbilvztipelr ninge.
Yawe, enqmi rmqng nznelvztilr ninge, king kc tqmcpxq, Mz nzxtrnga-krdr ninge.
Na-armyalzku Yawe, kc tqngi Kxetu rgu. Tqvzpe, tqvzpe. Eu. Na-armyalzku Yawe.
Kxetu, yzutr pnz mzli kc, krlzmle mzbq ka Nzngini-krm me rlakitrkr.
Mzli kc trwzka-ngrn nrlc x newz ngrdeng, mncpe-kaiq. Murde nim Gct, x nzmnc-krm la tqyc tqyc.
Rpime bagr kx, “Yzlu-mouamu,” X mz nzbz-krgr yzlu-moukr mz drtc' kc tqwz-ngrn nigr.
Mz drtwrgr, yiz kx siu mz nrlc ngi mzli kxboi, a' mz drtwrm mzli mrbcnepwz, Apunede zbq kx esz' kx yrkrpxpe.
Mz nzmilxtxo-krm nigr rblx nzrlolvzngr, Apunede nzrmwiblengr kc tqmrbrtr ani mz drtwr. X nzmnc-krgr mrbcne apunekr nabr kx yru mz nourla x nrpqdr mztr luli. A' kx krlzbzle milzpq sc tzblopeng x tztatiopeng murde nzpqkr nzulr nepi.

Da kc tqwai nzodati-krm nigr Mz nzpqkr zngya ngr drtwrm.
Murde zyzlr ngrm pnamilxtile alwx rgrng Kcng tqyrlq-kapqkrng.
X zngya ngr drtwrm amrbctrple nzlu-krgr. X mz nzbz-ani-krgr apukr zycmini kx esz'.
Nzmnc-krgr krlz-txpwzle yiz kxnzpnu-rlimz (70), A' nzmu nrkrdrtqgr kx tqxplrle krlzbzkr yiz kxnzpnu-rtqmz (80). Yiz lcng tqyctrngr nzwz-katongr x nzetqkr drtq, Nzyrkrpx-aning x sc tqbzpekr.
Nzmu namckr nzxplrkr nzngyatikr drtwrm alwx Nzamrlue-krgr nim naetunepx kz mz nabzgr.
Okatrp nigr mz nzkrlz-krgr drtwr ngr nzmrbcnekr nzlu-krgr, Murde nzmnc-krgr mz nrlc navz-nqblqle nzyrplapx-krm.
Yawe, bzkq ngyati-alo drtwrm nigr, kxnzawz nemqng, A' tekqtr drtwrm x nayc mz drtwrm nigr.
Namc-zvzkr nzaodu-krm nigr mz nourla kang kqlu, Murde navz zvz nzangrlvz-krgr nim mz nzabrtzngr.
Kxmule-esz' yiz kqlu avz-ngrbzme drtwrgr mz nzkxpu-krgr mzli kc, A' tekqtrpz yiz lcng mz nzaelalz-krme drtwrgr mzli ka.
X aelwa-mou-ngrm bagr rkx kcng tzkctipxng mz zmatq ngrm, Murde doa negrng namc-kzlr nzmyalz-krm.

Mz nzmnc-xgle-krm Yawe kc tqmyalz-esz'ngr Sa natubz mz nibrm.
X narpibzme mz Gct kc tqrninr kx, “Nim Gct rnge kc tqabrkitrx drtwrnge, Mz nzapu-krme bange lrpalvc kx rlakitrx.”
Murde sa na-arlapxle nim mz nzatrkangr kx yc kapq, X mz nzrpibqtingr.
Sa na-aclve-zpwxle nim, Na-apule kio kc tqwxbulvzole neideng. X sa na-angidatibzle natqdeng Mz nzapu-krbzle bam temz ngr lomrm kc tqyrputrngr nipna.

Mz nzkqle-krde ninge, sa na-ayzlubo natqde. Kxmule-esz' da kx prtz, a' sa namnc-aepztrpo bade, X sa nakatxpxx nide mz nzkxpu-krdeng, X sa na-armyalzx nide.
X doa lc sa namcle nzarlapx-krnge nide, X nakabo bade nzlungr kxboi kx na-abrtz-ngrde.”

Yawe myatxlz-esz'ngrn. X mrlzvxitxm bange nzawi-krbo bam X nzglqlz-krnge nim, Mz nzayrningr gita x ukzlele, Mzli kznike angrlvz-ngrne nivz lrm mz nourla, X nzyrlq-angidr-krm natqmqng mz milzpq.

Nzmnc-krnge apule zmyo ngr milzpq Kc tqmrbr mz nzyrkrpxkr ngrlx.
Kxmule-esz', a' nzngini-krm King tqyc tqyc. Nrpr ngr ncblo amrlx sa nadcpx zvz mz drtwrdr nim.
Murde sa nayc mz drtwrm Jerusalem. X mzli ka mzli r nzokatrpe-krmle.
Kxmule-esz' enqmi rm nzodatipelr mztea lc, x trkape, A' sc tqsutibe drtwrgr x tqvztibe drtwrgr.
Yawe, lr mrkzbleng amrlx sa na-amrluelr drtqm. X king amrlx mz nrlc sa na-amatqlr nim.
Murde mzli kc na-aelwapx-ngrn nzlulikr zmatq ngrm, Mz nzwz-mou-krm Jerusalem,
Drtwr ngrde kx ayzlu-ngrme nzkrka'-krgr, Nigr kcng trpnzngr scgr da.
Nayroku da kcng tqaleting Yawe, Murde krkcng mztr trnzmcka naglqpx-kzlr nide.
Kxnamu nzyr-krgule sele: Yawe mnc Heven, Mz ma nyzde kc tqtr tqmyalz, x sc tqobqom mz nrlc.
Xlrle nzyrni-krgu mz presin, X aopxbzle drtqgu, nigu kcng tzpipx kx nanibqng.
X xlrpe-kzle nzngrkr leplz ngr mrkcng amrlx Mzli kc tzyrlwr-lxblr-ngrdr Jerusalem, Mz nzangio-krdr nide, X nzglqpx-krdr drtqde.
<range>
Yawe, ngi-batrpe' nzyangrnga-krnge, Mz nzamrbctr-krme nzlu-krnge, mzli ka tqngi-oblabe-ngrne.
A' rpibo bam kx, “Gct rnge, nzlu-krm tqyc tqyc. Suti drtwrnge nakrlz-zpwxbo nzngi-lrtzlvz-krnge, x ninge kc tqbz-atex.
Mzli kc mz noude wz-ngrn nrlc, Bongavz x dalrdeng amrlx.
Nrlc x bongavz sa nayrkrpxng kalr. A' nim txpwz kx namnctx alo. Mzli trnaboiu x sc tztrkapeng, tzapupelr lrpz kxblzlongr, Kx nzrtctxngr x nztekqtr zvz mz kxmrna.
A' trtxpnzngr nzrtekqtrngr nim. X trtxpnzngr nzbz-krm mz kzdq mzli.
Delc doa negrng sa namnc-zpwxng mz nrlc, Murde sa na-aclve-angidrq nidr.”
Naglqpxx Yawe mz nabznge atwrnrngr! Naglqpx-zvzx drtqde kxtr.
Na-aoti zvz drtwrnge nivz lrde, X da kxmrlz kcng tqalemle bange.
Murde katxpxbzle alwx rngeng amrlx. X amrlzle ninge mz zyagox amrlx.
Arlapxle ninge mz nzbzngr. Aodu-zvzle ninge.
Okatrle ninge mz da kxmrlz Murde nzlu-krnge naboi x nrkrdrtqnge naxplr, mz nzapu-krnge lr.
Yawe okatrle kxnzobqszong murde ale-zvzle da kxtubq Mzli kc tqayzlu-ngrbzle da mz leplz.
Aelwa-ngrbzle me pnz drtwrde mz Mosis, X zmatq ngrde mz lr Israel.
Yawe mrlz-esz'ngr x aodu-zvzle nigu. Drtwrde trngya-aniu, a' okatr-zvzle nigu.
Trkrlzleu nzaboitr-krmle zngya ngr drtwrde bagu, A' ani txpwz nzipq-mou-krde nigu.
Kxmule-esz' takitrde nzayrplapx-zlwz-krde nigu, A' ycngr drtwrde nigu, x trayzlupleu bagu mz nzvz-nqblq-krde nzvz-rbr-krgung.
Murde sc tqaodu-zvzpele nigu kcng tzamrluelr nide, Murde nzetu-krm nivz lrde bagu myaszpxle bongavz.
X mz nzipqpx-krbzle alwx rgung, Apule kx rtctx-ngrbzle rlru, me trpengr nzrmc-moungr.
X Yawe amqtrple drtwrgu, Da kc tqwai trte nzamqtr-krbzle drtwr doa nedeng.
Dcpx mz drtwrde kx nigu leplz kxtrnzxplrung, Murde wztx-ngrpwzle nigu mz drtc'.
X nzlu-krgu mrbcnepwz, Apule nepi kc tqprtzm mz nourla, x tqxplr mzli kc bea. A' sc tqtaope mou milzpq. Murde mzli kc nabzngr leplz trpengr nzrmc-moungr nidr.
<range>
A' Yawe aodu-zvzle x amrlz-zvzle nigu, Kcng tzamrluelr nide, Mz nzyrlq-angidr-krgu natqde, X mz nzlolvz-amqngi-krgu Nzesz'tikr Drtwrgu badr.
<range>
King Yawe wxbu mz tron nyzde Heven, Mrkc tqaclve-ngrde nrlc atwrnrngr.
Nimu enjrl kxnzmatq kcng tzvz-nqblqlr natqde, Naglqpxamu nide!
X nimu ami ngr Heven kcng tzwztrpzng bade mz nzatutr-krbzmu me pnz drtwrde, Naglqpx-kzamu nide.
X nigu amrlx mz nrlc tulvzo naglqpx-kzku nide. Naglqpxx Yawe mz nabznge atwrnrngr!
Yawe Kxrpalz, naglqpxx nim mz nabznge. Murde nim Gct kc tqluli, tqmyalz-esz'ngr. Nzmyalz-krm x zmatq ngrm nzngrlelvzlr nim nzapulr lrpz kx kq-ngrn. X zyzlr ngrm apule lrpzu scm. Bongavz apule nqni kxetu kc tqprlxpxq. X atuome elr nctrpou ngr ma nyzm. Dcbz apule lika kx lvc-ngrn, Mz nztwz-krde nim nenq kxwq.
