<range>
Zmatq ngrm batrpzle mz enjrl nemqng nzlvc-ani-krdr mz nzapu-krdr nenq. X menrpa lcng tzwztrpzng bam nzapu-kzlr bzlrpc kc tqpctipx.
Wztioq nrlc mz nou rplz kxmqngi, Murde trpnzngr nzycngrlr-krde.
Mzli kc ayrnrngr, drtc' mrbrobz prla, X newz amrlx akq-atwrnr-ngrde.
Zbz mzli kc tqpnanati-ngrn prla sc tqpzneope, Mz nzxlr-krde natqm kc tqapule bzlrmei.
Prla pzneom mz nar-newzng, vzo krlzobzle nabzlwang, Vzo mrkc tqyrlqbzme kx nalrlz-ngrmle.
X yrlqbzme bz ngr me naesakingr prla, Murde ma tqakq-atwrnr-mou-ngrde drtc'.
Wz-ngrn aulz, nzaulzmqng mz nabzlwa amrlx, Lue lcng nzvzong x lue kxetung nzyrleng mz mzlir newz amrlx.
Animol amrlx nzrmnqng lue lcng, Mz nzbrlxkzkr drtwrdr.
Utc nzrwzpe-ngrng ma nyzdr x nzngr-zvzng Mz nounc mz nqlvi r lue lcng.
Adcme tewa mz ma nyzm bongavz. Dcom mz newz amrlx. X amrlzle drtc' murde kxnzlung kcng tqwz-ngrn namnc-zpwxng.
Wz-ngrn nabr x dakxnzng nztuting mz drtc' Nangi nan animol x leplz.
Rkame waen kx na-aelalz-ngrm drtwrgr, X tolo kx na-alqngr nrkrdrtqgr, X dakxnzng kx naxplrngr nigr.
Yawe, nounc nyzm kc tqpetiq Nzdo-zlwz-krdr vzpxm mz nzadco-krme tewa badr.
X utc kang kqlu nzmncpxng mz nounc lcng. X nzwzpx-ngrdr ma nyzdr elr.
Gout nzmncomqng mz newz, X animol kxnztopwzng nzmnc-kapqneng me rplzngr.
Yawe, wz-ngrn temz nangi noabx ngr mzli, X nepi noabx ngr zbq.
Nim kx rwzngr nzlo ngr nrlckxbq, Mzli r nzprpx-krm animol kzpeto me nzmnc-ngrdrng.
Laion nzyrni-katong mz nzrtangr-krdr dakxnzng Kx nakabzme badr.
A' mzli kc tqprtz-ngrm nepi, Sc tzyzlupeng ma nyzdr, tzmwipeng.
X mz nrlc kxngrlx, leplz nzvzng mz nzale-krdr nzwz-krdr, Nzwzng vz vz krlzbzle milzpq.
Yawe, animol kcng tqwz-ngrn kqlu-esz'ngr. Nrlc ka yrbulzm mz da lcng amrlx tqwz-ngrn mz nzyrplapx-krm.
Dcpwe yrlwrlz-ngrm nc kxkqlu x rblx nzrlwx-krgrleng. Kzdu nc lcng nzetuting x kzdu nztopwzneng.
Lcsu kxnzkqlung nzvoneng prla. X nc kxbe kc tqwz-ngrn drtqde besilr ayone kz elr.
Animol lcng nzmnc-xglelr nim, X rka-zvzbzme nadr dakxnzng.
X mz nzrka-krbzme da kxmrlz badr Amrlz-zvzq nidr.
Mzli kc tqrka-ngrbzme zycmini sc tzlupeng, Murde nim Kxrpalz. X ngi-batr-zvzbzme nzlukr animol amrlx mz nrlc. A' mzli kc tqpxtxpx-ngrn nidr, nelzdr vzdzm. Murde mz nzrkatxpx-krbzme zycmini lc, nzbzng. X nzyzlu-moung mz drtc' kc tqwz-ngrn nidr.
<range>
Nzmyalzkr Yawe navz zvz, X nzabrtzlvz-krde nikeng wz-ngrdeng amrlx.
Mz nzobqo-krmle, drtc' ycngrlrlzm apule nengq kx vzm, X ngi-batrpzle nzsikapukr trmami mz nzmaletr-krde newzng.
Na-angrlvz-zvzx Yawe Gct rnge, Navz nakrlzbzle nzesakikr nzycmini-krnge.
Mrlzvxitx Yawe nzabrtzlvz-krde natqngeng mz nzngr-krbo bade, Murde nide kc tqrngi-batr-zvzm nzabrtz-krnge.
Mrlzvxitx nznibqti-krde kxdrka'-ngrng Murde nzatrkatilr nrlc kc tqwz-ngrde mz nzpxtxpx-krdr nzglqlz-krdr nide. Yawe naglqpxx nim mz nabznge. Eu. Naglqlz-zvzkr nim.
Naglqpxku Yawe, Na-awibzku mz Yawe mz nzmyalz-esz'ngr-krde. X napipxbzku mz lr mrkzbleng da kcng tqaletileng.
Na-angrlvzku mz nzangio-krgu nide. X napipxku da kxnzkctipxng kcng tqwz-ngrdeng.
Nabilvzku drtqde kxtr. X nigu kcng tzamrluelr nide drtwrgu naelalzm.
Namnc-xgleku Yawe x nzxplr-krde. X nasuti drtwrgu nzxngi-krbzku nzulrde.
Vzpxmgu mz nqvi lr Ebraam, kxnzawz ne Yawe, X nqvi lr Jekop kc tqmcpxle. Delc nadcpx zvz mz drtwrgu rkx kcng tqmatq tqaleleng, X nztubqkr nqmq krde.
<range>
Yawe nide Gct rgu. X kapxbzle natqdeng mz leplz amrlx mz nrlc.
Nzesz'tikr Drtwrgu badr tqyc tqyc. X trmrbrtru mz drtwrde nzesalz-krde.
Nzesz'tikr Drtwr lc tzyrlq-kailr mz Ebraam. X pipx-kzpzle nzesalz-krde lc mz Aesak.
Amqngi-mopwzle mz Jekop x doa nedeng, Murde navz alo.
Rpibzle badr kx, “Sa nakabo bamu drtc' kc Kenan Murde nangi drtc' nyzmu.”
A' nqvi lr ncblo lc tqngi nyz Gct nzpipzbeng mzli lcde, Mz nzngini-krdr lr mrkzbleng kx trpnzngr me nzmqngio-ngrdr.
X nzayo-txpwzng Mz nzrlasz-krdr kc mrkzble x nzvzki-mou-krdr mrkzble.
A' Yawe tr-rlrpx-ngrdeu nzaovxiongr nidr, Murde aclvele nidr mz nzlc-amq-krbzle mz king kxnzkqlung,
Mz nzrpi-krbzle badr kx, “Bzkq atrkatibzmu leplz nengeng kx mcpxx. X bzkq aetqbzmu drtq menrpa nenge lcng.”
Mz nibr kzdung mzli, Yawe atwzlr-ngrmle dzbi mz drtc' nyz leplz nedeng, X katxpx-kzle dakxnzng nadr amrlx.
A' atwzlr-kai-ngrde kzdq ncblo Ijipt kx nangibz lrpzki badr. Krlcde Josip, mrlx Jekop, kc tzamwalr murde nanginide kxnzawz-nrbalq.
X mz nibrde sc tqmncpxpem mz presin, X nzatolva-ngrdr nide mz nqvi.
Vz vz x natqde sc tqyokaetipxpele nzrmwiblekr king r Ijipt, Mz nzpipx-krde natq angidr kc tqkabz Yawe bade.
Zbz king r Ijipt kc tqaclvele mrkcng kqlu, Aopxbzle drtq Josip mz nzkapx-krmlele mz presin.
X sc tqyrlqpele Josip nzngini-krde kxetu elr, Murde na-aclvele dalr Ijipt amrlx.
Zbz Josip rngisc zmatq mz nzrkapx-krbzle natq mz kxnzetung amrlx, X mz nzalvztr-krde ncblo kcng tzyrplapxng.
Mz nibrde Jekop badr doa nedeng sc tzvzpeng Ijipt, Mz nzmnc-krdr elr, murde dzbi lc tqtaope mz drtc' nyzdr.
Nqvi lr Jekop nzmncting Ijipt trtqki r yiz, x Yawe batrpzle nzkqlunepx-krdr. X nzxplr-krdr myaszpxle lr Ijipt, enqmi rdrng.
Delc lr Ijipt tzngyatingr drtwrdr leplz nedeng kcng tzangiolr nide. X sc tzatrkatipelr nidr mz nzawz-nrbalq-krdrleng x sc tznibqtipe-kzpzlr doa ncblo nedrng mzli kc mztr tzmc-ngrdr.
Delc Yawe tqatwzlr-ngrbzle Mosis kxnzawz nede, Nidr mz Eron kc tqmcpxle, murde naokatrlr leplz nedeng Ijipt.
X sc tzale-ngrdr rkx ngr Gct kxmatq kxkqlu elr, Mz nzngi-batr-krbzle nzrwzngr da kxnzkctipxng mz mqdr x mz natqdr.
Awx-nzlo-ngrbz Yawe mrnyzdr, A' natqde trnzvz-nqblqpwzlru lr Ijipt.
Ngi-batrpzle nzlrtipxkr lue nyzdrng mepyr X nzbztingr nc nedrng.
Drtc' atwrnrngr yrbuti mz frck, X nznulvzpx-kzplr ma nyz king.
Yawe kapxle natqde X mc badr mclrla nzyrkrpx-pnz-ngrng nrlarnrlc nyzdr.
Atwzlr-ngrmle muli-aes apule tewa kxdc, X bzlrpc tqpctipx zlwz mrnyzdr.
Odatile nqvi lr dakxnzng mz nrlanc nyzdr X plameitio-kzle nounc nyzdr amrlx.
Yawe kapxle natqde X blzmr kionabr kx rblx nzrlwxngr nzlvcmqng.
Nzngqtilr dakxnzng kxnzpeting Mz nrlanc nyzdr amrlx.
Zbz Yawe sc tqnibqtipe-kzle doa ncblo kx ayrnrngr Mz ma nyz lr Ijipt amrlx.
Mz nibrde sc tqmailzpele lr Israel mz nzrlasz-krdr Ijipt, nzrtwzng silvz x gol. X trpnzngr nidr kxnzyagoxng, a' nzxplrng.
X lr Ijipt nzabrtzlvzlr nzrlasz-krdr nidr. Murde nzmwxlrtilr da kx naprtzbz badr mz nzlolvz-mou-krdrleng.
Yawe yrlqbzle dcbz ngrlx murde navz-nqblq leplz nedeng, X mz nrlckxbq yrlq-kzpzle nyr nayzlrbz badr.
Nzrlxbzng bade dakxnzng x atwzlro-ngrmle kio kxkqlu X dakxnzng kxkqlu kx nakrlcngr nelzdr.
Ayrlepxmle lue mz kzdq rplz kxetu, X lue lc yrle lzke apule lue kxvo.
Delc Yawe sc tqyc-zvzngr mz drtwrde natqde kxtr Kc tqpibzle mz kxnzawz nede, Ebraam.
Zbz sc tqmailzpxpele leplz nedeng kcng tqmcpxle, X nzngr-zvzng x nzmalq-zvz-kzng mz nzabrtz-krdr.
Kabzle drtc' ngr lr mrkzbleng mz leplz nedeng, X nztwz-kzlr nrlanc nyzdrng x da amrlx kx nzvzpxmqng mz nzwz-krdrng.
Murde leplz nedeng navz-nqblqlr loukxtr scdeng X nayrlq-angidrlr natqdeng. Naglqpxku Yawe.
Naglqpxku Yawe! Murde aodu-zvzle nigu. Awi-ngrbzku bade nzmrlz-esz'ngr-krde.
Trpnzngr leplz kx rkrlz nzrpipx-angidrngr rkx amrlx kcng tqwz-ngrde, X nzrglqlzngr amrlx trkrlzpxpwzleu nzmyalz-esz'ngr-krde.
Yawe, natqm rpile kx sa namrlzbz mz leplz kcng tzaleng da kxtubq, X trpnzngr da kxtrka mz nzao-krdr drtwrdr.
Nadcpxngr mz drtwrm ninge, mzli kc naokatr-ngrn leplz nemqng, X aprtr-kzpz ninge badr, mzli kc na-arlapx-ngrn nidr.
Murde na-axvctr-kzpo badr mz nzamnc-zpwx-krm nidr, X mz nzabrtz-krdr x nzbilvz-krdr nzngini-krdr leplz nemqng.
A' axvctr-lzbq-kzpzkr mz melrmqgrng mz alwx ngrdrng. X vz-nqblq-kzkr nzvz-rbr-krdr mz da kxtrka.
Mzli kc tzmncngr melrmqgrng Ijipt, Trnzkrlz-zpwxlru rkx kcng tqaletiqng, X trnzaotiu drtwrdr nzwrde kcng kqlu tqaelwa-ngrbzme nivz lrm badr. X mrkc Prla Bla nzrnzlvzolr nim kc tqmyalz-esz'ngr.
Kxmule-esz', a' arlapxq nidr mz nzvz-nqblq-krde nzesalz-krm. Murde na-aelwapx-ngrn nzmyapxkr zmatq ngrm.
Lclvzq Prla Bla x sc tqakipx-lzbqpe x noude pzlz-kzp. X sc tqmailzpeq leplz nemqng elr.
Arlapxq nidr mz nzaopx-krbzme drtqdr mz mq lr Ijipt, Enqmi rdr kcng tzpxtxpx-ngrdr nidr.
A' prla yrle-etr mou x akq-pnzle enqmi rdrng, X trpnzngr nidr kx rlapx.
Mzli lcpe sc tzlxngiti ate leplz nemqng natqmqng, X sc tzngrpeng mz nzglqlz-krdr nim.
A' mzli trboiu sc tqmrbrtrpe mz drtwrdr nikeng aletiq, Mz nzvz-nqblq-kai-krdr me pnz drtwrdr x nim kc ate.
Mzli kc tzmnc-ngrdr lzke nzabzlr nim, Mz nzrlx-krbzlr ncvr animol, murde drtwrdr rblx nzesapx-krdr.
X kabzme badr da kc tzsuti drtwrdr, Vzmi zyagox kxtrka mz nzayrplapx-krm nidr.
Mzli lcng li kzdung ncblo tzrnzlvzolr Mosis, Ncdr Eron kc tqngi kxnzawz kxtr nem.
Zbz drtc' glqwi x lvxpx-lzbq mz nzyrtzmq-amrna-krde kxnzrmailz lcng, Datan ncdr Abiram, nidr badr lr ma nyzdr x kztedrng amrlx.
X atwzlr-kz-ngrpe' nyr mz kzdq ncblo x kxdrka'ngr kc-kzng tzvz-nqblqlr nide, X nzngcting amrlx ngrdr.
X mz nou Newz Saenae nzwz-ngrdr mz gol kc mqngr kzu. X sc tzangiopelr nide.
Nztekqtrlr nzangio-krdr Kxrpalz kc tqmyalz, tqrwzngr kzu amrlx, Mz nzangio-alzu-krdr mqngr kzu kc tzwz-ngrdr esz'-krdr.
Trycneu mz drtwrdr nim kc tqarlapxle nidr. Tqrtrngzbz rkx kxmatq mrkc Ijipt, Tqwz-ngrde da kcng tqmrlzvxing elr, X tqalele da kcng tzkctipxng mrkc Prla Bla.
<range>
Delc tqrpipe-ngrn kx naodatipeq leplz nemqng. A' Mosis kc tqmcpxq, awxobzle zngya ngr drtwrm, x trodatiwq nidr.
A' mz nibrde nzpxtxpx-ngrdr nzprtrngr mz drtc' kxmrlz kc tqkabzme badr, Murde nzmwxlr-zlwzng x trnzlxngitilru nzesalz-krm.
Nzmnc-txpwzng lzke x drtwrdr lctrpz mz kztedrng mz nzlitr-krbz drtwrdr bam. X trnzvz-nqblqlru nim.
Zbz sc tqesalzpebzme badr Kx sa nanibqtiq nidr lzke.
X sa nangi-batrpzme mz doa nedrng nzakitikr nrlc nidr, Mz nzmnc-krdr badr kxtrnzrlxngitiung x nabztineng mrkzbleng.
Zbz mz Newz Peo, leplz nemqng nzprtr-kzpzng mz nzangio-krdr gct kc drtqde Baal. X nzmu-kzng blz krde, kxmule-esz' nide gct kxbz kxnzlz.
Delc tqngyatingr drtwrm nidr X sc tqdwatipebz zyagox kx nabz-ngrdr.
A' Finizs twzpele zmatq x nibqle doa kcng li tqvzkipxm nzkxpungr, X zyagox kc sc tqayrkrpxpeq.
Nzwzkr Finizs lc tubq mz nzobq-krm. X nzryapwxtipxngr nide trpnzngr nzmrbr-krde.
Mz aulz ngr Meriba, nzangyati-kzpzlr drtwrm. X da kcng tzalelrng atalvzobzle drtwr Mosis, X sc tqvz-rbrpe mz nzycmne-ani-krde. Delc tr-rlr-ngrpwzmeu nzprtr-krde mz drtc' nyzm, X nzkxpu-krde lc vzpxm mz natq kc tqpibzle Mz leplz lcng nardr tqmqngi.
<range>
Mz nzprtrkr leplz nemqng mz drtc' nyzm Pibzme badr kx nanibqtilr lr Kenan kcng tzmncng elr. A' nzpxtxpx-ngrdr nzvz-nqblq-krdr natqm, Mz nzrlr-krbzlr nzrlapx-krdr.
X nzyrlz-etrng badr kxnzmnc-mrbrng, X nztwzlr nqmq krdrng.
Nzangiolr mqngr drka' rdr. X krlc lrpzki r nzodatingr nidr.
Nzrlr-ngrbzlr doa ncblo x doa olvz nedrng Nzngini-krdr blz kx nzkabz mz mqngr drka' kxnzlz lr Kenan. X mz nzpulio-krdr mepyr ngr doa nedrng kxnzmrlzng, Nzatrkati-zlwz-ngrdr drtc' kc tqkabzme badr.
<range>
X nzatrkati-lzbq-kzng mz da lc tzalelr, Mz nzapusr-lzbq-krdr olvz kc tqrlaszle krnalzde.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, sc tqngyatipe drtwrm leplz nemqng, X pxtxpx-ngrn nidr.
Rlrpx-ngrn nzaovxiokr kxnzmnc-mrbrng nidr, Murde na-aclvepeng enqmi rdrng.
X enqmi lcng nzayrplatipxlr nidr, Mz nzmnclz-krbzlr badr.
Nzwrde kqlu kx arlapx-ngrn nidr, A' sc tqsuti zvz drtwrdr nzmncngr kx na-atrkatingr nim.
A' mzli kc tzyrni-ngrbzlr bam, xlrbzme natqdr. X vztitx drtwrm nidr murde nzkxpu-krdr.
Leplz lcng nemqng, dekc tqycngr mz drtwrm Nzesz'tikr Drtwrmu Badr, X trayrplapx-zvzwq nidr, murde aodu-zvz-kzq nidr.
X ngi-batrpzme nzyckr mz drtwr enqmi rdr Kcng tzaovxiolr nidr.
Yawe, Gct rgr, arlapx nigr mz mq kxtrnzrlxngitiung, Mz nzvzmi-kr-mope' nigr mz drtc' nyzgr. Murde na-awibzkr bam X naglqlzkr drtqm kxtr.
Naglqlzku Yawe, Gct rgu, nigu lr Israel, Tqvzpe, tqvzpe. Naglqlzku Yawe. Leplz narpilr kx, “Eu, angida!” Naglqpxku Yawe.
Na-awi-ngrbzku mz Yawe nzmrlz-esz'ngr-krde. Murde aodu-zvzle nigu.
Naglqlz-zvzku nide, Murde arlapxbzle nigu mz mq enqmi rgung,
Mz nzkapx-krmle nigu mrkzbleng mz nrlc tulvzo. Murde nayrlwr-lxblrku mz drtc' nyzde.
Kzdung nigu nzayoneng lzke, Me trpnzngr lrpzki kx narmcti-ngrdr mztea kx namnc-ngrdr.
Kztegu lcng nzbrtale-zlwzng, nzbrlxkz-zlwzng, X mztr tclvrting.
Zbz sc tzkqlepelr Yawe, Kc tqkatxpxpebzle nzkxpu-krdr.
Mailzle nidr mz lrpzki kxtubq, Vz, vz nzkrlzbzlr mztea kx namnc-zpwx-ngrdr.
Rkabz lue mz kxnzbrlxkzng, X dakxnzng kxmrlzting mz kxnzbrtaleng. “Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm kc tqyc tqyc, eu. Okatr-zvzq nigr. Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm.”
<range>
Kzdung nigu nzatolva-ngrng mz presin, Mz nzmncpx-krmlr me tungr nzlo.
Murde nzrnzlvzolr lou sc Gct kc tqmyatxlz-esz'ngr, X drtqdr sa kz nzrlolvzngr nzalvztr-krdeng.
Delc tqngi-batr-ngrbzle nzetqkr drtqdr mz nzwz-kato-krdr. X nzyangrngapeng, a' trpnzngr kx naokatrle nidr.
Zbz sc tzkqlepelr Yawe, Kc tqkatxpxpebzle nzkxpu-krdr.
Aopxbzle drtqdr mz da kc tzatolva-ngrdr, X vzmipxmleng mz nabz nzlo mz zyzlr.
Zmatq ngrde myaszpxle naonrx ngr presin, Mz nzodati-atwrnr-krdele. “Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm kc tqyc tqyc, eu. Okatr-zvzq nigr. Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm.”

Kzdung nigu nzpxtxpx-ngrdr Yawe mz nzngqngu-krdr, X ayrplapxle nidr mz alwx ngrdrng mz nzbatr-krbzle nzyagox-zlwz-krdr.
Mzli lc nzpxpe-ngrdr nzmungr, X nabzpeng.
Zbz sc tzkqlepelr Yawe, Kc tqkatxpxpebzle nzkxpu-krdr.
Yawe amrlzle nrkrdrtqdr mz zyagox lcng mz nzycmnetx-krpwzle. Delc tzrlapx-ngrdr mz nzbzngr.
“Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm kc tqyc tqyc, eu. Okatr-zvzq nigr. Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm.
Abrtz-zlwz-ngrgr nim nzkatxpx-krbzme Nzkxpu-krgrngq. Abrtz-zlwz-ngrgr nim. Naglqpx-zvzkr nim mz nzngr-krgr nabz, X mz nzale-krgr blz. Naglqpx-zvzkr nim.”
Kzdung nigu nzalilvcneng mz lcsu prla, Murde nzrtrngztibzlr nzmabz-krdr elr.
Kztegu lcng nzmclr zmatq ngr Yawe, Mz da kx aleting dcpwe.
Mzli kc tqycmneti-ngrdr nenq, x trlipu r nenq kc tqwqpe. X batrpzle nzvzdz-krm ebio wq.
Ebio lc glqtxlzle lcsu scdr wq. X twzo-moule mrbrobz mz mzlirdr mz kztedeng. Trlipu lc avzdzmle nelzdr x alibzle drtwrdr.
Dea-ngrdr tqvzne x nztaneng nzapulr ncblo kxnzrmnqng. X trpengr da kx nakrlzlr kx nartrngztibzlr.
Zbz sc tzkqlepelr Yawe, Kc tqkatxpxpebzle nzkxpu-krdr.
Ycmnebz mz nenq x sc tqamaope, Mz ebio x nrwx kc tqvope.
Kztegu lcng nzabrtztx-zlwz-ngrdr nzvopekr nrwx, X sc tqmailztrpeng Gct mz nabzn kc naokitrlr.
“Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm kc tqyc tqyc, eu. Okatr-zvzq nigr. Awi Yawe, mz nivz lrm.
Napipxbzkr nimq mz mz lrtzlvzng, X mz leplz amrlx. Napipxbzkr nimq.”
Yawe apztx-atwrnr-ngrde lue kxnzetuting, X aesakile nzyrlelz-krm aulzng,
X apiz-kzle drtc' murde trpnzngr da kx nalvcpu mrlcde, Mz nzayrplapx-krde kxdrka'-ngrng kcng tzmncng elr.
A' me ngi drta'ngr ngi nabzdeng kx lrngr lue, X drtc' kx mingrting yrlelz-ngrm aulzng.
Murde navzmimle melrmqgung kxnzbrtaleng namncng mrlcde, Mz nzwz-krdr mztea nyzdr kx namnc-ngrdr.
Nzrwz-ngrng nrlanc x nzpetilr nounc, X nzrnginanqng dakxnzng x nranc kxkqlu.
Amrlz-zvzle nidr x ngi-batrpzle nzrmika-krdr doa kxkqlu, X nzkqlunepxkr animol nedrng.
Mzli kznike leplz nzobqszo-ngrdr nigu Mz nzatalvzo-krbzlr drtwrgu x nzaetq-zlwz-krbzlr drtqgu,
Gct kc tqobqszo-ngrde kxnzetung kxnzglqpx-lzbqng, X batrpzle nzayone-krdr nzapulr kx trpnzngr me tutrngr nzvzne-krdr.
A' katxpxbzle nzkxpu-krgu, nigu leplz txneng, X aclvele nigu mz nzapu-krgu sip nedeng.
Kxnztubqng nzmclr nqmq krde x nzabrtz-zlwz-ngrdr. A' kxdrka'-ngrng nzwx-nabu-txpwzng.
Krkcng tzyrplapxng nakrlzlr da lcng Mz nzaotikr drtwrdr nzetukr nzaodukr Yawe nigu.

Sa na-angrlvzx nim mz nabznge atwrnrngr mz nzayrni-krbo gita bam, Murde abrtr-zvzbo drtwrnge bam. Nilz r nepi adwalzmle ninge mz zbq kang kqlu. A' mz nzdwalz-krmc mz nourla kx topwz, Na-apule nabz nenge adwalzmle nepi, Mzli lc tqglqlzpex nim.

Yawe, sa na-awibo bam mz mzlir lr mrkzbleng, X na-angrlvzx nim mz mzlir neidung.
Murde nzaodu-zvz-krm myalz krlzlzle bongavz, X nzangidati-zvz-krm natqm.
Lr Heven namclr nzmyalz-esz'ngr-krm, X lr nrlc namclr nzaovxio-krm.
Mz zmatq ngrm, arlapx nigr kcng tqaodu-zvzq, X ayzlu-ngrme natqgr.
Gct, natqmqng nzvzpxmqng mz Mangr-nzangiongr, mz nzrpi-krdr kx, “Mzli kc na-aovxio-ngrne, sa na-akipxbo mz leplz nengeng Drtc' kcng mz nrlar LueJodzn rlilr.
Murde neidu lr Gilead nengeng. X nqvi lr Manase nenge-kzng. X neidu lr Efrem tum mz nibrnge. X nqvi lr Judz kx na-aclve-zvzng mz zmatq rnge.
A' enqmi rmung trna-aovxiolru nimu. Murde lr Moab sa nawztrpqng bange X lr Edom sa nametxmqng bange. X sa namalqlvzx nzmilxtxo-krnge lr Filistia.”
?Gct, sa na-atutrq natqm lc mz nzokatr-krm ninge, Nzprtr-krnge mz lrpalvc ngr mzteadau nyzdr lr Edom?
Murde mzli kc axtxpeq nigr, X trokatrwq ami negr mz nzotangr.
Gct, okatrp nigr mz nzota-krgr badr enqmi rgrng mzli ka. Murde mane nzmnc-xgle-krgr ncblo nzarlapx-krdr nigr.
X krlzkr kx mz nzmnc-krme bagr, Sa narnzlvzokr enqmi rgrng mz nzokatr-krm.
Gct, glqlz-zvzx nim. Bzkq anabume bange x obqlvz-txpwzme ninge.
Murde kxdrka'-ngrng kxnzesabrng nzycmnetr-ngrdr ninge Mz nzpokiatitr-krdr ninge.
Nzatrkati-krdr ninge trpnzngr noude, A' nzrpiting natq kx trmrlzu.
Kxmule-esz' aodux x krka'-ngrneng nidr, A' nzayzlu-alzuplr mz natq ngr nzpokiangr.
Kxmule-esz' alebo badr da kxmrlzting mz nzngini-krnge kztedr, A' nzale-alzupqng bange da kxtrka mz nzapu-krdr enqmi rngeng.
Yawe, suti drtwrnge kx na-ayrplapxq ncblo kc tqycmne-atrkatile ninge Mz nzvz-nqblq-krde natqnge kcng napibo bam mz nzngini-krnge kxnzawz nem. Mzli kc navz-ngrde mz kot, kzdq kxdrka'ngr natubz mz nibrde, X mrlz kzdq enqmi rde nanginide majzstret.
Bzkq rlr-ngrbzme nzaovxio-krde, A' nzkrka'-krde na-aelwapx-ngrde nzvz-rbr-krde.
Bzkq amrlzq nide, a' nabz ani, X natekqtr ncblo kzble mz nzngini-krde kxrmailz.
Nabzsz-kzle doa nedeng x olvz rde, Murde trpengr kx na-aclve-angidrle nidr.
Naodatitxde ma nyz doa nedeng, Murde navztxneng mz nzrlx-krdr dakxnzng.
Mz nzrka-niwzlr-krdr trau kx rlxti trtedr, nayrkrtxpxngr dztudrng amrlx. X lr mrkzbleng napnatibzlr da kx atatrple mz nzwz-krde.
Bzkq kx nivz lrde mrlzbz bade, X bzkq kx ycngr drtwrde doa nedeng.
Nabzng badr lr ma nyzdeng amrlx, Murde bzkq kx nardctipx mou drtwr nqvi lrde.
Nadcpx mz drtwrm nqmq kr melrmqdeng kc tqtrka, X bzkq ipqpxq alwx ngr lxede.
Mrkc Heven nadcpx zvz mz drtwrm alwx ngrdrng, A' mz nrlc enqmi lcng namrbrtr alo mz drtwr.
Rlxtibo bam da lcng murde mrlx lc trpnzngr kx mrlzti nivz lrde, A' armzkiti x rnibqti leplz txneng kxtrnzrngiscung x kx drtwrdr talvzo zlwz.
Mrlzbz bade nzpilz-zvz-krde leplz. Delc mrlzvxitx na-ayzlu-mou-ngrbz bade nzpilz-krdeng. X pxtxpx-ngrde nzale-krbzle da kxmrlz mz leplz. Delc tqpxtxpx-ngrne nzrka-ngrbz da kxmrlz bade.
Tresakiu nzpilz-krde leplz. Delc nzayzlu-krbzmeleng bade naxngitx-pnzbzle. Mrlz nzpilz-krm nide na-apule lue kx mingrtr mz nrkrdrtqde, X tolo kx na-alqtipwzle me xvcngr nrvr ngrde.
X na-apu-kzle lrpz kc tqkq-ngrde X amqngitr nrkalo.
Yawe, Kxetu rnge, kxmule-esz' rlxtibo bam nzayrplapx-krm enqmi rngeng Kcng tzpibqtilr ninge, A' rlxti-kzpo bam nzamrlz-krm ninge x nzokatr-krm ninge mz nzvz-nqblq-krde Natqm. X arlapx ninge mz nzvz-nqblq-krde nzmrlzkr nzaodu-krm ninge.

Kx nzmc ninge nzyrpalelvzlr ninge, X nzmcpxmlr nctqdr bange.
Yawe, Gct rnge, okatrp ninge, kxnzawz nem! Arlapx ninge mz nzvz-nqblq-krde nzaodu-krm ninge.
Murde enqmi rngeng nakrlz-zpwxlr kx arlapxq ninge Mz zmatq ngrm kx xplr-esz'ngr.
Yawe, kxmule-esz' enqmi rngeng nzpibqtilr ninge, a' amrlz ninge, X aovxio nidr murde nabilvzx nim.
Batrpz nzavzo-lzbq-krdr, Murde nzamyati-krbzme drtqdr naopx mz mz leplz.
Yawe, sa na-awi-zlwzbo bam, Mz nzglqlz-krnge nim mz mzlir leplz nemqng.
Murde nim kc tqtubz mz nibr ncblo txne, Mz nzarlapx-krm nide mz mq kxnzabetitrlr nide, murde nabz-ngrde.
Yawe rpibzle mz King kc tqngi Kxetu rnge kx, “Wxbu mrlc tqmatq-esz'ngr mz nrlarnge kxrtc, Navz nakrlz-zpwxbzle mzli kc nangi-batr-ngrbo mz enqmi rmqng nzmetx-krbzlr bam.”
Murde Yawe sa nangi-batr-kzpzle nzetunepxkr zmatq ngrm mz nzvzpx-krme Jerusalem, Mz nzaovxio-krm enqmi lcng.
X mzli lcde, drtq leplz nemqng sa navq zlwz nzprtr-krbzlr mz ami nem, Murde namailzq nidr mz zmatq ngrm kc tqluli, tqtr. X obla nemqng sa navzmqng naprtr-kzpzng bam mz nzaxplr-mou-krdr ami nem. Na-apubzlr badr mi kc tqvzom mz nzrka-krbzle nzlungr kxmrna mz nabr.
X Yawe esalz-ngrde drtqde x trnatekqtrleu drtwrde. Rpile kx, “Nim King nenge, nangini-alo-kzp pris mz nzvz-nqblq-krde nzwzkr Melkesidek.”
X Yawe sa natubz mz nibrm, Mz nzmilxtxo-krde king kxnzkqlung mz zngya ngr drtwrde.
X sa na-ayrplapxle lr mrkzbleng mz nznibqti-krde nidr amrlx. X sa na-aovxio-atwrnr-ngrde king rdrng mz nrlc tulvzo.
X nim, King rnge, mz nzvz-krm lc, nzxplr-kato-krm sa namatqnepx kz. X sa na-aovxio-atwrnr-ngrn nrlc.
wi Yawe! Glqpxku Yawe! ilvzx nide mz nabznge atwrnrngr, mz nzyrlwr-lxblr-krgr badr leplz nedeng.
lvele nrlc x da kcng tqwz-ngrde, tqaletileng nzmyalzng. elc, leplz amrlx na-aotingr drtwrdr da lcng mz nzabrtzlvz-krdrleng.
u, da lcng amrlx nzaelwapx-ngrdr zmrlue x zmatq rde. lqpxku nztubq-krde kc tqvzpe tqvzpe.
pqle nigu mz zmrlz ngrde kxmyalz x ycngr drtwrde nigu. zsle nigu x nayc zvz mz drtwrgu rkx ngrdeng.

z nzaprc-krbzle drtc' ngr lr mrkzbleng mz doa nedeng, ide kc tqaelwapx-ngrbzle zmatq rde badr.
katrle nidr mz nzaclve-krdeng kxtubq. rlxpx-zvzle da angidr x nzrsakrlrngr.
kapx zvz natq kx rsakrlrngr. a na-atutrleng murde nqmq krde mrlz x tubq.
akitrde nzangio-krgu drtqde kxtr mz nzamrluengr murde z-nqblq-zvzle nzesalz-krde x iti nelzde nzarlapx-krde leplz nedeng. aelwapx-ngrgu nzyrplapx-krgu mz nzamrlue-krgu nide. awe kabzle nzrkrlz-angidrngr mz krkcng tzyrlq-angidrlr natqde. bq kalvz nzrglqpxngr nide navz zvz x tqvzpe, tqvzpe.

wibzku mz Yawe! Murde amrlzle ncblo kx ilvzle natqde x amrluele nide.
lvele mrnyzde kcng naxplrng mz nzaclve-krdr. oa nedeng kxnztubqng, sa na-amrlz Gct.
salz-ngrbz Gct bade da kxmrlzting kxkqlu. ct okatrle nide murde natubq.
pq ncblo lc kztedeng mz nzvz-nqblq-krde zmrlz ngrde, nzryckr drtwrde, x nztubq-krde. zsle da kx naokatrle leplz kc-kzng, mz nzngini-krbzle lrpzki badr.
abzle da kxkqlu mz krkcng trnzrngiscung. alztqbzle mz Gct x alele da kx rsakrlrngr mz nzwz-krde.
urde ncblo kxtubq kxtr-rnrcti-lzbqu adcpx zvz mz drtwr leplz.
bqtipx-zvzle Yawe x rlxpxle kx nabzde trtaprlzpuu mz nrpa kxtrka.
?nrcti-lzbq-ngrde? Trtingr, a' tu-amqngile. a namcle nzaovxiokr Yawe enqmi rdeng.
resakiu nzrka-krbzle da mz kxrsuti drtwr. z zvz nzayzlu-krbz Gct bade mz nqmq krde lc tqtubq. xbu me matq mz mzlir leplz.
angya drtwr kxdrka'-ngrng mzli kc namc-ngrdr nide. cpwz pipz kxdrka'-ngrng lcng sa namrbr, x mane nzmadqti-krdr nqngidr mz zngya. bz da amrlx kcng tqmrlzbz badr sa nangitx brmrda x sa na-apulr zsikapu kx ngilia.
Naglqlzku Yawe! Nigu kxnzawz nedeng na-armyalzku drtqde.
Nayzuo mzli ka nzrglqpxngr drtqde Tqvzpe, tqvzpe.
Mz zbq kang kqlu nigu leplz mz nrlc tulvzo Na-awi-ngrbzku bade nqmq krde.
Murde aclve-atwrnr-ngrde lr mrkzbleng amrlx. X nzetukr zmatq ngrde krlzlzbzle bongavz.
Trpnzngr kx apule Yawe kc tqngi Gct rgu, Mz nzwxbutxlz-krde mz tron nyzde Heven.
Sc tqobqlvztile bongavz x drtc', Mz nzaclve-angidr-krdeleng.
Murde naokatrle leplz kx trnzrngiscung, Mz nzkapx-krmle nidr mz nzkxpu-krdr.
X armyalzle nidr murde nanginidr nradrtq kxnzetung Kcng tzmailzlr leplz nedeng.
Ngi-batrpzle mz olvz kxvz-nrbalq nzrngine-krde doa kxnztopwzng, Murde na-abrtz-ngrde doa nede lcng. Naglqlzku Yawe!
Mzli kc lr Israel nzrlasz-ngrdr Ijipt, Mz nzngini-krdr lr mrkzbleng elr,
Lr Judz lcng tznginipedr leplz kxnztrng ne Yawe, Mz nzaclve-krde drtc' nyzdr, Israel.
Prla Bla akipx-lzbq x pzlzm. X LueJodzn lvxpxbzle lrpzki badr.
X mzli lc newz x nra nzyameng, Nzapulr nzblc-abrtznekr nei sip.
?Myx kxmule, Prla Bla tqakipx-lzbq-ngrde, X LueJodzn tqlvxpx-ngrde lrpzki?
?X nike nzyamengr newz x nra amrlx Mz nzapu-krdr nzabrtzkr nei sip?
Da kcng tqwzngr Yawe nzvz-nqblqlr natqde. Nzelalvzlr nzaelwapx-krde zmatq ngrde, mz nzngini-krde Gct r lr Israel.
Murde batrpzle nzyrlepx-krm lue mz rplz, Lue lc tqngi aulz mz rplz.
Yawe, nim txpwz kx takitrde nzarmyalzngr, a' trngiu nigr. Murde nim txpwz kx aodu zvz x trataowq natqm kcng tqyrlqq.
Delc trtakitrdeu lr mrkzbleng nzrpi-zvz-krmlr bagu kx, “?Myxpe Gct rmu?”
Murde Gct rgu mncom Heven, X rngisc zmatq ngr nzale-krde nikeng suti drtwrde.
A' kxnzmnc-mrbrng nzangiolr mqngr da kxnzlz Kcng tzwzngr leplz mz mqdr.
A' mqngr da kxnzlz lcng trnzycmneung x trnzobqung. Trnzxlrung, trnzycminiung, X trnzrtcngiung da. Trnzrmaleung x trnzvzneung.

Bzkq rlr-ngrbzme mz kxnzglqpx-lzbqng nzatrkati-krdr ninge. A' amnc zpwx ninge.

Okatrp nzyrplapx-krnge, Murde nakrlz-angidrx nzaolvz-krmqng.
Yawe, mzli r nzayrplapx-krm leplz dekape. Murde nzrnzlvzo-zvzlr Loukxtr scm.

akitrde nzlolvz-amqngi-krnge nzalvztr-krmqng Murde nzmrlz-zlwzng.

Nayc mz drtwrm ninge, Da kc tqwaibzme mz krkcng tzamrluelr nim.

z-nqblq-zvzq nzmncngr kxtubq-esz'ngr, X drtwr kcng tqyrlqq rsakrlrngr.

Zngya ngr drtwrnge apule nyr kc tqngc, Murde enqmi rngeng mrbrtr mz drtwrdr Nzryrngrkxtr.
Nzesalz-krm pq zlwz mz drtwrnge Murde angidati-zvzme bange.

Yawe, nztubq-krm tqyc, tqyc, X Loukxtr scm ngi da angidr zvz.
Delc kxmule-esz' nzkxpungr x nzvzkr drtwr nzprtzmqng bange, A' abrtz-ngrne nzo-zli-zvz-krnge nzti rm.

ztx-ngrpwo nzkrka'-krbo bam. X ayzlum natqnge, murde nao-zlix lrpzki rm.

Obqtx-zvzx mz nrlckxbq, Mz nzaotikr drtwrnge me pnz drtwrm.

Nzmu trna-abrtrpwzkuu drtwrgu mz Yawe Mz nzrka-krmle dakxnzng bagu, Mane nzo-rlangr mz nzwz-katongr x nzyzlu-ngrm mz nina, Murde krlz-kzle nzrka-krmle da bagu mzli kc tqmwi-ngrgu.
X Yawe nide kz kx rkam doa kxnztopwzng mz nqvi lrgu, Mzli kc tqngi-oblabe-ngrgu. Murde mzli kc tqngi-lrtzlvzpe-ngrgu, doa lcng na-aclvelr nigu. Sa namrlzbz mz ncblo kc mrlxde tqkqlu. A' oliq-zvzq nzipq-krm nigr, Murde na-amrluekr nim.

A' nawzti-kaix dq ma kx namnc-ngrn, Mz nzngini-krm Gct r Jekop.”

Murde pris nemqng nayapwxtipxbzlr nztubq-esz'ngr-krm mz leplz nedrng, Kcng na-angrlvzlr nim.”
Yawe, mzli ka bzkq pxtxpx-ngrn king rgr kc tqmcpxbzme, A' atutr nzesalz-krbzme mz kxnzawz nem, King Devet.
Murde esalz-ngrbzme bade da kx trnzkatxu, Mz nzrpi-krbzme bade kx, “Sa nayrlqbo dq mrlxm kx nanginide king kx na-aclvele lr Israel mz nibrm.
X nzmu mrlxdrng nayrlq-angidrlr nzesz'tikr drtwrgr badr, X navz-nqblqlr natqnge kc tqkapxbo badr, Sa nangini-zvzdr king, Badr mrlxdrng, tqyc tqyc.”
Yawe, rlxtibzkr nzamrlz-krm king nem. Murde mcpxq Jerusalem nangi mztea nyzm,
Mz nzrpi-krm kx, “Krlc mztea kx namnc-alo-ngrne, Mz nzvz-nqblq-krde me pnz drtwrnge.
Sa nakabo mz lr mztea nyznge lc da kxmrlzting kxkqlu. X sa na-aputrx kxtrnzrngiscung murde nelzdr nakrlc x naesatxpx zpwx.
Sa nabatrpo mz pris nengeng nzyapwxtipx-krbzlr mz leplz nengeng nzarlapx-krnge nidr, Murde leplz kxnztr lcng namalqlvzlr ninge.
Sa nayrlqx king kc tqmatq Jerusalem kx navzpxm mz nqvi lr Devet, X nzaclve-krde trtxpnzngr nzesaki-krde.
Sa na-amyalzx nide mz nzalao-krbo kraon mz narde, A' sa nabatrpo nzmyakr drtq enqmi rdeng.”
Lqngipx x mrlzvxi Mzli kc leplz tzmnctr-lxblr-ngrdr mz nzesz'tikr drtwrdr.
Nzesz'tikr drtwr lqngipx apule nzyrleokr tolo mz nar Eron x nrpnr naode, krlzo-kzpzle lrpzde, Mzli kc tzaelu-ngrde tolo mz nzngini-krde Nardr Pris.
X nzesz'tikr drtwr mrlzvxi apule nzdco-krm tewa Mz newz nyzgung mrkc tqmingr zvz. Murde da kc tqmrlzting amrlx tqkam Yawe bagu nzvzpxmqng Jerusalem, Myapxbz nzmnc-zpwx-zvz-krgu mz drtc' nyzgu.
Naglqpxku Yawe, nigu kxnzawz nedeng. Naprtrku mz Mangr-nzangiongr nide.
Glalzku mqgu Mrkc Tqtr. Glqpxku Yawe mz nrlckxbq.
X krka'-ngrgr kx Yawe na-amrlzle nimu mz nzmnc-krde Mzteadau nyzde. Nide kc tqwz-ngrde bongavz x drtc'.
Naglqlz-zvzku Yawe, Murde nide Gct rgu. X nigu kxnzawz nedeng na-amrlueku nide Mz nzkrka'-krmu mz Mangr-nzangiongr x makoa ngrde.
<range>
Na-amatqku nide murde mrlz-esz'ngr. X na-angrlvz-ngrgu nide nivz lrde.
Murde mcpxle nqvi lr Jekop, nigu lr Israel, Mz nzngini-krgu leplz nedeng.
Krlzku kx Kxetu rgu, Yawe, nide Gct kc tqmyatxlz-esz'ngr, Myaszlzle kxnzmncng mzlilxlr amrlx.
Vz-nqblq-txpwzle me pnz drtwrde mz da kx alele Kxmule-esz' mz bongavz, nrlc, prla, x me boo-ngrng.
Wz-ngrde zbo nzvzdz-krdr mz lclxlr mz bongavz, X bzlrpc nzvzmi-krm trlipu le. X batrpzle nzwqkr nenq.
Sc tqnibqtile ncblo kx ayrnrngr Ijipt, Kr neng leplz x kr neng animol.
Rwzngr da kxnzkctipxng kxkqlu mrlcde, Mz nzayrplapx-krde king rdr x kxnzetu nedeng.
Aovxiole lr mrkzbleng kxkqlu Mz nznibqti-krde king kxnzxplr-zlwzng.

Leplz kxnzkqlung mrkc Jerusalem x me nzyc-aepztimqng mz provins kc Judiz, x mrkcng amrlx tqo-ngalele LueJodzn, nzvzmqng mz nzlalztq-krbzlr mz Jon.
Nzplxtipxbzlr alwx ngrdrng mz Gct, x sc tqawrkxtrpeng Jon mz LueJodzn.
Mzli kc tqmcngr Jon kx Farzsi x Sadiusi kxnzkqlung sc tzvzpe-kzpqng bade mrkc tqawrkxtr-ngrde leplz, drtwrde trmrlzu, x sc tqrpipebzle badr kx, “Nimu doa neng kxdrka'-ngrng kxnzodang! ?Neke rpibz bamu nzwrkxtrngr na-ayrbqpxle nimu mz nzayrplapxkr Gct kc navzm?
Nzwrkxtrtx-ngrpwz esz'-krde trna-arlapxleu nimu, a' na-aleamu da kx aelwapx-ngrde kx tekqtrpeamu nqmq nr drtwrmu kxtrka kx ycpxm mz nabzmu.
X bzkq rpiamu mz nimu esz'-krmu kx, ‘Rlapxpekr murde Ebraam ngi melrmqgr. X nigr angidr leplz kx mcpx Gct.’ Murde napibo bamu kx nzmu trnavz-nqblqwamuu lrpzki r Gct mz nzarlapx-krde leplz, krlzle nzbatr-krbzle neidu lr Ebraam nzvzpx-krmlr mz rplz lcng, mz nzatutr-krde da kx esalz-ngrbzle bade.
Gct apule ncblo kx twzle akes scde x oliqtile nzrlakitiongr nounc x rtctxlz-ngrde mz nyr, murde trnzpapx-ngrdru nradr kxmrlz. Sa tqoliqtile mzli ka nzangc-krde leplz mz nyr ngr nzayrplapxngr, murde nqmq krdr trtubqu x nzpxtxpx-ngrdr nztekqtr-krdrle.
“Awrkxtrx leplz mz lue txpwz namcngr kx tekqtrpeamu nqmq nr drtwrmu kc tqtrka. A' kzdq la ncblo sa navzm mz nibrnge. X da kx na-alele namyaszlz-moule ninge. Murde kxmule-esz' ninge kzdq profet, a' trtakitrdeu ninge nzwztr-krbo bade, x trtakitr-kzpwc'u nzrmalene-ngrbz sadol scde, murde myaszlz-zlwzle ninge. Sa na-awrkxtrle nimu mz Mqngrkxtr x nyr kx na-alqngile nimu.
Mz nzvz-krmle naoliqtinemle nzrpipx-krde nqmq kr leplz. Nakapxmle leplz kx nzmrlzng mz leplz kx nztrkang, mz nzamnc-angidrpe-krdeleng Heven. A' leplz kxnztrkang sc tqangcpeleng mz nyr kx ngc alo.”
Mzli lcde Jiszs rkalzm Gzlili Provins x vzm mz Jon mrkc mz LueJodzn mz nzawrkxtrkr Jon nide.
A' Jon abzle nzarlapx-lzbqngr mz nzawrkxtr-krde Jiszs. Rpibz Jon kx, “Nzmu na-awrkxtrbzme ninge! Trtakitrdeu nzawrkxtr-krbo nim!”
A' ayzlu-ngrbz Jiszs natqde kx, “Rlr-ngrbz kx nakxmupele lc mzli ka. Murde mz nzale-krgi da lc, dekc na-atutr-ngrgi me pnz drtwr Gct.” Zbz sc tqaolvzpebz Jon natqde.
Mz nibr nzwrkxtrkr Jiszs, mzli kcpwz tqvzdz-ngrmle mz lue kc, Heven lvxpx-lzbqbz bade. X mcle Mqngrkxtr vzom bade apule nran, x wxbuobz bade.
Zbz kzdq natq rpiomle Heven kx, “Mrlx lc nide Mrlxnge Kxnzmrlzti. X abrtzlvz-zlwzx nide.”
Zbz Mqngrkxtr sc tqmailztrpele Jiszs lzke, murde narlr-ngrbzle mz Setzn nzrtamitingr nide.
Mnctile lzke zbq nzpnu-pwx mzli kc tqaxtx-ngrbzle dakxnzng mz nzkrka'-krde. X mz nibrde nelzde kc tqbrtalepe.
Mzli lc Setzn sc tqvzpem bade, rpibzle kx, “Kx tqnginim Mrlx Gct, e aelwapx-ngrm bange x pibz mz rplz lcng nalrtipxlr bret.”
A' ayzlu-ngrbz Jiszs natqde kx, “Trtingr, murde nzyro mz Nzryrngrkxtr kx, ‘Doa trlutx-ngrpwzleu nzmu-krde dakxnzng, a' lu-kz-ngrde natq Gct.’”
Zbz Setzn kc tqvzmipele Jiszs Jerusalem, mzteadau kxtr, sc tqamncopemle mz kzdq me yctxlz zlwz mz Mangr-nzangiongr Yawe.
Sc tqrpipebzle kx, “Kx tqnginim Mrlx Gct, e atao-lzbq mrka. Trpnzngr nztakr-krm murde Nzryrngrkxtr rpile kx, ‘Pipebz Yawe mz enjrl nedeng nzaclve-krdr nim. Nzglqlr nim mz mqdr, murde nanycm ma tqtcprtr mz rplz.’”
A' rpibz Jiszs kx, “Trtingr. Murde Nzryrngrkxtr rpi-kzle kx, ‘Bzkq atalzamu Kxetu Yawe, Gct rmu.’”
Zbz Setzn vzmilz-kzle Jiszs mz newz kx myatxlz. Sc tqaelwape-ngrbzle mrkcng amrlx tqluli tzaclvelr king r nrlc.
Zbz rpibz Setzn mz Jiszs kx, “Nzmu narweome bange zpr mz nzangio-krm ninge mzli ka, e da lcng amrlx sc tqkatipebong bam.”
Rpibz Jiszs kx, “Rlasz ninge Setzn! Nzmu trangiowxu nim, murde nzyr mz Nzryrngrkxtr kx, ‘Angio txpwz Kxetu Yawe, kc tqngi Gct ngrm x wztxtrpwz bade!’”
Zbz Setzn kc tqrlaszpele Jiszs, x enjrl neng Gct nzvzmqng sc tzaclvepelr nide x tzrkapebzng nade dakxnzng.
Zbz kzdq ncblo adcpxbzle mz Jiszs kx Jon Kxawrkxtr nzadwatrpe mz presin. Zbz Jiszs sc tqrkalzpem Judiz Provins tqyzlupe Gzlili Provins.
Mz nzyzlu-krde mrlcde trmncu mztea Naszret, a' mnc Kzpznizm, kzdq taon kx yco mz nqlvi r Dxbu Gzlili. Kzpznizm yc mz nrlarnrlc kc tzmncngr neidu lr Sebyulon x Naftzli, lr Israel kcng bqnc.
Da lc tqale Jiszs atutrle natq profet Asaea kc bqnc, mz nzrpi-krde kx,
“Nimu lr Jiu namncamu mz mzlir kxtrngiulrJiu mz nrlarnrlc kcng Sebyulon x Naftzli. Drtc' nyzmu yc-aepztrpz mz lrpzki kc tqo-zlile Dxbu Gzlili, krlzbzle nqlvi r LueJodzn me prkilzm nepi.
Alwx ngr leplz kxnzmnc-mrbrng akamrbr-ngrde da mz nabzdr. Kxmule-esz' a' sa namclr ncblo kc na-apule zyzlr, kc tqpnamilxtile nabzdr, murde na-aopxbzle badr lrpzki kx navzkilr mz nzrlapx-krdr.”
Mzli lc tqmncpengr Jiszs Kzpznizm, sc tqayzutrpele nzwz-krde. Rpibzle mz leplz kx, “Tekqtramu nqmq nr drtwrmu mzli ka, murde Gct ycpe pipz nzvectr-krmle leplz bade mz nzmnclz-krbzlr bade mz nzngini-krde King rdr.”
Kzdq zbq Jiszs kx o-zlile kc nabz drta' ngr Dxbu Gzlili, rmctile ncblo nzling kx nzmwang. Saemon kc tqngi kz drtqde Pita, x mzlede Adru. Sc tzapoong br Dxbu Gzlili.
Zbz sc tqkqlepxpeng Jiszs, rpibzle badr kx, “Vz-nqblqmamu ninge, murde na-alvztrpo bamu nzrtangrngr leplz kx nangi nengeng.”
X mzli kcpwz nzrlasztx-pnzlr nzwz-krdr x sc tzvz-nqblqpelr nide.
Jiszs o-zli-mopwzle nabz drta', rmcti-moule mzle-lzbq nzling, Jemes x Jon, mrlxng Sebedi. Nzmncomqng badr trtedr mz bot scdr, tzngqtitrlr br scdr. Zbz sc tqkqlepxpebz Jiszs nidr.
Mzli kcpwz nzyrlqtxdr nzwz-krdr, x nzrlasztrplr trtedr mz bot scdr, x sc tzvz-nqblqpe-kzlr Jiszs.
Zbz Jiszs sc tqvztipele mztea ngr Gzlili amrlx, tqalvztrpe mz mangr-nzkrka'ngr nyzdr lr Jiu, x tqyapwxtipxle Nrpakxmrlz kx Gct sa tqvectrpemle leplz bade mz nzngini-krde King rdr. Mzli lc Jiszs amrlz-kzle kxnzyagoxng x kxnzdwatibzng zyagox kxtrka.
Zbz nrpa ngr Jiszs sc tqvzpe tqtalvzpxpele provins kc Siriz. X leplz ngr mztea lcng amrlx nzrvzmimqng mz Jiszs lr ma nyzdr kxnzdwatibz zyagox kx bletipx-lxblrng. Kzdung nzyagox-zpwxng, kzdung drtqdr vetq, kzdung nrkrdrtqdr bz, kzdung nzglqng nimz, x kzdung nzdwaszng drka'. Jiszs amrlz-moule leplz lcng amrlx.
Mzli lc, zbo ngr leplz kxetu sc tzma-nqblqtipelr Jiszs, kxmule-esz' nznginidr lr Jiu o kxtrngiulrJiu, murde namclr da kx na-alele. Leplz lcng nzprpxmqng mz nrlarnrlc kcng mz taon kcng nzpnu-esz', mz Provins kc Gzlili, Provins kc Judiz, x mzteadau Jerusalem x mz nrlar LueJodzn kc tqprkilzm nepi.
Mzli kc tqmcngr Jiszs zbo ngr leplz kcng tzvzmqng bade, sc tqvzdzpe mz kzdq nra mz nzalvztr-krde nidr. X ncblo nedeng nzwxbu-ngalelvzlr nide mrkc tqwxbu-ngrde.
X sc tqrpipebzle mz nzalvztr-krde nidr kx,
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzkrlz-krmu kx mnc-xgleamu nzokatrkr Gct, murde Gct sa nakabzle bamu da kx vzpxm mz nzngini-krde King rmu.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzvzkr drtwrmu, murde Gct sa na-amqtrpzle nabzmu.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzavzo-lzbq-krmu, murde Gct sa nakabzle bamu zmatq mz nzaclve-krmu mz nrlc.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzpqkr nabzmu mz nzrtangrti-krmu Gct, murde Gct sa naokatrle nimu mz nzvz-nqblq-krmu me pnz drtwrde.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzyckr drtwrmu leplz mz nzokatr-krmu nidr, murde Gct sa nayc kz mz drtwrde nimu.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nztubqkr nabzmu, murde sa nakrlz-angidramu Gct x nqmq kxtubq.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzaodutr-lxblr-krmu leplz mz nzmnc-krdr mz nrwx, murde Gct sa narpile kx nimu doa nedeng.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzatrkatingr nimu mz nzale-krmu da kxtubq, murde mnclzbzmu mz Gct mz nzngini-krde King rmu.
“Ngi da kxmrlz nzatrkatingr x nzrpibqtingr x nzobqszongr nimu mz nzvz-nqblq-krmu ninge mz nrlc ka.
Mzli ka na-abrtzlvzamu nzapu-krmu profet ne Gct kcng tzatrkati pnz melrmqmung. Murde mz nrlc kc navzm, sa natwz-kzamu da kc tqmyapx-esz'ngr.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle mz nzycmne-ebzpxngr kx, “Na-apuamu dcpiz kxmrlz mz nrlc ka. Murde na-amnc-angidr-kzamu leplz da kc tqwai dcpiz nzayc-angidr-krde dakxnzng. A' nzmu nilwz dcpiz kx tqmrbrle la, trpengr nzamrlz-moungr. Trpnzngr da kx takitrde, a' takitxtrpwzle nzrtctxngr mrkc tzvz-ngrdr leplz. Mz nzmu-krde lcpwz, bzkq esaki nzvectr-krmamu leplz bange mz nzarlapx-krnge nidr.
X nzmu na-apu-kzamu zyzlr kc namailzbzle leplz mz Gct. Murde nztubqkr nqmq krmu naopx-angidrbz badr, da kc tqwai zyzlr ngr taon kx ycom mz newz tryc-kapqu.
X navz zvz nzale-krmu da kxmrlz, murde trpnzngr doa kx rtekatr lam sc tqyrlq-kapqpele. X tralalvzo-kzleu topla. A' lam nzadolzpwz wq, murde leplz namclr zyzlr mz nzdwatr-krmlr brma.
Mz nqmq lcpwz, na-aelwapx-ngrbzmu mz leplz nztubqkr nqmq krmu, kc navz-nqblqbzlr mz Trtemu kc Heven, mz nzglqlz-krdr nide.”
Rpi-mopwz Jiszs kx, “Bzkq rpiamu kx vzmc mz nzayrkrpx-krnge Natq Gct kxnzyro mz Lou sc Mosis x nzalvztrkr profet. Murde trvz-ngrpwc'u mz nzayrkrpx-krngele, a' mz nzatukztr-krngele.
Dekc tqvz-ngrmc mz nrlc. X trpnzngr natq kxpipz mz Lou sc Gct kx nakatxpx mzli ka bongavz x nrlc tqycbe-ngrdr. A' natqdeng amrlx na-atutr-kaing.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, doa kx rnzlvzole kzdq natq Gct, x alvztr-rbrle da, sa nanginide ncblo kxmane mz leplz amrlx kcng tzmnclzbzng mz Gct, kxmule-esz' ncblo lc rpile kx natq lc mane. A' kx vz-nqblq-zvzle natq Gct x alvztr-angidr-ngrde leplz, sa nanginide ncblo kxetu mz drtwr Gct.
Napibo bamu, rblx nzmnclz-krbzmu mz Gct mz nzngini-krde King rmu, a' ngi txpwz nzmu nzvz-nqblq-krmu natq Gct namyaszpxle Farzsi x kxnzalvztrng mz Lou sc Mosis kcng tzvz-nqblqlr drtwrdr esz'-krdr.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Krlzamu kx mzli kc bqnc Gct kabzle natq lc mz melrmqgung, mz nzrpi-krde kx, ‘Bzkq rnibqq leplz. Murde sa na-ayrplapxx doa kx rnibq leplz.’
A' rpibo bamu kx Gct sa na-ayrplapx-kzle mrlx kc tqngyati drtwrde kztede, kxmule-esz' tratrkatileu nide. X nide kc tqrpibzle mz kztede kx, ‘Nim dcvi r leplz,’ o ‘Nim brmrda ngr leplz,’ sa navzmi nide mz Kansrl. X nekc mz drtwrde rpile kztede takitrde Hxl, mz nzrpi-krbzle bade kx, ‘Nim bo-ngqngu,’ takitrde Gct nzrtctr-krde nide mz nyr ngr Hxl.
“Mz nzmu-krde lcde, tubqti-lzbq-kaiamu mz kztem kc tqngyati drtwrde nim. Na-aleq da lc nzmu navzq mz Mangr-nzangiongr Yawe mz nzrka-krm blz mz olta, a' dcpx mz drtwrm kx kzdq doa ngyati drtwrde nim. Bzkq kaq blz kc, a' yrlq txpwz ena, x tubqti-lzbq-kaiamu mz kztem. Zbz takitrde nzyzlu-kr-mopwe' Mangr-nzangiongr mz nzrka-krm blz kc.
<range>
“Mz nqmq kcpwz, mz nzvz-krmu mz lrpzki, tubqti-lzbq-kaiamu mz ncblo kc natwzle nim mz kot. Murde ma tqaprcbzle nim mz majzstret kc na-aprc-alzupwzle nim mz pulis, x pulis sc tzadwatrpelr nim mz presin,
mrkc namnc-ngrn x nakrlz-zpwxbzle nzxpepx-krm trau amrlx kcng nakapxq.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Krlzamu kx mzli kc bqnc Gct kabzle natq lc mz melrmqgung, mz nzrpi-krde kx, ‘Bzkq rmwimiq doa kx trngiu krnalzm.’
A' rpibo bamu kx mrlx kx mzte rkcmnzngr doa, x rpile namwimile, mz nabzde rnzlvzopele natq Gct kc tqrpile kx bzkq rmwimiq doa kx trngiu krnalzm.
“Mz nzmu-krde lcde, aclveti-lzbq kz. Bzkq rlr-ngrbzme mz alwx nzaclve-krde nim. A' mz mzli r nzatalzngr arlapx-lzbq. X katxpx-lzbqm mz nzatalzngr kx batrpzle nztao-zvz-krm. Murde nzwz-kato-krm mz nzmncngr kxtubq mzli ka, x nzmnc-zvz-krm Heven kalr, myaszpx-zlwzle nzaxtx-krbzme nzrlxngiti-krm mzli ka, x nzmnc-zvz-krm mz Hxl kalr.”
<range>
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Krlzamu kx mzli kc bqnc Gct kabzle natq lc mz melrmqgung, mz nzrpi-krde kx, ‘Ncblo kx na-axtxde krnalzde, naka-kaipzle bade pepz ngr nzaki-lzbq-krdr.’
A' rpibo bamu kx ncblo kx axtxde olvz rde kx tr-rmwimiu ncblo kzble batrpzle bade nztao-krde mz alwx ngr nzrmwingr ncblo kzble nzmu nayrlz-moule. X ncblo kc tqyrlztile olvz lcde tao kz mz alwx lcdepwz.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Krlzamu kx mzli kc bqnc Gct kabzle natq lc mz melrmqgung, mz nzrpi-krde kx, ‘Bzkq pokiaq mz nzesalz-krm, a' atutr zvz da kx esalz-ngrbzme mz Gct.’
A' rpibo bamu kx bzkq yrlqq nzesalz-krm mz kzdq da, murde rblxbz bam nzatutr-krm natqm, a' da amrlx yc mz mq Gct. Bzkq yrlqq nzesalz-krm mz Heven murde ngi me mncngr Gct.
X bzkq yrlqq nzesalz-krm mz nrlc ka, murde nyz-kzde. X bzkq yrlq-kzq nzesalz-krm mz Jerusalem, murde krlc mzteadau kx nzangiongr Gct, King kxmatq.
X bzkq yrlqq nzesalz-krm mz narm, murde rblxbz bam nzaprkingr x nzabongr nqnginarm, murde da lc yc kz mz mq Gct.
Setzn kc Tqdrka'ngr tqngi nou da kxtrka amrlx batrpzle mz leplz nzpokia-krdr x nzrpilr nayrlqlr nzesalz-krdr mz kzdq da. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, da kx napi-txpwzme mz nzycmne-krm, ‘Eu’ o ‘Trtingr.’ A' bzkq pokiaq x bzkq yrlqq nzesalz-krm mz kzdq da.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Krlzamu kx mzli kc bqnc Gct kabzle natq lc mz melrmqgung, mz nzrpi-krde kx, ‘Nzayrplapxngr narsakrlr-ngrpwz mz nike nzvz-rbrngr. Doa kx tz-batrpzle mz kztede, natz-batr-kzpzle mzte. X doa kx tzlqpxbzle nqngi kztede, natzlqpx-kzpzle nqngide.’
A' rpibo bamu kx bzkq ayzlubzme nike nzwaisr-ngrm, a' ayzlu-alzupwz mz nivz. Nzmu ncblo naobqszole nim mz nztztr-krbzle blzmznaom kxrtc, bzkq ayzluq, a' ao-lxlvr-kzpz nrlarde kxmc mz nztz-kz-krpzlele.
X nzmu ncblo natwzle nim mz kot murde rpile nrz scmqng nangi scdeng, ka-kzpz bade bot scm.
X nzmu kzdq kxetu kx rtulrtrpzle bam nzglq-krbzme bxli scde mz kilomita kxesz', bzkq kabzme, a' glqtibzle kilomita nali.
Doa kx rlxbz bam da murde rpile nangi scde, x mcq kx takitrde nzokatrngr, kabz. X kx rlxtibzle da scmqng mzli kxmrbcne, rlr-ngrbz.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Krlzamu kx mzli kc bqnc Gct kabzle natq lc mz melrmqgung, mz nzrpi-krde kx, ‘Mrlzti kztemqng, a' namwati drtwrm enqmi rmqng.’
A' rpibo bamu kx namrlzti-kzamu enqmi rmung. X nakrka'-ngrnamu leplz kcng tzatrkatilr nimu.
Murde mz nzale-krmu da lc, sa nanginimu mrlxng Gct Trtemu kc Heven x na-apuamu nide. Murde mrlztile leplz kxmule-esz' kxdrka'-ngrng o kxnzmrlzng, mz nzati-krbzle nepi x nzadc-krbzle tewa mz leplz amrlx.
Nzmu namrlzti-txpwzmu kxnzmrlztilr nimu, Gct ma trkapwzleu da kxmrlz bamu. Murde tr-rblxu nzalengr, x kxnzatakqting takes nzale-kzlr da lc.
Nzmu narpi-txpwzmu kx, ‘Nimu la,’ mz kztemung, trmyaszpxleu leplz kc-kzng. Murde tr-rblxu nzalengr, x kxnzmnc-mrbrng nzale-kzlr da lc.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, namrlztiamu leplz amrlx, da kc tqwai Trtemu kc Heven nzmrlzti-zlwz-krde leplz amrlx.”
Jiszs rpibzle kx, “Bzkq glqpx-lzbqq mz nzale-krm da kxmrlz me nzyrlwr-lxblrngr, kx muq naglqpxngr leplz nim. Murde nzrglqpxngr lc sa nangipepwz da kx natwzq, a' trtxpnzngr nztwz-mou-krm da kx nakabz Trtem kc Heven.
Mz nzmu-krde lc, mzli kznike rka-ngrn da mz nzokatr-krm leplz, bzkq aleq mz mz leplz kxnzkqlung, da kc tzwai leplz kx narpi-rbz kxnzrlxngiting. Nzalelr da lc murde naglqlzngr leplz nidr. A' napi-angidrbo bam kx trpengr da kx natwz-moulr kx nakabz Trtem kc Heven, a' ngi txpwz nzglqlzkr leplz nidr.
A' mz nzokatr-krm doa, bzkq rlr-ngrbzme mz leplz nzkrlztitr-krbzlr.
Murde Trtem kc Heven tqrkrlz angidr da amrlx sa nakabzle bam da mz nzabrtzlvz-krde da kc tqale-kapqq.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Mz nqmq lcpwz, mzli kznike krka'-ngrn, bzkq apuq leplz kx narpi-rbz kxnzrlxngiting. Murde nzkrka'ng mz mz leplz kxnzkqlung x nzobq-kztilr nidr. A' napi-angidrbo bam kx trpengr da kx natwz-moulr, a' ngi txpwz nzglqlzkr leplz nidr.
A' nim, mz nzkrka'-krbzme mz Gct kc trnzmcu, krka' me trnamc-ngru leplz nim. Murde Gct kc tqmcle da amrlx, sa narkabz bam da mz nzabrtzlvz-krde da kc tqale-kapqq.
“X mz nzkrka'-krm, bzkq apuq kxtrnzrlxngitiung kcng tzrpiting natq kxkqlu kx trpnzngr drtwr ngrdeng. Murde mz drtwrdr krkcng tzangiolrng sa nakabzlr badr da navz-nqblqle nzboikr nzkrka'-krdr.
Bzkq kxmule lc mz nzkrka'-krm da kc tzwailr, murde Gct Trtem krlzpe-kaile da kcng narlxtibzme trycpwzu bam. X suti drtwrde nzka-krbzle da lcng bam.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, mz nzkrka'-krm rpi kx, ‘Gct Trte, batrp bagr, nigr lr nrlc, nzamatq-krgr drtqm kxtr-esz'ngr,
x nzmnclz-krbzkr bam mz nzngini-krm King rgr. Murde navz-nqblq-kzkr me pnz drtwrm, da kc tzwai lr Heven.
Kam bagr dzu r da kx natakitrde mzbq ka.
X ipqpxbz nzvz-rbr-krgr navz-nqblqle nzipq-krgr krkcng tzaletrpqng da kx vz-rbr bagr.
X arlapx nigr mz zmatq ngr Setzn, mz nzokatr-krm nigr mz nztu-amqngi-krgr mz nzatalzngr. X awi mz nzayzlu-krme natqgr, mz nzngini-alo-krm king rgr, mz zmatq ngrm kc tqyc tqyc. Eu, angida.’”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Murde nzmu naipqq krkcng tzaletrpzng da kx vz-rbr bam, e Trtem kc Heven sa naipq-kzle nim.
A' nzmu trnaripqwq leplz, e Trtem kc Heven tripq-kzleu nim.”
Jiszs rpibzle kx, “Mzli kznike axtx-ngrn da mz nzmnc-aepztr-krbzme mz Gct, ale txpwz mz Gct. X bzkq apuq leplz kx narpi-rbz nidr kxnzrlxngiting. Leplz lcng nzablqkiti-lzbqng mz nzaxtx-krdr da, murde leplz namclr kx nidr kxnztrng. A' napi-angidrbo bam kx trpengr nztwz-mou-krdr da, a' ngi txpwz nzglqlzkr leplz nidr.
A' mz nzaxtx-krm da, yangi narm x abrngzti-lzbq.
Murde ma tzkrlztrpz leplz kx axtxq da, a' namc txpwz Gct kc trnzmcu. Murde Gct kc tqrkrlzle da amrlx sa nakabzle bam da mz nzabrtzlvz-krde da kc tqale-kapqq.”
Jiszs rpibzle kx, “Bzkq atamutilzq nzrngisc-krm da mz nrlc ka, murde ma tqyrti ninr x ma tqpnz mepyr rde, x tzpnati ncblo.
A' na-atamutilzq nzrngisc-krm da Heven, mrkc trpnzngr da kx atrkati da, x trpnzngr kx pna da elr.
Murde mrkc tqyrlq-ngrn dztum, dekc tqyc-kzngr nabzm.
“Mz nzmu-krde lcde, da kcng tqpqtr mz nabzm nzaelwapx-ngrdr nzngini-krm doa kxmrlz o kxtrka. X doa kxmrlz aelwapx-ngrde kx nabzde yrbulzm mz da angidr x nivz lr Gct mz nzrka-nrbalq-krbzle da mz leplz.
A' doa kxtrka aelwapx-ngrde kx nabzde kamrbrngr. Murde trkibrlvzle nzrngisc-krde mz nrlc ka. X rblxbz bade nzobqplxtr-krde natq Gct. Delc tqale-zvz-ngrde alwx.
“Rblx doa nzwztr-krbzle mz kxetu kxli mz mzli kxesz'. Murde sa napqtitrpe drtwrde kzdq, x sa namatitrpe drtwrde kzdq kz, mz nzrvz-nqblq-ngrng. Mz nzmu-krde lcpwz, rblx nzwztr-krbzmu mz Gct x mz nzrngiscngr da.
“Mz nzmu-krde lcde, rpibo bamu kx bzkq da kx nakxne drtqmu mz nzmnc-krmu, mz da kx nangqamu x namnqamu, x lrpz kx napxi-ngrnamu. Murde nzmnc-zpwxngr tryctxtrpwzu mz dakxnzng x lrpz.
A' na-aoti drtwrmu utc. Trpnzngr da kx nzpetilr x trnzekqlzung dakxnzng, x trpnzngr nyzdr ma ngr dakxnzng, murde Trtemu Gct aclvele nidr. A' nakrlzamu kx nzmyalz-krmu myaszpxle utc! X mz nqmq lc, Trtemu sa narkatibz bamu da.
Mane nzyc-zvzkr drtwrmu da, murde trokatrleu nimu x rblxbz bamu nzaboinepx-krmu nzlu-krmu.
“X mane nzyc-zvzkr drtwrmu mz trnzrngisc-ngru lrpz. Na-aoti drtwrmu nzpqpxkr mqmya. Trnzwzung x trnzrkxsilvzung scdr lrpz.
Kxmule-esz' King Solomon kc tqngi nceapu, a' nzlulikr lrpzdeng trmyaszpxleu nrpq mqmya lcng.
Murde Gct la tqapqtipx mqmya nangi lrpzdr nc mqmya. Noude lang trnztu-aboiu, murde sa namrbrng mz nzngc-krdr mz nyr, nzngikr nanr leng. Mrla tqyc-ngrde, nakrlzamu kx Gct sa na-apxi-kzle nimu, mz nzmnc-krmu mz nrlc. Murde myaszlz-zlwzamu nounc. A' nzrlxngiti-krmu bzkq topwz!
“Mz nzmu-krde lc, bzkq yc zlwz mz drtwrmu da kx nangqamu, lue kx namnqamu, x lrpz kx napxi-ngrnamu.
X bzkq apuamu kxtrnzrlxngitiung kx nzaoti txpwz drtwrdr da lcng. Murde trnzkrlzlru kx Gct rkale doa nedeng da kx tryctrpwzu badr. A' nadcpx mz drtwrmu kx Trtemu kc Heven krlzle da kx trycpwzu bamu.
X narlr-lzbqbzmu mz nzmnclz-ngrbz bade x mz nzvz-nqblqngr natqde, x mz nibrde da lcng sc tqkape-kzpzle bamu.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, bzkq yc zlwz mz drtwrmu da kx naprtz kalrla. Murde kalrla sa na-aoti drtwrmu da kx takitrde kalrla. X dalr zbqka takitxtrpwzle mzbq ka. Bzkq atamutilzamu dalr kalrla mz nzwzkr mzbq ka.”
Jiszs rpibzle kx, “Bzkq rpiamu kx takitrde doa nzayrplapx-katongr mz alwx ngrdeng, murde ma tqrpi kz Gct kx takitrde nzayrplapx-kato-krde nimu mz alwx ngrmung.
Murde Gct sa na-ayrplapxle nimu mz nqmq krmu mz nqmq kcpwz tqrpi-ngrnamu kx na-ayrplapxle leplz mz nqmq krdr. X sa napi-kzpzle bamu kx navz-nqblqamu natq kcngpwz tqpibzmu mz leplz, kx navz-nqblqlrng.
Murde mz nzrpi-krm kx doa takitrde nzayrplapxngr mz alwx ngrde, obqtiq alwx ngrde kc tqtopwzne, a' trmcwq alwx ngrm kc tqwzpx. Opxm kx obqtitrpzme dcvi kc tqtopwzne mz mz mzlem. A' trmcwq dapunounc kc tqyrbqpxm mz mzpq.
Dekc tqrpi-ngrbzme mz mzlem kx, ‘E mzlenge e, nakatxpxbo ena dcvi la tqtopwzne tqycpxm mz mzpq.’ ?Memule tqkxmu nzycmne-krm lc? Murde dapunounc kxwzpx la tqycpxm mz mzpq!
Nim leplz kx narpi-rbz kx rlxngitiq! Kapx kai dapunounc la wzpx tqyrbqpxm mz mzpq, x nzmu mzpq kc tqopxpe mz nzrmcngr dcvi kc tqtopwzne tqycpxm mz mz mzlem. Atubqti-lzbq kai mz alwx ngrmqng x kztemqng kc ate.
“A' bzkq abzq nzalvztrngr leplz kcng tzpxtxpx-zvz-ngrdr Nzryrngrkxtr. Murde mz nzale-krm da lc opxm kx katxnebzme natq kxtr mz kuli kzpeto, kcng nalxlvrtimlr nim mz nzmakx-krdr nim. X apu-kzle nzrtctx-krbzme dztu Gct mz poi, kcng narnzlvztineolrng mz drtc'.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Rlxbz da mz Gct, x sa nakabzle. Rtangr da x sa narmctiq. Abc x naonrx sa nalvxpxbz.
Murde doa kx rlx da kx takitrde nide, sa natwzle. X kx rtangrtile nzokatrkr Gct, sa nangida. X kx abctr-zvzbz mz Gct, naonrx nyz Gct sa nalvxpxbz bade.
“Murde trpnzngr trte doa kx rkabz mz mrlxde rplz mzli kx rlx-ngrbzle nade dakxnzng.
X trkapwzleu ningidoe mzli kx rlx-ngrbzle nc.
Nimu kcng trnztubq-zvzung krlzamu nzale-krmu da kxtubq mz nzrka-ngrbz da kxmrlz mz doa nemung. A' myapx-mopwz, Trtemu kc Heven krlzle nzale-krde da kxtubq mz nzrka-zvz-krbzle da kxmrlzti zlwz mz krkcng tzrlxbzng bade da.
“Ale-zvzbzmu mz leplz da kx suti drtwrmu na-alebz bamu, kxmule-esz' trnzalepwzlru bamu. Murde krlc nzatutrngr nzalvztrngr amrlx mz Nzryrngrkxtr.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Mz nqmq lcpwz, naprtrq mz naonrx kxtotaki mz nzkrlz-krbzme lrpzki kc tqvz Heven. A' nakrlzq kx naonrx lc tqtotaki x lrpzki lc tqtopwzne rblx nzo-zlingr. Leplz trnzkqluung kx nzrmctilr naonrx lc. A' bzkq prtrq mz naonrx kc tqetu, murde ma tqrmctiq lrpzki kc tqvzkile mrkc tzodatingr leplz mz Hxl. Leplz kxnzkqlung nzvz-rbrng mz nzo-zli-krdr lrpzki lc tqyryz murde tr-rblxu nzo-zlingr.”

Zbz rpibz Jiszs kx, “Mz nqmq lcpwz, bzkq vz-nqblqamu lrpzki r profet kxnzalvztr-rbrng. Sa naprtrpzng bamu mz nzapu-krdr kxnzrlxngiting, a' nzrpilr naodatilr nzrlxngiti-krmu, murde nidr angidr kxdrka'-ngrng.
Sa naglxamu nidr, murde nqmq krdr aelwapx-ngrde namrlzu r leplz kc tqnginidr. Apule nounc amrlx kx nzglx-ngrdr nradr kcng tzpapx-ngrdr. Murde tr-rkeopwx'u naq mz nc nole, x dx mz nc lrpz.
A' nounc kxmrlz papx-ngrde nranc kxmrlz. X nounc kxtrka papx-ngrde nranc kxtrka.
Opx angidr kx nounc kxmrlz trpapx-ngrdeu nranc kxtrka. X trpnz-kzngr nounc kxtrka kx papx-ngrde nranc kxmrlz.
Nounc kx trnzpapx-ngrdru nradr kxmrlz nzlakitiong x nzrtclz-ngrng mz nyr.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, sa naglx-ngrnamu kxnzalvztr-rbrng mz da kxtrka kx nzvzpxmqng mz nqmq krdr.”
Jiszs rpibzle kx, “Leplz kcng amrlx tzrpimlr bange kx ninge Kxetu Lod rdr trnaprtrung amrlx ngrdr Heven, a' nangi txpwz krkcng tzvz-nqblqlr me pnz drtwr Trtenge kc Heven.
Murde mz Mzli Kxmatq kc na-ayzlu-ngrbz Gct da mz leplz, leplz kxnzkqlung narpimlr bange kx, ‘Kxetu Lod! Plzpxbzkr mz leplz natq Gct mz drtqm, x rmaszlrpxkr drka', x ale-kzkr da kxmatqng kxkqlung mz drtqm!’
Kxmule-esz', a' sa narpi-angidrbo badr kx, ‘Nimu kxdrka'-ngrng! Vzkipeamu kc! Trkrlzwxu nimu murde trvz-nqblq-angidrwamuu ninge.’”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Mz nzmu-krde lcde, doa kx xlrmle natqngeng, x yrlq-angidrleng, apule ncblo kxyrplapx kx wzti-angidrle ma nyzde. Ekqtiole gq lr nctrpou ngrdeng kxmqngi, vzo la mz rplz.
Mz nibrde, trlipu r tewa x nenq kc tqvzpem. Nenq wqq x nubla ngr lue yrle-zlwz-kzp, nzrpilr na-awxolr x nayrvilr ma kc. A' trmrtuu murde nctrpou ngrde tu-amqngio mz rplz.
“A' doa kx xlrmle natqngeng x tryrlq-angidrleu, apule ncblo kxngqngu kx awxbutxopwzle ma nyzde mz drta'.
Mz nibrde, trlipu r tewa x nenq kc tqvzpem. Nenq wqq x nubla ngr lue yrle-kzp nzvztitrlr ma kc. X ma kc mrtuo x ngilialz-pnzm mz trlipu kc.”
Mzli kc tqyrkrpxpengr nzalvztrkr Jiszs, zbo ngr leplz kcng nzkctitxpx-zlwzlr nzalvztr-krde.
Murde trapuleu Kxnzalvztrng mz Loukxtr, a' ycmnemile zmatq angidr.
Mzli kc Jiszs tqvzo-ngrmle mz nra kc mz nibr nzalvztrngr lc, zbo ngr leplz kxnzetung sc tzma-nqblqpelr nide.
Zbz kzdq ncblo kx ycngr lepz vzm, x rwetxobz zpr mz Jiszs. X rpibzle bade kx, “Kx tqsuti drtwrm le, krlzx kx krlzq nzamrlzngr ninge!”
Kxmule-esz' mz Lou sc Mosis batrpzle trnztakitr-krdeu nzprtrngr mz nzangiongr, a' maletxtrpzle nide. X sc tqrpipebzle kx, “Mrlzm bange. Namrlzq.” X mzli kcpwz kxsqki lepz kc mztxtr pnz kz.
Zbz rpi-kzpzle bade kx, “Bzkq ena ncblo kx napi-nebanle. A' vz-kaipz mz pris, x pibz bade napwxlitibzle nrkrdrtqm, murde namcpzle kx mrlzpeq. Zbz sa napipxbzle mz leplz, murde namnc-lxblr-mouamu badr. X kabz blz mz Gct, da kc tqwai nzpikr Lou sc Mosis le, x nakrlzngr leplz amrlx kx tubqpeq mz Loukxtr.”
Jiszs badr ncblo nedeng nzvzng mz taon Kzpznizm, mz nqlvi r Dxbu Gzlili. X kzdq lr Rom kc tqngi kxetu r dzbe ncblo ngr vea kx trtqki-esz' (100), vzm mz nzrmcti-krde Jiszs, murde rpile Jiszs naokatrpzle nide.
X sc tqrpipebzle bade kx, “Kxetu, kxnzawz-nrbalq nenge sc tqyrbqpe ma nyznge. Nrkrdrtqde bz x sc tqtangigx zlwz.”
Rpibz Jiszs bade kx, “Mrlz. Sa navzmc ma nyzm na-amrlzbo nide.”
A' rpibz kxetu kc mz Jiszs kx, “Eke, Kxetu! Bzkq kxpuneme nzvz-ngrm ma nyznge. Murde trtakitrpwc'u nzdwatr-krme ma nyznge. Krlzx kx rngiscm zmatq kxmyalz zlwz. Pi txpwz dq ye natq, x ncblo nenge sc tqmrlzpe.
Murde mnclz-kzpo mz zmatq ngr kamadz rnge. X ncblo ngr vea nengeng nzmnclzmqng bange. Kx narpibo mz kzdq kx, ‘Vz!’ x sc tqvzpe. X kx narpibo mz kzdq kz kx, ‘Vzm!’ x sc tqvzpem. X kx narpibo mz kxnzawz nenge kx, ‘Da kx na-aleq se!’ x sc tqalepele.”
Kx xlrbz Jiszs natqdeng, kctitxpx-zlwzle. X sc tqrpipebzle mz leplz kcng tzvz-nqblqlr nide kx, “Napi-zpwxbo bamu, nzrlxngitikr lr Israel trmyaszpxleu nzrlxngitingr lc!
X napi-kzpo bamu, mz nrlc tulvzo leplz kxkqlu kxtrngiulrJiu sa naprtrng mz nzmungr kxetu x namu-lxblrng badr melrmqgung Ebraam x Aesak x Jekop, mzli kc Gct na-aclve-ngrde nrlc kxmrna kalr mz nzngini-krde king.
A' nimu lr Jiu kcng tqrpiamu kx sa naprtramu Heven, sa nartctxtrngr Gct nimu mz nzlo ngr Hxl, murde trvz-nqblqwamuu nqmq krde. X mz nzmnc-krmu mrlcde, sa nayrni-aloamu mz nzetqkr drtqmu x sa namadqtiamu nqngimu mz zngya, murde mnc-rlrupebzmu bade.”
Zbz Jiszs sc tqrpipebzle mz kxetu kc kx, “Vzpe ye ma nyzm. Mzli ka da kc tqlxngitiq, sa narmctiq.” X mzli lcpwz, doa kc sc tqmrlzpe.
Jiszs badr ncblo nedeng nzvzng mz ma nyz Pita. Jiszs kx dwatrpzle kc brma, sc tqmcpele kzdo Pita kc tqngi olvz, sc tqmnz me mnz-ngrde murde drtqde pqpxm.
Zbz Jiszs vzbz malebzle mqde mz nzamrlz-krde nide, x zyagox kc yrkrtxpx pnz. X tulzm sc tqoliqtipebzle dakxnzng nadr.
Mzli kc nepi tqtaope-ngrde, x Sabat kc tqyrkrpxpe-kzpz, lr Kzpznizm sc tzryrkrmipemqng doa kxkqlu kx nzdwaszng drka'. Zbz Jiszs sc tqmaszlrpxpe-ngrde drka' amrlx mz leplz lcng mz zmatq ngr natqde. X amrlzti-kzle leplz kx nzyagoxting amrlx.
X mz nzalekr Jiszs le, atutrle natq kc tqplzpx pnz profet Asaea mz nzycmnetr-krde mz Kxnzmcpx. Rpile kx, “Ncblo lc ayrkrpxpele nzmewe-krgung, x amrlzpele nzyagox-krgung.”
Mzli kc Jiszs tqmc-ngrde leplz kxkqlu nzyrlwr-ngalelvz-krdr nide, sc tqrpipebzle mz ncblo nedeng nzalilvckio-krdr badr mz nrlar dxbu kc.
A' mzli kc tzoliq-ngrdr nzalilvc-krdr, kzdq kxalvztr mz Lou sc Mosis vzm mz Jiszs, sc tqrpipebzle bade kx, “Kxakrlz, sa navz-nqblqx nim drlve keng vzkiq.”
A' rpibz Jiszs kx, “?Krlz-angidr-kzq da kx ycpxm mz nzrvz-nqblqngr ninge? Murde fokis nzmnc-zpwxng mz ma nyzdr kx yclzm mz gq. X utc nzmnc-zpwx-kzng mz ma nyzdr kx ngi nrla r nounc. A' ninge Mrlx Leplz, trmnc-zpwxwxu, murde lr mrnyzngeng nzpxtxpx-ngrdr ninge. X sa napxpx-kz-ngrdr nim. ?Myx kxmule, navz-nqblqpeq ye ninge?”
Zbz kzdq kz ncblo kx vz-nqblq-kzle Jiszs, rpibzle bade kx, “Kxetu rnge, na-ale-kaipo nikeng pnz drtwr trtenge mzli ka, a' mz nibr nzbz-krde sc tqvz-nqblq-atex nim.”
A' rpibz Jiszs bade kx, “Trtingr! Rlrpe-ngrbz ye mz krkcng mqngrdr nzbzpeng nzyrtzmq-krdr kxnginidr kx nabzng. A' nim, vz-nqblq ninge!”
Mz nibrde, sc tqprtzpe mz bot scdr kxetu, x ncblo nedeng nzprtz-kzpzng x sc tzalilvcopeng.
Zbz sc tzpwrkilvcpe-ngrdr kzdq nenq kxetu. X dxka kxetuting sc tqvzopebz mz nabz bot kc. A' mzli lc, Jiszs sc tqmwi.
Zbz ncblo nedeng nzvzbzng bade x sc tzameopelr nide. Nzrpibzlr kx, “Kxetu, arlapx nigu! Nabzpeku!”
A' rpibz Jiszs badr kx, “?Memule tqmwxlrtx-zlwz-ngrnamu? ?X memule nzlxngiti-krmu ninge tqtopwzbe-ngrde?” Zbz tulzm, sc tqlclvzpele nenq x dxka. X mzli kcpwz nrwx otx pnz.
X nidr amrlx ngrdr sc tzkctitxpxpelr Jiszs, tzrpi-etrpelr kx, “Eke! ?Ncblo kznika? Nenq x dxka nzvz-nqblqlr natqde!”
Zbz Jiszs badr ncblo nedeng sc tzkrlzopebzlr nrlar dxbu kc, mz nrlarnrlc kc taon Gergesa, me nzmnc-ngrdr kxtrngiulrJiu. X ncblo nzling kx dwasz drka', nzmncng mz butqbr mrkc tzyrlqngr leplz kxbz. Mrlx lcng nzxplr-zlwzng x nzatrkati-kzlr leplz. X leplz nzmwxlrng mz nzvzki-krbzlr mrkc tzmnc-ngrdr. Ncblo lcng sc tzvzpxpemqng mz butqbr nyzdr mz nzrmcti-krdr Jiszs.
X sc tzkabomipebzlr bade kx, “Vrr! Mrlx Gct! ?Nike tqotime? Bzkq ayrplapxq nrkrdrtqgr mzli ka, murde trkrlzkapzle Mzli Kxmatq kc na-ayrplapxngr.”
X mnc-aepztrpz mrkc kzdq nrtrq r poi kxetu, sc tzmung.
Drka' kcng nzyrnititrpzlr bade kx, “Kx tqmaszlrpx-ngrn nigr, atwzlr-ngrbz nigr mz nrtrq r poi kc.”
Zbz sc tqrpipebz Jiszs mz drka' kcng kx, “Prpxamu!” X drka' kcng kx nzprpxlr, nzdwasz-pnzlr poi kcng. X nrtrq r poi kc, sc tzvopxpeng mz nqngitrlqli, nztaong mz nabz dxbu kc, x nzbzting amrlx ngrdr mz lue.
Zbz ncblo kcng tzaclveng, nzngrlrng, sc tzpinepelr nrpa ngrde mz mztea, myapxbz kxmu nzmncpekr doa kcng nzling tzprszpxpelr drka'.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, leplz kxnzkqlung ngr taon kcma sc tzyrkrpeng mz nzmc-krdr Jiszs. X kx nzkrlzbzlr nide, nzyrnititrpzlr bade kx navzpe.
Zbz Jiszs prtz mz bot, nidr badr ncblo nedeng x sc tzalilvcope-moung mz taon Kzpznizm mrkc tzmnc-ngrdr.
Kx nzkrlzbzlr kc Kzpznizm, kzdung ncblo nzvzmqng, nzglqmlr kc ncblo kx nrkrdrtqde bz. Nzglqtimlr kzdq nqni. Kx krlztrpz Jiszs nzbrtikr drtwrdr nide mz nzamrlz-krbzle kztedr, sc tqrpipebzle bade kx, “Mrlxnge, bzkq nabzm talvzope, murde alwx ngrmqng ipqpxpebo.”
Kx nzxlrbz kzdung lr Jiu kcng tzalvztrng mz Loukxtr nzycmne-krde lc, sc tzrpipelr mz drtwrdr kx, “Rlr! Mrlx lc pivxile Gct. ?Mz drtwrde apule Gct?”
Jiszs krlztitrpebzle da kx ycpxm mz nabzdr. X sc tqrpipebzle badr kx, “Bzkq aoti drtwrmu da kxtrka kxmule lc.
Nzmu narpibo mz ncblo lc kx, ‘Ipqpxpebo alwx ngrm,’ rblx nzrmcngr. A' nzmu narpibo bade kx, ‘Tulz x vzpe,’ opx angidr nzrmcngr.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, na-amrlzbo nrkrdrtqde mz nzaelwapx-krnge kx ninge, Mrlx Leplz, rngisc-kznge zmatq ngr nzipqpxngr alwx mrka mz nrlc.” X sc tqrpipebzle mz ncblo kc nrkrdrtqde tqbz kx, “Mrlxnge, tulz, oti nqni pnrm x vzpe mrnyzm!”
X ncblo kc tulzm x sc tqvzpe mrnyzde.
Kx nzmc zbo ngr leplz da lc, nzamatqlr Gct. X nzglqpxlr nide x awi-ngrbzlr bade nzrka-krbzle zmatq ngrde mz ncblo murde na-amrlzngr leplz x naipqpxngr alwx ngrdr.
Jiszs rlaszle mrlc, x mz nzvz-krde mcle ninge, ncblo kx atakqti takes drtqnge Matiu. Sc tqwxbux mz ofis nyznge kc tzxpekitr takes, x rpim Jiszs bange kx, “Vz-nqblqm ninge.” Zbz tutxlzmc, axtxbo da amrlx, x sc tqvz-nqblqpex nide.
Mz nibrde, Jiszs sc tzmupeng badr ncblo nedeng mz ma nyznge. X kztengeng kx nzatakqting takes x kzdu-moung leplz kx nqmq krdr trka mz nzobqkr leplz mu-lxblr-kzkr badr.
Mzli kc tzmc-ngrm Farzsi da lc, drtwrdr trmrlzpeu. Murde mz drtwrdr trtakitrdeu ncblo kxmrlz nzngini-krde kzte ncblo kxnztrkang. X sc tzveapebzng mz ncblo nedeng kx, “?Nike kxakrlz ngrmu tzmu-lxblr-ngrdr badr leplz kxnzmulr lcng?”
Xlrbz Jiszs natqdr x sc tqrpipebzle badr kx, “Leplz kx trnzyagoxung trnzsutiu drtwrdr dckta. A' kxnzyagoxng la tzsuti drtwrdr dckta.
Na-aoti drtwrmu drtwr ngr Nzryrngrkxtr kc tqrpile kx, ‘Da kx mrlzm bange, doa nengeng nayc mz drtwrdr leplz mz nzokatr-krdr nidr namyaszpxle nzrka-krmlr bange blz.’ Murde trvz-ngrpwc'u nzrkqlengr leplz kx nzrpilr nztubqng. A' vz-ngrmc nzrkqlengr kxnzaleng alwx, murde naesablqtilr alwx ngrdrng.”
Mz nqmq krgr, nigr lr Jiu, nzaxtx-krgr dakxnzng zbq li mz wiki kxesz' mz nzkrka'ngr. Zbz oblamzng Jon Kxawrkxtr nzvzmqng mz Jiszs x sc tzveapebzng bade kx, “Nigr badr Farzsi axtxbzkr dakxnzng. ?A' nike ncblo nemqng trnzaxtx-ngr-kzpzlru da?”
Jiszs rpibzle kx, “Apux ncblo kxnayrlz. Mz nzmu-krde lcpwz trtakitrdeu drtwr leplz nzvz-krdr mz mzli r nzabrtzngr mz nzyrlzngr, trtakitr-kzdeu ncblo nengeng nzaxtx-krdr dakxnzng mzli ka. Murde nzabrtz-ngrdr ninge lc tqmncbepo badr. A' mz nibrde, mzli kc nakatxpx-ngrmc badr, sc tqtakitr-atede nzaxtx-krdr dakxnzng mz nzkrka'-krdr.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Nzycmne-ebzpxngr lcng li nzaelwxpx-ngrdr nqmq krnge kxmrna. Murde trpnzngr ncblo kx rkxsilvztr dzlvq lrpz kxmrna mz nzakqlvztr-krde me bxnge mz lrpz kxblzlongr. Nzmu nawailele, dzlvq lrpz kc sc tqbxplipxpem mz lrpz kcma tqblzlongr. X sc tqbxplipx-zlwzpe myaszpxle mzli kc kai tqbxpli-ngrde.
X trpnz-kzngr ncblo kx narbzlutr dakxnzng kxmrna mz ncblei kx nzrbzlutrpengr dakxnzng. Murde ncblei kxmule lcde ngcplxtxtr kai mz nzmrnabekr dakxnzng, x da lcng li sc tzatrkatipeng. A' dakxnzng kxmrna nabzlutrpwz mz ncblei kxmrna murde namrlzpwzng rlilrdr.”
Mzli kc Jiszs tqycmnebe-ngrde, kzdq kxetu r mangr-nzkrka'ngr nyzdr vzbz x rweobz zpr bade. Rpibzle kx, “Inyxnge mwx bzpe mzli ka. A' vzm, maletrpz nrkrdrtqde, x sa nalu mou.”
Zbz Jiszs tulzm x sc tzvzpeng ncdr x nigr ncblo nedeng kz.
Mzli lc kzdq olvz kx tresakiu nzrpwx-krde temz vzm mz nibr Jiszs. Nzrpwx-alo-krde lc temz, twztipelele yiz nzpnu-esz'-nrade-li (12). Sc tqmaletrpebzle lrpzde.
Murde rpi drtwrde kx, “Nzmu namaletxtrpwo ye lrpzde, nrkrdrtqnge sc tqmrlzpe.”
Zbz Jiszs lxlvrkimle mq, sc tqmcpele olvz kc. X rpibzle bade kx, “Inyxnge, bzkq nabzm talvzope, murde nzlxngiti-krm ninge sc tqamrlzpele nim.” X mzli lcpwz olvz lc sc tqmrlzpe.
Mz nibr nzamrlzkr Jiszs olvz kc, sc tqvzpe mou. X kx krlzbzkr ma nyz kxetu kc, sc tqmcpele kxnzvxutrng ncblei x zbo ngr leplz kcng tzyrni-katong mz mzli r nzbzngr.
Zbz sc tqrpipebzle badr kx, “Yrkrpxamu yz! Doa lc trbzu, a' mwine ye!” A' nzyrpalelvzlr nide.
Mz nibr nzvzpxkr leplz amrlx kcng yz, sc tqvztrpe brma. Rtrngztiobzle mq doa olvz kc x sc tqtulzpem.
X nrpa ngr nzamrlz-krde doa olvz kc vz x talvzpxle nrlarnrlc kc.
Jiszs rkalzm mz ma kc, x mzli kc tqvz-ngrde nzrvz-nqblqbzng kcng ncblo kx mztr mwi nzling. Sc tzkqlepelr nide, nzrpibzlr kx, “Mrlx Devet! Nayc mz drtwrm nigr!”
Zbz Jiszs kc tqvztrpe mz kzdq ma, ncblo kcng nzling sc tzvztrpe-kzpzng bade. X rveabz badr kx, “?Lxngitiamu kx krlzx nzamrlz-ngrbz nimu?” X nzrpibzlr bade kx, “Eu, Kxetu!”
Zbz Jiszs bxtrpzle mztr x rpibzle kx, “Amrlzx nimu murde drtwrmu br kx rngiscnge zmatq ngr nzalengr da lc tqrlxtiamu.”
X mzli lcpwz mztr kc tqobqpxpe. A' xplrmibz natq Jiszs mz nzrpi-krbzle badr kx, “Bzkq pinebzmu da lc mz leplz!”
Kxmule-esz', a' nzvzng x sc tzyapwxtinepelr nrpa mz nrlc amrlx mz nrlarnrlc kc.
Mz nibr nzvzpekr ncblo kc nzling, kzdung leplz nzvzmimlr kc mz Jiszs ncblo kx batrpz drka' nznabu-krde.
X mzli kcpwz tqmaszlrpxpe-ngrbz Jiszs drka' kc, ncblo kc sc tqycmnepe. X zbo ngr leplz kcng nzkctitxpxlr da lc x nzrpilr kx, “Rlr! Trgalr da kx mcku kxmule ka mrka Israel!”
A' kzdung Farzsi nzrpilr kx, “Setzn ela, kxetu r drka', nide kc tqrkabz zmatq mz Jiszs mz nzmaszlrpx-krdeleng.”
Zbz Jiszs sc tqvztipele mztea amrlx mrlcdeng, tqalvztrpe mz mangr-nzkrka'ngr nyzdrng, x tqyapwxtipxle Nrpakxmrlz kx Gct sa tqvectrpemle leplz mz nzmnclz-krbzlr bade mz nzngini-krde King rdr. Mzli lc Jiszs amrlz-kzle kxnzyagoxng x kxnzdwatibzng zyagox kxtrka.
Mzli lc tqmcpengr Jiszs zbo ngr leplz kcng, sc tqyctx-zlwzpengr drtwrde nidr. Murde nabzdr talvzo x rblx nzokatr-lzbq-krdr mz nzrmcti-krdr Gct, a' nzapulr sip kcng trtxpnzngr kxaclvele nidr.
Rpimle bagr, nigr ncblo nedeng kx, “Kxmule-esz' leplz kxkqlu nzoliqng mz nzlxngiti-krdr Nrpakxmrlz murde nanginidr doa neng Gct, a' mzli ka kxnzwzng nzpipzbeng kx nzaelwapx-ngrbzlr lrpzki angidr mz leplz.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, krka'-ngrbzmu mz Trte kc tqoliqtile nabz leplz kcng tzbrti drtwrdr ninge. Rlxtibzmu bade nzatwzlr-krmle kzdung mou kxnzawzng kx naokatrng mz nzvzmi-krmlr leplz bange.”
Zbz Jiszs sc tqkqlepele nigr aposol kcng nzpnu-esz'-nrade-li (12). Mz nzmnclz-krbzkr bade, sc tqrkapem bagr zmatq kx narmaszlrpx-ngrgr drka' x na-amrlz-ngrgr kxnzyagoxng x kxnzdwatibzng zyagox kxtrka.
Drtqgr nigr aposol kcng nzpnu-esz'-nrade-li (12) nidr seleng: kx ayrnrngr Saemon, kc kzdq drtqde Pita, x mzlede Adru, Jemes mrlx Sebedi, nidr mz mzlede Jon,
Filip, x Batolomiu (mrlx Tolmai, kc kzdq drtqde Natzniel), Tomas x ninge Matiu kc tqatakqti ena takes, (kzdq kz drtqnge Livae), x Jemes kc tqngi mrlx Alfizs, x Tadizs (kc tzrpi-kzpz Judzs), x
Saemon kc tqprtr ena mz dzbede kc tzrpilr namaszlrtxpx-ngrdr gzpman ngr Rom mz nzmnc-krdr Israel, x Judzs Iskariot, kc tqamwabzle Jiszs mz enqmi rdeng.
Jiszs atwzlrpx-ngrde nigr aposol mz nzryapwxpx-krgr Nrpakxmrlz. Rpimle bagr kx, “Bzkq vznamu mz mztea nyz kxtrngiulrJiu x mztea nyz lr Szmariz.
A' vzbzmu mz leplz negung mrka Israel murde trnzvz-nqblqlru nqmq kr Gct mz nzapu-krdr sip kcng tzmrbrneng.
Drlve keng vzkiamu, yapwxtipxamu Nrpakxmrlz lc mz nzrpi-krbzmu kx, ‘Gct sa tqvectrpemle leplz bade. X mzli ka mzli r nzmnclz-krbzmu bade mz nzngini-krde King rmu.’
X amrlzamu kxnzyagoxng x kxnzyc-ngrng lepz, x maszlrpx-ngrnamu drka', x alu-mouamu kxnzbzng. A' mz nzokatr-krmu nidr, bzkq rlxamu da, murde mz nzokatr-krnge nimu, da amrlx ka-nrbalqbo bamu.
X bzkq rtwzamu trau mz nzvz-krmu.
X bzkq rtwz-kzamu bxli, nzkq krali, sadol krali, x nctoko. Murde leplz kcng naokatramu takitrde nzka-krbzlr da lcng bamu.
“Mztea kznike nzabrtzlvzlr nzmnc-krmu badr, ma kznike nzrlr-ngrbz namnc-ngrnamu, mncamu ma lcde esz', nakrlzbzle mzli kx rlasz-ngrnamu mztea lcde.
Mzli kc tqdwatr-ngrnamu mz kzdq ma, rpibzmu mz lr ma lcde kx, ‘Krka'-ngrne kx Gct na-amnc-zpwxle nimu!’
Nzmu leplz lcng kx tzabrtzlvzlr nimu, Gct sa na-angidatibzle nzkrka'-krmu. A' nzmu leplz lcng kx tzpxtxpx-ngrdr nimu, trpnzngr nzangidatingr natqmu, a' sa nayzlu-mop bamu.
X nzmu kzdung lr ma o lr mztea kznike nzpxtxpx-ngrdr nimu x trnzlalztqpwzung bamu, mzli kc tqrlaszpe-ngrnamu nidr rtc-ngrbzmu rplz, nakrlz-ngrdrle kx nqmq krdr trka mz nzapu-krdr kxnzmnc-mrbrng.
A' napi-angidrbo bamu kx mzli kc na-ayzlu-ngrbz Gct da mz leplz kalr, nzayrplapx-krde nidr sa namyaszpxle lr Sodom x lr Gomora, kxdrka'-ngrng kcng bqnc.”
Rpi-mop Jiszs bagr kx, “X nakrlz-angidramu kx na-atwzlrpx-ngrne nimu mz nzryapwx-krbzmu mz leplz kxdrka'-ngrng, mz nzapu-krmu sip mz mzlir kuli kzpeto. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, aclvetioamu nidr x bzkq vz-rbramu.
Aclvetio-angidramu, murde leplz sa nalolvzlr nimu x navzmilr nimu mz kot. X naiklapxmlr nimu mz nabz mangr-nzkrka'ngr.
X navzmibzlr nimu mz kxnzetu ngr mrkzbleng x mz king mz nzayrplapx-krdr nimu, murde vz-nqblqamu ninge. X mzli nyzmu lcpe kz mz nzyapwxtipx-krbzmu Nrpakxmrlz mz kxnzetu lcng x kxtrngiulrJiu kxnzkqlung.
Mzli kc nalolvz-ngrmu, bzkq da kx nakxne drtqmu mz nrpa kx napiamu x kxnamu nzycmne-krmu. Murde mzli lcde Gct sa nakabzle bamu nrpa kc napiamu.
X natq lcng trnavzpxpwqung bamu, a' nabatrpz Mqngrkxtr mz nzvz-nqblq-krde me pnz drtwr Gct Trtemu.
“Mzli lcde, leplz sa nakabzlr mzledrng kcng tzvz-nqblqlr ninge mz enqmi rdrng mz nznibq-krdrleng. X trte doa kz sa nawaisr-ngrde kz doa nedeng mz nzrnibqngr nidr. X doa na-atrkati-kzlr trtedr x lxedr x naka-kzpzlr mz enqmi rdrng mz nznibq-krdrleng.
Leplz kxnzkqlung sa napxtxpx-ngrdr nimu, murde nimu leplz nengeng. A' nzmu natu-amqngi-zvzamu mz nzrlxngiti-krmu krlzbzle nzbz-krmu, sa na-arlapx Gct nimu.
Mzli kc tzatrkati-ngrmu mz kzdq mztea, vzki-alzuamu dq mztea kzble. X nakrlz-angidramu kx trpnzngr nzayrkrpx-krmu nzyapwxtipx-krbzmu Nrpakxmrlz mz lr mztea amrlx mrka Israel, x ninge Mrlx Leplz sc tqyzlupemc.
“Trpnzngr oblamz kx myaszlzle kxakrlz ngrde, x kxnzawz trmyaszlzleu kxetu rde.
A' nimu oblamzngeng x kxnzawz nengeng na-abrtzlvzamu nzapu-krmu ninge, kxetu rmu. A' kx tzrpilr ninge kc tqngi Trtemu Beelsebol kc tqngi Kxetu r Drka', sa nakqle-ngrbzlr nimu drtq kx nztrka-zlwzng mz nzngini-krmu lr ma nyzngeng.”
Rpi-mop Jiszs kx, “Kxmule-esz' leplz na-atrkatilr nimu murde vz-nqblqamu ninge, a' bzkq mwxlrtiamu nzryapwx-krbz badr. A' ayrbq-zpwx-ngrbz da kx nzyrlq-kapqting. X pipxbz da kx nzxpqbrlvzlr me naxlr-lxblr-ngrdrle.
Mz nqmq lcpwz, nike pibo bamu esz'-krmu, aopxbzmu mz leplz me nzyrlwrpx-lxblrngr.
Bzkq mwxlrtiamu nzrnibqkr leplz. Murde krla tznibq-txpwzlr nrkrdrtqmu. A' namwxlrti-txpwzmu Kxetu kc tqodatile nrkrdrtq x mqngr leplz kxnztrkang mz Hxl.
Kxmule-esz' nzamwangr boblz kxli trau rde pipzne, a' trpnzngr boblz kx nabz, a' ngi txpwz kx rlrpxngr Gct nzbz-krde. A' nimu myaszlzamu boblz kxkqlu! Murde nqnginarmu amrlx, rlwxti kz Trtemu kc tqaclvele nimu. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, bzkq mwxlrtiamu leplz.

“Murde doa kx abrtzlvzle ninge mz mz leplz mz nrlc ka, sa na-abrtzlvz-kzx nide mz mz Trtenge mrkc Heven.
A' doa kx pxtxpx-ngrde ninge mz mz leplz mz nrlc ka, sa napxtxpx-kz-ngrne nide mz mz Trtenge.”
Rpi-mop Jiszs bagr kx, “Bzkq rpiamu kx vz-ngrmc nzrtwz-krmc nrwx mz leplz mz nrlc ka. A' vz-ngrmc murde kxnzrlxngiting x kxtrnzrlxngitiung drtwrdr trnaesz'tiu.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, enqmi r doa sa navzpxm mz ma nyzde. Kxmule-esz' trte, o lxe, o mrlx, o inyx, o mzle-lzbq, o ile-lzbq, o kzdo-lzbq, o lvxbq-lzbq, a' doa lcng amrlx sa na-aki-lzbqng mz nzrlxngitingr ninge.
<range>
“Doa kx takitrde nzvz-nqblq-krde ninge, namrlzti nivz lrde ninge namyaszpxle kxnginideng, kx apule trtede, lxede, mrlxde o inyxde. X bzkq rlr-ngrbzle nzrpwa'-krbzlr bade nzvz-nqblq-angidr-krde ninge.
Murde doa kx takitrde nzvz-nqblq-krde ninge, naglqlzle kros ngrde mz nzrlr-lzbq-krmle bange, navz zvz kxmule-esz' bztrp bange.
Murde doa kx otr-zvzngr drtwrde nzlu-krde mz nrlc ka, sa namale-lvile nzlungr kxboi. A' doa kx yrlqtxole nzlu-krde murde vz-nqblqle ninge, sa naprtr mz nzlungr kxboi.”
Rpi-mop Jiszs bagr kx, “Mrlx kx abrtzlvzle nimu mz nzngini-krmu doa nengeng, lxngiti-kzle ninge. X krkc tqlxngitile ninge, lxngiti-kzle Trtenge kc tqatwzlr-ngrmle ninge.
Mrlx kx abrtzlvzle doa kx ngi menrpa ne Trtenge murde plzpxle natq Trte, Trtenge sa nakabzle bade da kxmrlz kcpwz tqtwz menrpa lcde. X mrlx kx abrtzlvz-kzle doa kxtubq murde nztubq-krde, Trtenge sa nakabzle bade da kxmrlz kcpwz tqtwz doa lc tqtubq.
Mrlx kx rkabz lue kxbao kx namnq doa txne kx vz-nqblqle ninge, Trtenge sa naka-angidrbzle bade da kxmrlz mz nzabrtzlvz-krde nide.”
Mz nibr Jiszs nzalvztr-krde nigr aposol kcng nzpnu-esz'-nrade-li (12) mz da kx napibzkr mz leplz, nigr kc tqvzpekr. Zbz Jiszs rkalz-kzp mrlcde, x sc tqvzpe mz nzalvztr-krde x nzryapwxpx-krde mz kzdung kz mztea ngr Gzlili Provins.
Mzli lc Jon Kxawrkxtr sc tqmnc mz presin. Kx xlrle da kcng tqale Kraes, sc tqatwzlrpe-ngrbzle kcng oblamzdeng bade.
Sc tzveapebzng bade kx, “?Nim Kxnzmcpx kc tzpi kx navzm, o na-aenzli-moukr dq ncblo kzble?”
Ayzlu-ngrbz Jiszs natqdr kx, “Yzluamu x pibzmu mz Jon da kcng tqxlramu x tqmcamu mrka mz nzatutr-krnge natq Profet Asaea mz nzycmnetr-krde Kxnzmcpx.
Rpile kx, ‘Kxmztr kcba nzobqpeng, kxnzbxplong nzvznepeng, kxnzyc-ngrng zkrkqlu nzlqngipe-moung, kxnradrtqdr ngq nzxlrpeng da, kxnzbzpeng nztulz-moung, x Nrpakxmrlz nzyapwxtipxbz mz leplz kxnzobqszong.’
Sa namrlzbz mz ncblo kx trpxpx-ngrdeu ninge mz trnzale-krngeu nike pnz drtwr leplz kx nangi nzwzkr Kxnzmcpx.”
Mzli kc tzvzpe-ngrdr menrpa neng Jon, Jiszs kc tqpipebzle mz leplz kcng nzmyalzkr Jon. Rpibzle kx, “Trvz-ngrpwzmuu mz Jon mrkc lzke mz nzmc-krmu ncblo kx tekqtr-zvzle da kx pile, mz nzapu-krde neni kx yamengr nenq mrkang kqlu. A' kc tqvz-ngrbzmu naxlramu natq angidr.
X trvz-ngrpwzmuu nzmc-krmu ncblo kxrngisc, kx pxi-ngrde lrpz kx nzxpengr lqlwx. Murde ncblo kxmule lc trnzmcu mrkc lzke, a' nzmcpwz mz ma nyz king.
Krlc tqvz-ngrbzmu murde namcamu kzdq profet. A' napibo bamu ncblo lc tqmcamu myaszlzle profet kcng bqnc. Murde nzwz-krde myaszlzle nzwzkr profet amrlx.
Murde Jon nide menrpa kc tqplzpxle nzvz-krm Kxnzmcpx. Da kc tqwai nzpipxkr Gct le mz Nzryrngrkxtr kx, ‘Krlc menrpa nenge. Sa na-atwzlr-ngrne nartwayz-kaipz bam, murde naokatrle leplz nengeng mz nzoliqti-krdr nzvz-krbzme.’”
Rpi-mopwz Jiszs kx, “Napibo bamu, trpnzngr ncblo mz nrlc, kx myaszlzle Jon Kxawrkxtr, abzo mzli kc krlzmle mzli ka. A' abzo mzli ka, leplz txne amrlx kx nzrlr-lzbq-ngrmqng bange mz nzmnclz-krbz mz Kxetu namyaszlzlr nide.
Murde abzo mzli kc Jon tqryapwxpx-ngrde nrpa ngr nzrtekqtrngr drtwr krlzmle mzli ka, Gct sa tqvectrpemle leplz bade mz lrpzki kxmrna, mz zmatq kx xplr-esz'ngr. X leplz kcng drtwrdr tqpqtr mz nzngini-krde King rdr, nztwz-anilr x nzlolvz-amqngilr lrpzki rde mz nzarlapx-krde nidr.
A' mzli kc pnz nzryrkr profet x Mosis amrlx nzyapwxtimlr bagu kx Gct mrlz x sa na-atwzlr-ngrmle Kxnzmcpx bagu. A' mzli ka Jon Kxawrkxtr pipxle kx vzpem.
X nzmu nalxngitiq natq profet lcng, nalxngiti-kzq kx Jon nide profet kc tqapule Elaeja, tqrpi Nzryrngrkxtr kx navz-kaip x Kxnzmcpx kc ate. X nalxngiti-kzq da kx ycmnetr-ngrde mz Kxnzmcpx.
Doa kx yrplapx, na-abzle nztwz-krde drtwr ngr natq lc.”
Zbz Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Naryapwxtr-mopwc' mz nimu leplz kcng tzmncng mzli ka. Apuamu doa kxnztopwz kcng drtwrdr tresapxu. Kzdq dzbede tzrkrkxbzng mz kzdq kz dzbede. Tzrpibzlr kx,
‘Ngr-ngrbzkr nabz ngr nzabrtzngr, a' trelawamuu. Ngr-ngrbzkr nabz ngr nzyrningr, a' tryrniwamuu!’
Apuamu nidr murde Jon Kxawrkxtr vzm x trmuneu bret x tr-rmnqne-kzu waen. A' nzrpi leplz kx, ‘Drka' mncpxm bade!’
X ninge Mrlx Leplz vzmc, x mux dakxnzng x rmnq-kzx waen. A' nzrpilr kx, ‘Mcamu ena mrlx ka! Mrlx kx mutu x rmnq kato! Kzte ncblo kxnzatakqting takes x leplz kx nztrka-kzng!’ A' nadcpx mz drtwrmu kx nztubqkr natq opx zlwz mz nztubqkr doa kx atutr. X sa namcamu kalr nztubq-krgr rlilrgr mz da kc navzpxmqng mz nzmnckr leplz kcng tzatutrlr natqgr.”
A' leplz ngr taon kcng tqalengr Jiszs da kxnzmatqng kxkqlu trnztekqtrlru nqmq nr drtwrdr mz alwx ngrdrng. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, ycmne-plztitrle nidr kx Gct sa na-ayrplapxle nidr.
Rpibz Jiszs kx, “Agrmplz nimu lr Korasin. X agrmplz kz nimu lr Betsaeda! Murde Gct sa na-ayrplapxle nimu. Trtekqtrwamuu nqmq nr drtwrmu, kxmule-esz' mcamu da kcng tqmatq tzalepxm mz taon nyzmu. A' lr Taea x lr Saedon kxnzmnc-mrbrng kxdrka'-ngrng nzmyaszpxlr nimu. Murde nzmu rkx lcng na-alepx-pnzmlr mz taon nyzdrng, lr mztea lcdeng nzmu nzpxi-pnzng dzlvq lrpz x nzrlung bq, ngi dalr nztekqtr-krdr nqmq nr drtwrdr.
X napi-angidrbo bamu kx mz Mzli Kxmatq kc navzm, nzayrplapxkr Gct nimu namyaszpxle nzayrplapx-krde lr Taea x Saedon.
X agrmplz nimu lr Kzpznizm murde pxtxpx-ngrnamu ninge. Kxmule-esz' glqlz-lzbqamu wq murde rpiamu natakitrmu Heven, a' Gct sa na-adwatrle nimu mz Hxl! Lr Sodom kxdrka'-ngrng nzmyaszpxlr nimu. Murde nzmu rkx lcng na-alepx-pnzmlr mz taon nyzdr, e lr taon lcde natekqtrlr nqmq nr drtwrdr x taon lc naycbe mzbq ka.
X napi-angidrbo bamu kx mz Mzli Kxmatq kc navzm, nzayrplapxkr Gct nimu namyaszpxle lr Sodom.”
Mzli lc tqkrka'ngr Jiszs, rpile kx, “Trte, Kxetu r lr Heven x lr nrlc! Awibo bam murde aelwapx-ngrbzme mz doa kcng tzavzo-lzbqng da kcng tqyrlq-kapqbzme mz ncblo kcng tzsiklung x tzrpilr kx nzyrplapxng.
Trte, da lc vz-nqblqle me pnz drtwrm. Eu.”
Jiszs rpi-mopwzle kx, “Nzrkrlzngr x zmatq amrlx kapem Trtenge bange. Trpnzngr leplz kx rkrlzti angidr ninge, a' ngi txpwz Trtenge. X trpnz-kzngr leplz kx rkrlzti angidr Trtenge, a' nitxpwo, x leplz kcng tqmcpxx mz nzaelwapx-krbo nide badr.
Mz nzmu-krde lc, nimu amrlx navzmamu bange. Murde nzkxpu-krmung nzmrlepu-zlwzbzng bamu, x rblxbz bamu nzvz-nqblq-krmu natq amrlx kcng tzkapxbz kxnzetu rmung bamu. X sutitx zlwz drtwrnge naokatrpo nimu mz nzmnc-zpwx-krmu.
Mnclzm bange x rlr-ngrm nzalvztr-krnge nim, murde nawztr-lxblrki. X avzo-lzbqx murde nabzmu nayc-zpwxng.
Mzli lc nzalvztr-krngeng x natqngeng kcng nakabo bamu, trnarblxpwzung bamu murde trnzapulru natq kxnzetu rmung.”
Mz kzdq zbq ngr nzangiongr, zbq lc nzrpibz Sabat, Jiszs x nigr ncblo nedeng o-zlikr lrpzki kx vztr mz kzdung lclr wit. Zbz sc tqcpqpxpekr nra wit x sc tqngqtipekr, murde nelzgr brtale. (Lou sc Mosis rlrpx-ngrde nzcpqpxngr wit nyz ncblo kzbleng, a' bzkq nzlakilzm noude.)
Nzmcpz kzdung Farzsi, sc tzrpipebzlr mz Jiszs kx, “Mc ena da kc tzale ncblo nemqng! ?Nike tzxpqbrlr-ngrdr Lou sc Mosis mz nzwz-krdr mz Sabat?”

Nzvztrng mz ma nyz Gct badr kztedeng, x nzngqdr bret kxtr kc tzngqpwzlr pris.”
Rpi-mopwz Jiszs kx, “X na-aoti kz drtwrmu pris neng Gct kcng tzxpqbrlr-ngrdr Lou sc Mosis mz Sabat kang kqlu mz nzwz-krdr mz zbq lc. A' mz nzobqkr Gct, trnzvz-rbrung mz nzale-krdr nzwz-krdr kc tqkabzle badr. Mz nzmu-krde lcde, nzrkrlz-krmu mz Lou ngr Sabat vz-rbr.
A' nakrlz-angidramu kx myaszpxx Mangr-nzangiongr x Lou ngrdeng.
Murde ninge Mrlx Leplz, kc tqngininge Kxetu r Sabat. X tqrngiscnge zmatq mz nzpnzkr drtwrnge da kx takitrde nzalengr mz Sabat. A' Farzsi kcng nzrlasztxdr mangr-nzkrka'ngr, x sc tzycmne-etrpe-ngrdr kxnamu nznibq-krdr Jiszs.

A' tr-rlr-ngrpwzleu badr nzpine-krdr nide.

“Gct rpile kx, ‘Krlc kxnzawz nenge kx mcpxx. X nzmrlzti-krnge nide myapx-esz'ngr x abrtzlvz-zlwzx nide. Sa na-avzobo Mqngrkxtr bade murde narngisc zmatq ngr nzvz-nqblq-krde me pnz drtwrnge. X sa nayapwxtipxbzle mz leplz amrlx nztubqkr nzmnc-krdr mz nzobq-krnge.

A' Kxnzmcpx lc sa natubz mz nibr leplz kx nabzdr ngrgo, mz nzatubx-krde nidr. X sa na-apqtrpzle drtwr leplz kx talvzo, mz nzapu-krdr nyr kx rpile namzpe mz nzyaglqtitr-mou-krde nidr. X sa navz zvz, nakrlzbzle mzli kx aovxio-ngrde, mz nzngini-krde lrpzki r nzatubqtikr Gct leplz.
X kzdung leplz kcng tzycmneng mz natq amrlx mz nrlc sa na-abrtrpzlr drtwrdr bade mz nzarlapx-krde nidr.’”
Zbz kzdung leplz nzvzmibzlr mz Jiszs ncblo kx mncpx-ngrm drka' kx batrpzle nzmwikr mzte x nznabu-krde. A' mzli kc Jiszs tqamrlzpe-ngrde nide, sc tqobqpe x tqycmnepe.
Zbz leplz nzkctitxpxlr da lc x sc tzrpipelr kx, “Mwx krlc Kxnzmcpx kc navzpxm mz nqvi lr King Devet!”
A' kx nzxlrlr natq lc, sc tzrpipelr kx, “Beelsebol ela, kxetu r ma ngr wq, nide kc tqaclvele drka' amrlx x sc nide kc tqrkabz bade zmatq mz nzmaszlrpx-krde drka' mz leplz.”
A' Jiszs krlztitrpebzle drtwrdr. X mz nzaelwapx-krbzle badr kx nzvz-rbrng, sc tqrpipebzle kx, “Kandre kx akipx-lzbq mz dzbede sc tzota-etrpeng, x mzli kxpipzne sa naodating. Mz nqmq lcpwz doa lr mztea o ma kxesz' kx nzamnc-dali-lzbqng, sa nayrkrtxpxbzng.

Kxmule-esz' rpiamu kx rmaszlrpx-ngrne drka' mz zmatq ngr Setzn, a' tr-rpiwamuu kx oblamzmung nzrmaszlrpx-kzng mz zmatq ngrde. Mz nzmu-krde lc, nzkrlzlr nzrpi-ngrbz bamu kx vz-rbramu!
A' me ngi daki-angidrle se. Mz nzmaszlrpx-krnge drka' mz zmatq ngr Mqngrkxtr, aelwapx-ngrne kx Gct sa tqvectrpemle leplz bade mz nzngini-krde King rdr.

Da angidrtx lc napibo bamu. Gct krlzle nzipqpx-krde alwx x nzrpivxitingr amrlx. A' mz nzrpi-krmu lc, kx zmatq rnge vzpxm mz Setzn, pivxitiamu Mqngrkxtr kc tqngi angidr nou zmatq lc. X rblx nzipqkr Gct doa kx pivxitile Mqngrkxtr.
Doa kx pibqtile ninge, krlz Gct nzipqpx-ngrbz alwx ngrde, nzmu natekqtrle nqmq nr drtwrde. A' trpnzngr nzipqkr Gct leplz kx pivxitile Mqngrkxtr, kxmule-esz' mzli ka x mzli kc navzm.
“Na-aoti drtwrmu ninge x na-aolvzamu nzngini-krnge ncblo kxmrlz o ncblo kxdrka'ngr mz da kcng tqalexng. Murde nzmrlzkr nounc aelwapxngr nrade kxmrlz. A' nztrkakr nounc aelwapxngr nrade kxtrka. Nounc amrlx nzglx-ngrdr nradr kcng tzpapx-ngrdr.
Nimu doa neng kxdrka'-ngrng kxnzodang. X rblxbz bamu nzrpi-krmu da kxmrlz. Murde ncblo krla tqpipxle da kx yclzm mz nabzde.
Nabz ncblo kxmrlz yclz-ngrm da kxmrlz. X aelwapx-lzbqngr mz nzmrlzti-krde leplz. A' nabz ncblo kxtrka yclz-ngrm da kxtrka. X aelwapx-lzbqngr mz nzatrkati-krde leplz.
“Nakrlz-angidramu kx mz Mzli Kxmatq kc navzm, Gct sa na-ayrplapxle leplz mz natqdrng amrlx kcng trmrlzu mz nzobq-krde.
Mz nzmu-krde lcde, na-aclvetio-lzbqamu mz nikeng piti-ngrnamu ninge. Murde Gct sa na-ayzlubzle da bamu mz nzvz-nqblq-krde natqmung. X mzli lcde, nztubqkr doa o nzvz-rbr-krde sa navzpxm mz natqdeng kcng tqpitileng mz nrlc ka. X doa kx natqde trka takitrde nzayrplapxngr nide.”
Zbz kzdung Farzsi x kxnzalvztrng mz Lou sc Mosis nzrpibzlr bade kx, “Kxakrlz, ale dq da kxmatq mz nzaelwapx-krm kx vzpx-angidrme mz Gct.”

“Jona mnctipxmle mz nelz besilr zbq tq.” X mz nqmq lcpwz, ninge Mrlx Leplz, sa namnctilz-kzpc' mz gq zbq natq.

Mz nzmu-krde lcde, mz Mzli Kxmatq kc navzm, lr Ninive sa naycmne-kzng mz kot mz nzpipx-krdr kx vz-rbramu, murde trlxngitiwamuu nrpa ngr Gct da kc tzwailr.
X mz nqmq lcpwz, mzli kc bqnc kwin kc tqaclvele kandre kc Seba mrkc Arabia, vzm rlru mz nzlalztq-krbzle mz Solomon mz natq ngr nzyrplapxngr. Zbz vzpx x vzmitrple drka' rlimz kx nztrka-zlwzng mz nide. Nzvzmqng sc tzmncpxpemqng bade. X nzmnckr ncblo kc sc tqtrkatx-zlwzpe, myaszpxle mzli kc kai. X mz nqmq lcpwz, nimu kxdrka'-ngrng kang mzli ka trkatx-zlwzamu myaszpxle mzli kc trvzka-ngrpc'. Murde pxtxpx-ngrnamu ninge!”
Mzli kc Jiszs tqycmnebe-ngrbzle mz zbo ngr leplz kcng, lxede x mzledeng sc tzkaputrpe-kzpqng. Nztutrpqng yz x nzpitrpzlr mz kzdung leplz kx naycmneng badr Jiszs.

X kzdung mou nztationg mz drtc' ngr ncngrbz. Krlcng nzlvcpumilzmqng lxbi x nzyrlvilvzo lxbi nidr.
